name: Argos Hotel
address: C/ La Mola, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: This modern seafront hotel is by the peaceful and family-friendly Talamanca Beach on Ibiza’s east coast. It is just 2 kilometres from the capital, Eivissa. The Argos Ibiza has an outdoor swimming pool with sea views. There is also an outdoor hot tub, an indoor pool, a gym and a terrace with sun loungers. The hotel's elegant restaurant and bar offer a range of dishes and sea views. All rooms are air conditioned. The Argos Ibiza is set 100 metres from the seafront promenade. This is an ideal setting for walking and jogging. Ibiza Casino is also nearby.

name: Grand Hotel Palladium
address: Calle Los Lirios, 55, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: This 5-star hotel is next to Siesta Beach, in Ibiza’s Santa Eulalia. Grand Hotel Palladium has a salt-water outdoor swimming pool, a terrace with sunbeds overlooking Santa Eulalia Bay and a springwater spa. Rooms at the Palladium offer free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, mini fridge, kettle and a private balcony or terrace. Rooms are spacious and bright, with elegant design and classic wooden furniture. Grand Hotel Palladium has a bar and a restaurant, serving fresh Mediterranean cuisine. It has a terrace overlooking Santa Eulalia Bay. The Grand Hotel’s indoor spa includes a freshwater pool in Roman-bath style. There is also a sauna, a steam bath and hot tub. Treatments like mud therapy and massages can be booked at reception. Free private parking nearby is available and car rental can be arranged at reception. Golf de Ibiza Golf Club is less than 5 km away. Santa Eulalia’s Old Town and harbour are within a 15-minute walk.

name: Mondrian Ibiza
address: 20 Calle Atalaya, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Overlooking the turquoise waters of the Balearic Sea on Ibiza s scenic eastern coast, Mondrian Ibiza brings its chic sophistication, inventive design, and extraordinary service to the Mediterranean. The hotel will feature 154 spacious guest rooms infused with Mondrian s signature aesthetic. Two inviting, lounge style pools offer captivating coastal views, while three innovative dining destinations bring the flavors of the Pityusic Islands to life through crafted cocktails and creative cuisine.accorhotels.com

name: Agroturismo Can Guillem
address: Carretera Santa Gertrudis, Km 0,100, Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool and large gardens, Can Guillem is a stylish converted farmhouse set in the Ibizan countryside. It offers free Wi-Fi and is located 5 km from Ibiza Town. The interior of Can Guillem features traditional tiled floors and whitewashed walls. Each air-conditioned room has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Can Guillem offers massage services and a hot tub. Car and bicycle rental is available and you can also hire a boat or take sailing lessons. The hotel offers a charming terrace and you can order meals on request. In Ibiza Town there is a wide variety of restaurants and bars, as well as the world-famous nightclub Pacha. Ibiza Golf Club is a 15-minute drive from Can Guillem. A shuttle service to San José Airport, located 10 km away, is available on request.

name: Invisa Hotel La Cala- Adults Only
address: Calle Huesca, 1, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated 250 metres from Santa Eulalia Beach in Ibiza, this adults-oriented hotel offers spacious rooms with a furnished balcony and flat-screen TV. The spa includes a gym and sauna. The hotel has an outdoor pool surrounded by a sun terrace with free loungers. Guests can rent towels. Invisa Hotel La Cala offers a buffet restaurant where local and international dishes are available. Drinks and snacks can be enjoyed in the bar area. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Ibiza Town is 14 km away. Car rental can be arranged at the hotel’s tour desk.

name: Hotel Tres Torres
address: Bahia Ses Estaques, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: The Hotel Tres Torres faces the Santa Eulalia del Río Sporting Marina, 14 km from the city of Ibiza. There is an outdoor pool, and all of the rooms have a private balcony. Free WiFi is provided. The Tres Torres offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a TV and private bathroom. Some rooms have sea views. There is snack bar and the reception is open 24 hours a day. The hotel is located close to the centre of Santa Eulalia, within 10 minutes' walk of a range of restaurants and bars. Ibiza airport is 22.5 km from the property. RESERVATIONS OF 5 ROOMS OR MORE MAY BE SUBJECT TO DIFFERENT CONDITIONS AND ADDITIONAL SUPPLEMENTS.

name: Hotel Riomar, Ibiza, A Tribute Portfolio Hotel
address: C/ Del Río, 48, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Where the river meets the sea, a place of natural wonder from which energies are channeled. Ocean Brasserie & Bar, lounge and terrace, is a place to immerse amongst a community of leisure, making for an affirmed connection to life under the sun. Relax at the Pool Deck or with a morning yoga session in TRIBE, our secret garden. Hotel Riomar Ibiza is another world, where dreams are fueled and inspiration is found. A residence for ideas and a place where community evolves.Marriott

name: Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa
address: Calle Narcisos, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa is situated on the seafront next to the Santa Eulalia River. The hotel provides free access to the fitness centre and offers many treatments in the Prestige Spa at an extra charge. Ibiza Airport is 21 km away. All spacious rooms have a balcony and flat-screen TV. The bathroom is complete with a separate bath and hydromassage shower. Guests are also provided with a bathrobe and slippers. Indoor and outdoor pool, a herbal steam room and an ice fountain are some of the spa facilities available at an extra charge. Foot baths and a variety of massages are also on offer. There are 4 restaurants offering a choice of Mediterranean, International and Asian cuisine. Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa also has several bars serving snacks, cocktails and ice cream. At the Insotel Fenicia Prestige Suites & Spa reservations can be made for activities, such as yacht hire. There are golf courses within 6 km of the hotel.

name: Aguas de Ibiza Lifestyle & Spa
address: Salvador Camacho, 14, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: The new Aguas de Ibiza Lifestyle and Spa Hotel is the new concept of 5* luxury hotels with 112 rooms designed and managed by the Torres family as an expression of their worship of Ibiza. It is located in Santa Eulalia del R?o a few distance of Ibiza, beside the new congress palace. The hotel has modern facilities for any event, a restaurant with traditional cuisine, a chill out area, Air Ibiza and a bar.priceline.com

name: Suite Hotel S'Argamassa Palace
address: Avinguda De S'Argamassa, 82, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Built around an inviting outdoor swimming pool, this suite hotel offers spectacular views over the beach and the Mediterranean Sea beyond – great for a peaceful break on picturesque Ibiza. It offers free Wi-Fi. The S’Argamassa Palace is surrounded by tranquil pine forests on the island’s east coast. It looks out over the golden sands of Cala Pada beach. Take a swim in the beach's clear waters or in the property’s central swimming pool, designed for both adults and children. The hotel features a gym and a hot tub. Beauty treatments are available. Finish off the day by choosing from the varied cuisine served at the hotel restaurant. This charming venue serves dishes ranging from innovative creations to traditional Spanish dishes, all out on the comfortable terrace. The S’Argamassa Palace is just 3 minutes from the Palacio de Congresos de Santa Eulalia.

name: Nobu Hotel Ibiza Bay
address: Cami Ses Feixes 52, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Seafront on Ibiza’s Talamanca Beach, Nobu Hotel Ibiza Bay offers spa access, two pools, a kid’s club and rooftop terrace suites. Ibiza Town is 3 km away. Each room is decorated with luxurious details and equipped with free WiFi. All offer marble bathrooms with rainfall showers, floor to ceiling windows and open terraces with sea or garden views. The suites are spacious and come with a plush lounge area and separate dressing room. Some include a kitchenette and private plunge pool. The resort has four restaurants and bars, offering a variety of options for all tastes. Bay Café serves gluten-free dishes and the Nobu restaurant serves Japanese-Nikkei fusion cuisine. There is also a beachfront chiringuito-style restaurant, which serves fresh sea food. Ibiza Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Agroturismo Can Toni Xumeu - Adults Only
address:
9.6
Wonderful
126 reviews
description: Set in Cala Llonga, Agroturismo Can Toni Xumeu offers accommodation with flat-screen TV, as well as a garden. A microwave is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the farm stay you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Agroturismo Can Toni Xumeu offers an outdoor pool. A car rental service is available at this property.

name: Cas Gasi
address: Camino Viejo De Sant Mateu, Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Ibiza Island
description: Cas Gasi is a luxury hotel located in the countryside, just 15 minutes from the main beaches and attractions of Ibiza. It features two outdoor swimming pools, the bigger quiet one for adults, the other one for children, and beautiful gardens. The rural house reflects traditional Ibizan architecture with its large porches and terraces. The interior décor features antiques, elegant furniture and rustic details. All rooms at Hotel Cas Gasi have a view and are equipped with a private bathroom as well as free Wi-Fi. Cas Gasi's restaurant features fresh, seasonal Mediterranean cuisine made with vegetables from its organic garden, local meat and seafood, and an international wine list. Room Service is offered until 23:00 Guests are welcome to enjoy massages and beauty treatments at the spa as well as personal training and yoga. Bikes, electric bikes and an electric car are available for hire. The property's concierge service can book restaurants and clubs, excursions, private yoga and Pilates classes, boat hire, childcare and more.

name: Ocean Drive Talamanca
address: Carrer de Jesús, 28, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Ocean Drive Talamanca is just 50 metres from Talamanca Beach and offers sea views. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, and rooms with balconies and free WiFi. Set in a fine location in Ibiza, the hotel offers a concept that aims to personalize the guest experience with a variety of services. The property offers simple, bright décor. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has satellite TV. Guests benefit from 2 free bottles of water upon arrival. The Ocean Drive Talamanca buffet restaurant serves breakfast buffet and overlooks Talamanca Bay. You can get lunch at the hotel's snack bar. There is a direct bus to nearby Ibiza Town, which stops 25 metres from the hotel. Nightclubs including Pacha and Space are a 15-minute drive away. Ferries to the other Balearic islands and mainland Spain leave from the city’s port, 2 km away. Seasonal hotel open from May until October.

name: Invisa Hotel Ereso
address: Playa De Es Cana 07 840 Santa Eulalia Del Rio Ibiza, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Location This hotel lies in the outskirts of Es Caná, only around 200 m from the beach. Ibiza Town is around 20 km. Scores of shops, restaurants, bars, pubs and excellent public transport links are situated in the hotel's immediate vicinity. Facilities The hotel features 240 accommodation units. Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift provides easy access to the upper floors. Amenities include a safe and currency exchange facilities. Internet access is available in public areas. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a restaurant, a café and a bar. Children can have fun playing in the garden. Additional features of the hotel include a TV room and a playroom. Facilities include medical assistance. A bicycle hire service gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. All accommodation units offer a safe, a telephone and a TV. Each accommodation unit includes a bathroom with a shower. Sports/Entertainment The hotel features an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols are also available. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. The hotel offers an extensive outdoor sport and leisure programme, with tennis, volleyball, handball, golf and archery. Those who enjoy watersports can have fun with aqua aerobics and aquafit. Table tennis and pool/billiards are some of the sports and leisure options available at the hotel. Entertainment options and leisure facilities include an entertainment programme and an entertainment programme for adults. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Bo Hotel Palma
address: Carrer Jaume Ferrer 2, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering a sun terrace and hot tub, BO Hotel Palma is located in Palma de Mallorca in the Majorca Region. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Enjoy a cup of coffee while looking out at the sea or city. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Superior rooms have a spa bath. The hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel offers a continental breakfast. The area is popular for golfing and cycling. The hotel also offers bike hire. Palma Yacht Club is 500 metres from BO Hotel Palma, while Palma Port is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Universal Hotel Neptuno - Adults Only
address: Calle Llaut 34, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel enjoys a fantastic position right on the beachfront at Majorca’s Playa de Palma. Its 2 outdoor pools overlook the glistening Mediterranean Sea. At the Neptuno you can work up a sweat in the sauna or gym before cooling off in the outdoor hot tub or swimming pool. There is also an indoor heated pool open in April and October for the guests. You can also choose to simply relax on a sun lounger on the terrace. In the evening, try a delicious meal in the cafe-restaurant before enjoying a refreshing drink in the lounge bar. Majorca’s nearby capital of Palma is an ideal daytrip from this hotel. This historic city is known as one of the most picturesque in Spain. It 1 outdoor pool overlooks the glistening Mediterranean Sea. This seasonal hotel is open between February and November.

name: Hotel Playa Golf
address: Carretera Del Arenal 45, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Playa Golf is located on Playa de Palma Beach, 10 minutes’ drive outside Palma. It offers an outdoor pool, spa, fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony. Rooms at the Playa Golf are bright and feature simple, comfortable décor. They are equipped with satellite TV and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. The hotel has a buffet restaurant as well as two bar-restaurants. There are also 3 bars with a terrace, including one with a Balinese theme. Other services at the property include bicycle parking for an additional cost. Leisure facilities at the Playa Golf Hotel include tennis courts. There is also a car rental service and staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Mallorca. Puntiró and Marriot’s Son Antem Golf Courses are both around 20 minutes’ drive from the hotel. You can drive to Palma Airport in just 10 minutes.

name: Brondo Architect Hotel
address: Carrer Can Brondo, 4, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel is located in central Palma’s charming Old Town, just 10 minutes’ walk from the Cathedral. The Architect Hotel combines Mallorcan architecture with Bohemian design. The hotel consists of 2 buildings, one of them with a lift. Some suites at Brondo Architect Hotel feature themed décor, with wooden floors and natural light. Each one comes with free WiFi, flat-screen satellite TV, and a bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Suites and some of the Premium Rooms have a private terrace. Brondo Architect Hotel has a fitness centre which offers personalised training and relaxation programmes. It also has a roof terrace with sofas where you can relax in the sun. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Mallorca. They also provide booking a table at a restaurant, tickets to live shows and other events. The emblematic Bar Bosch is just 50 metres from Brondo Architect Hotel. Palma Airport is just 12 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Cabot Playa Grande - Adults Only
address: Carrer Aguamarina 8, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel situated in a pedestrian street that gives access to Playa de Palma beach, only 20 metres away. Excellent connection by bus with the capital Palma. The hotel is 4 km from the airport. The fifty four rooms are distributed of five floors, and the majority have a terrace. Facilities also include an air conditioned dining room and a lounge-bar with terrace. This is ideal accommodation to enjoy a holiday in the sun with the beach at close hand, and good transport connections with Palma, mean you can easily visit other towns on the island. The hotel also has a car hire service.

name: Melia South Beach
address: Avenida Notario Alemany, Nº 1, Calvià Beach Resort, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront at Calvia Beach, Meliá South Beach features 4 seasonal outdoor pools and stylish rooms with free WiFi. The hotel offers an a la càrte restaurant,The Cape Nao Beach Club. Each spacious room at Meliá South Beach has bright, contemporary décor. There is air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes free organic toiletries, plus bathrobe and slippers. Meliá South Beach's poolside bar offers Spanish tapas, fresh seafood and other light dishes. Restaurants, bars and cafés can also be found by the seafront. It is located next to Nikki Beach Club & Restaurant, The hotel Yhi Spa features unique beauty treatments and massage services and a fitness room. Free yoga and pilates classes are also included. One of the pools is adults-only, where you can find Balinese beds to relax on, another one is only for the level guests and the other pool is for children. Room service is available 24 hours. The centre of Palma is 15 km from the Meliá South Beach, while the city’s airport can be reached in 20 minutes by car. The hotel also offers a private jet service. You can drive to both Puerto Portals and Puerto Adriano within 15 minutes.

name: Summum Prime Boutique Hotel
address: Calle Concepcion 26, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Palma de Mallorca's Old Town, 0.5 km from Passeig del Born, Summum Prime Boutique Hotel features a sun terrace with a small pool and a spa centre. Palma Cathedral is 0.7 from the property, while Ca'n Pere Antoni Beach is 2,6 km away. Set within the 15th-century Ca'n Berga-Ladaria Palace, Summum Prime Boutique Hotel offers rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. Each room has a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy the on-site bar. The hotel also offers bike hire. Palma Yacht Club is 900 metres from Summum Prime Boutique Hotel, while Cala Major Beach is 4.1 km away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km from the property.

name: Meliá Calviá Beach
address: Calle Violeta 1, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering impressive sea views from its setting, the stylish beachfront hotel Meliá Calviá Beach features 3 outdoor swimming pools, 1 heated indoor pool and direct access to the beach. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has a balcony. Rooms are decorated in an elegant, contemporary style. All accommodation offers satellite TV and a minibar. Rooms overlook the sea, gardens or pool area. The hotel features spacious terraces with sea and pool view, as well as 2 restaurants - a la carte and buffet style - offering international cuisine. There is also a pool bar and a lounge bar with a wide range of snacks and drinks. Set in attractive gardens, Meliá Calviá Beach has a large sun terrace with loungers. The hotel offers a lagoon-style pool, one pool for kids, one exclusive pool for the Level Clients and one indoor pool. There is a daily entertainment programme for adults and children, and guests can also relax at the YHI Spa. Meliá Calviá Beach also offers guests special rates for Katmandu Park. The hotel also offers The Level personalized service in some of the hotel’s rooms. This service includes, among others, private reception space, express check-in and check-out, access to a private pool, free usage of superior amenities, pillow menu and a la carte breakfast service in the room. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the centre of Magalluf and there is a selection of golf courses within 5 km of the hotel. Palma and its airport can be reached in 25 minutes, by car.

name: Ur Palacio Avenida - Adults Only
address: C/ Del Marquès de la Fontsanta, 2, 07005 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Palacio Avenida occupies a famous cinema, built in 1942. It offers meeting rooms and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom. Palacio Avenida is in Palma's main business area, and just 300 metres from the city's main shopping and commercial area. The Cathedral and Parc de la Mar are 10 minutes’ walk away. The rooms at the Palacio Avenida were designed by Bruno Borrione, from the Philippe Starck studio. Satellite channels are available in all rooms. Soller Train Station and Palma’s Central Bus Station are within 100 metres, as is the Parc de les Estacions. You can drive to Palma Airport in 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Calatrava
address: Plaza Llorenc Villalonga 8, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located next to Palma’s Parque del Mar and the old city walls, Hotel Calatrava features a free spa and stylish rooms. Set in the old town, it serves breakfast on its terrace, offering views of the Mediterranean Sea. Each spacious room at Hotel Calatrava features chic, modern décor. All rooms have free Wi-Fi, a minibar, air conditioning, a Smart flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bathrobes, slippers, free toiletries, a hairdryer with diffuser and a hairstraightener. They offer lovely views of Palma's old town, the bay or Parque del Mar. The hotel's Calatrava Gastro-Gourmet offers a variety of seasonal and traditional Mallorcan products. You can enjoy drinks, homemade pastries and snacks in the interior lounge or in the terrace. The free spa, for private use, features a Finnish sauna, a hot tub, treatment cabins and sensation showers with aromatherapy. Pilates and yoga classes are also available under request. Palma Cathedral and Almudaina Palace are within 350 metres of the Calatrava. Palma’s marina and seafront promenade can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.

name: Hotel Saratoga
address: Paseo De Mallorca, 6, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, the luxurious Saratoga hotel has a rooftop pool with beautiful city views. It has been renewed and it features free Wi-Fi throughout. The hotel is located 5 minutes’ walk from the Contemporary Art Museum, the port and Palma Cathedral. It is also just 60 metres from the exclusive Jaime III shopping avenue. The spacious and elegant rooms at the Saratoga have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and air conditioning in summer and heating in winter. Most rooms have a private balcony. Enjoy the swimming pool located on the rooftop with an amazing view to the port of Palma and the Bellver Castle or have a quiet time on the two other pool areas, which are available on the ground floor even in Winter since there is a heated one. In the same area you can find the fitness room and the Spa, where you can relax while having a massage*. Spa threatments under availability and additional cost*. Bringing a car shouldn't be a problem since there is a private underground parking at the property, there is an additional cost for using it and It is subject to availability and request.

name: Palma Suites
address: Plaça Mercadal, 8, 07002 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Palma’s old town, Palma Suites offers modern, air-conditioned suites with a fully equipped kitchen and free WiFi. It features a roof terrace and a gym. Featuring Nordic-style dècor, each suite is equipped with a kitchen with a microwave and dishwasher, a lounge-dining area with sofas, flat-screen satellite TV and a safe. They feature heated flooring and individually controlled heating. Different cleaning services are provided according to the length of stay. There is a café-bar on site and breakfast is offered upon request. Many dining options, bars and shops can be found in the area surrounding Palma Suites. Club Náutico is 15 minutes’ walk from the suites. Palma Beach is 2 km away and Palma Airport is 9 km from Palma Suites. Public parking is available 150 metres away and for an extra cost.

name: Myseahouse Flamingo
address: Misión San Diego, 2, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront of Playa de Palma, Hotel Flamingo - Adults Only 4* Sup boasts two outdoor swimming pool with sea views and has free WiFi throughout. Featuring plenty of natural light, each charming room at this hotel comes with a balcony or a terrace. All of them include satellite TV, a telephone and a free safety deposit box. Most rooms have lateral or frontal views of the Mediterranean sea. Hotel Flamingo offers a spa with a pool, hydromassage baths, thermal circuit, steam bath a sauna and "sensation" showers. It has a relaxation area with loungers and direct access to the garden. The accommodation offers a gym and a bicycle room for washing and storing the bicycles. Guests have easy access to different activities in the area nearby the hotel. Palma's Old Town is 10 minutes' drive from the property. Bars, restaurants and shops are within walking distance from the hotel. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 3 km away.

name: Castillo Hotel Son Vida, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Mallorca
address: Carrer Raixa 2, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: As of 2022, we invite you to discover our refurbished Rooms & Suites, inspired by Mallorca´s indigenous charms and treasures. An Adults Only 16+ hotel, with captivating panoramic views towards the bay of Palma, Castillo Hotel Son Vida embodies the alluring lifestyle of its affluent neighborhood. Combining an enriching heritage with thoughtful service, the sophisticated ambience extends throughout 164 guestrooms and suites. Surrounded by three excellent golf courses and featuring outdoor swimming pools for unequalled recreation, the 5-star luxury hotel also offers prime downtime at Castillo Hotel Son Vida Spa, including a 24-hour fitness center. A dining destination on its own, an inspired range of restaurants, make the most of the unsurpassed vistas, from fine dining El Castell to the chic Pool Bar. Our meeting rooms boasting natural day light, create the perfect setting for corporate and social events.Marriott

name: Protur Naisa Palma Hotel
address: Carrer De Simó Ballester 6, 07011 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, 2.2 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni, Protur Naisa Palma Hotel provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Protur Naisa Palma Hotel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the accommodation. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are always on hand to help at the reception. Popular points of interest near Protur Naisa Palma Hotel include Palma Yacht Club, Palma Port and Passeig del Born Avenue. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 9 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grupotel Playa de Palma Suites & Spa
address: C/ Ramal Ca Na Gabriela, 4, S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Situated just 5 minutes’ walk from the beach of Bahía de Palma, this attractive hotel features a large outdoor pool and luxurious spa. The suites feature a seating area and small kitchenette. The spa at Grupotel Playa de Palma Suites & Spa includes a hydromassage indoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Massage and aromatherapy treatments are available. A buffet breakfast is served at Playa de Palma. In the evenings guests can enjoy international and Majorcan cuisine. There is also a poolside snack bar. The city of Palma is 15 km away. Puntiró and Son Antem Golf Courses are both within a 20-minute drive.

name: Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá
address: Avenida Joan Miro 21, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá has an ideal location in central Palma, offering views of its marina, just 100 metres away. This hotel features parking and indoor and outdoor swimming pools. Many of the rooms at Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá offer views of Palma Bay. They come with flat-screen TVs, satellite channels and a CD player. A bathrobe and slippers are also included. Air conditioning or heating is featured in the rooms according to the season. The Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá’s Marivent restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and La Terraza del Victoria Restaurant serves dinners. The cocktail bar has a terrace offering views of the marina and the Cathedral. The hotel also has a bicycle center with safety hooks for bicycles and professional tools. Bellver Castle and the entrance to the surrounding park are approximately 500 metres from the Hotel Victoria Gran Meliá. There are a number of bars and clubs within a short walk of the hotel.

name: Hotel Amic Horizonte
address: Calle Vista Alegre, 1, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering views of Palma Bay, Amic Horizonte is a family-run hotel is set close to the Puerto de Palma Harbour. It features an outdoor pool and rooms with balconies, 2 km from central Palma. All air-conditioned accommodation at the Hotel Amic Horizonte has simple, bright décor. Each room comes with satellite TV and private bathroom. The hotel has a buffet restaurant which serves a selection of Mediterranean cuisine and features a terrace, offering Mediterranean Sea views. À la carte menu can be also arranged upon request. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Hotel Amic Horizonte, a bike friendly hotel, has a special menu for athletes as well as treatments and massages. There is a bicycle repair shop too. The nearest beach is Playa Cala Mayor Beach, less than 2 km from the hotel and Palma’s old town can be reached in 20 minutes, by bus. You can find the Porto Pí Shopping Center and Mallorca Casino in a short walk. The city’s airport is just 12 km away and the port is a 10-minute walk from the Hotel Amic Horizonte.

name: Hotel Fenix
address: Avenida Europa 3, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Providing a swimming pool, Hotel Fenix El Arenal is a short drive from Palma de Mallorca and Llucmajor. It provides easy access to Palma Aquarium, and wireless internet is available in public areas and guest rooms at an additional cost. The hotel has a currency exchange, a 24-hour reception and a concierge. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide assistance. Hotel Fenix El Arenal offers air conditioned rooms with a rain shower and a flat-screen TV. They all offer heating, a private bathroom and a desk. The hotel features both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind of an evening. Hotel Fenix El Arenal is located in the popular tourist hub of El Arenal. Iberostar Stadium is just a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Nixe Palace
address: Avenida Joan Miro 269, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The luxury Nixe Palace is situated next to Cala Major Beach and the Marivent Palace. It offers an outdoor pool, a free spa and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access. Rooms at the Nixe Palace are modern. They include satellite TV and a large bathroom with toiletries, bathrobe and slippers. The Nixe’s specialised golf department offers trips to local courses and discounted green fees. Nearby golf courses include Son Vida and Son Muntaner. Hotel Nixe Palace has 3 restaurants, offering the best Mediterranean cuisine, fresh seafood and international dishes. There is also a poolside bar and a garden. The hotel's spa offers a thermal circuit, Turkish steam bath, ice fountain, heated loungers and fantastic sea views. There is also a gym, and massage treatments are available. Entry is subject to a surcharge.

name: Sheraton Mallorca Arabella Golf Hotel
address: Carrer de la Vinagrella, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: The first golf resort on the island, Sheraton Mallorca Arabella Golf Hotel, continues to be a favored destination for sports enthusiasts and families. Blending Palma’s easy living with sporting heritage and generational appeal, the 93 rooms and suites are designed to suit modern lives. A first-choice location for golfers, Golf Son Vida’s 18th hole is placed within putting distance from the hotel. Bordered by two additional 18-hole pro-standard options, Golf Son Muntaner and Golf Son Quint including a pitch and putt, Sheraton Mallorca is unhindered by boundaries, with fairways and hotel grounds seamlessly merging to create an evergreen environment. Championing a family-friendly dynamic, the hotel’s extensive choice of activities, ranges from playing tennis and volleyball to catering for those willing to explore the island by bike. The brand new Arabella Kids & Tweens Club awaits to welcome our young guests, with fun games and exciting activities. Stay fit while travelling at our new Sheraton Fitness.Marriott

name: Hotel Can Cera - Adults Only
address: San Francisco, 8, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Can Cera is a 17th-century palace in the historic centre of Palma de Mallorca with a free spa. The airy rooms have antique-style furniture, minibar and flat-screen satellite TV. All of the air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi, and some have a balcony or terrace. The stylish, modern bathrooms have a bathrobe, slippers, a hairdyer with diffuser and a hairstraightener. The Hotel Can Cera has an attractive terrace and traditional courtyard. The spa has a free sauna, contrast shower and hot tub for private use and the hotel can also arrange massage at an extra cost. The hotel’s restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine and there is a cafe and a stylish bar. Palma Cathedral is about 300 metres away, while the city’s harbour can be reached in about 5 minutes on foot.

name: Kimpton Aysla Mallorca, An IHG Hotel
address: 37 Santa Ponsa Calvia, 07180 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: LUXURY SANCTUARY MEETS MODERN WELLNESS COMMUNITY Kimpton Aysla Mallorca is a modern sanctuary of calm and well-being in Santa Ponsa – Calvia just 14km from Palma. Nestled among lush native gardens imbued with Mallorcan light. A progressive take on wellness resort life, where active leisure meets utter relaxation, and touches of tradition blend with contemporary living. This is modern, relaxed luxury – Mallorca style. It’s an inspiring morning workout, a laid-back breakfast, and a replenishing smooth almond horchata with a twist. It’s a quick check of your socials, a plunge in the day's pool of choice, and a relaxed game of afternoon Tennis at Mallorca Country Club, maybe a round of golf at Golf Santa Ponsa, escape to the beach or take a quick hike. As the sun sets, it’s a balmy evening spent on the terrace with fine organic wine, great food, and sparkling conversation. This is the good life and it’s as good as it gets!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Can Alomar - Adults Only
address: Calle Sant Feliu, 1, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Featuring a plunge pool, Hotel Can Alomar is set in the tree-lined Paseo del Borne Boulevard in the centre of Palma. There is free WiFi throughout. The spacious rooms feature satellite TV, king-size beds, a seating area and safe. The bathrooms feature a bath or a shower, hairdryer with diffuser, hairstraightener, free toiletries, and complimentary bathrobe and slippers. Room service is available. The hotel has a relaxation area located in the sun terrace, featuring a plunge pool with hot tub. It offers massages and private yoga and pilates classes at an extra charge. Treatments are also available in the Viewing Tower, with spectacular views over the cathedral and the bay. The property's trendy restaurant, De Tokio a Lima, offers a fusion of Japanese, Peruvian and Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a bar with a terrace. Set 500 metres from the seafront promenade and 1 km from the beach, Hotel Can Alomar is located a 5-minute walk from Mallorca Cathedral and Almudaina Palace. There are several shops and restaurants in the boulevard where the hotel is located.

name: Hotel Cappuccino - Palma
address: Plaza de Cort, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in the heart of Palma de Mallorca’s Old Town, HOTEL CAPPUCCINO, The Magic Hotel by Grupo Cappuccino is a luxury hotel offering a rooftop pool with city views, spa and a cinema. Palma Cathedral is 500 metres away. The hotel hosts a large art collection and there is an interior courtyard with palm trees. Each exclusive room has been designed by interior designer Jacques Grange and features air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV and minibar. The private bathrooms include free toiletries, hairdryer and bathrobe and slippers. Palma’s Marina and Promenade are 10 minutes’ walk away. Palma Airport is 15 minutes’ drive from HOTEL CAPPUCCINO, The Magic Hotel by Grupo Cappuccino.

name: Aparthotel Fontanellas Playa
address: 7610 Calle Caravel La Playa De Palma, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Situated in the centre of Playa de Palma and on the beachfront, Aparthotel Fontanellas Playa offers modern accommodation with flat-screen TVs. The complex overlooks the beach and includes an outdoor pool and spa. Fontanellas Playa has a large sports area with a mini-football pitch and guests will find a playground next to the complex. The spa has a sauna, hot tub and a seasonal indoor pool. WiFi is free in all areas incluiding in the rooms. Each of the rooms and apartments has a private bathroom, air conditioning and a furnished balcony. The apartments also have a fully equipped kitchen. The complex is situated just 10 minutes’ drive from the centre of Palma de Mallorca, and is surrounded by bars and restaurants. Palma de Mallorca Airport is just 3 km away.

name: Hotel Palma Bellver Affiliated by Meliá
address: Paseo Maritimo 11, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Palma Bellver, managed by Meliá is situated on the seafront in Palma de Mallorca, with views over Palma Bay and the marina. It offers free access to its gym and outdoor pool. Rooms at the Palma Bellver Hotel are all soundproofed and include a private terrace. They have air conditioning and heating, as well as a flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi is also available. A buffet breakfast is served in the restaurant. An à la carte menu is available and guests can enjoy meals on the terrace overlooking the sea. There is also a bar. The centre of Palma is 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. There are several golf courses nearby including Son Vida and Son Campo.

name: Convent de la Missio - Adults Only
address: Carrer De La Missio, 7a, 07003 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Housed in the old monastery Convent de la Missió dating from the 17th century, this modern and chic hotel boasts an excellent location in the centre of historic Palma. Visit the beautiful, historical old town of Palma on foot from this hotel. You can stroll through the narrow streets surrounding the hotel and relax in the gardened patios. At the end of a busy days sightseeing in Palma, you can unwind in the sauna or by sitting in the cool of the interior patio. The hotel is located in the centre of Palma, allowing you to easily get to numerous bars, restaurants and the lively nightlife of the Majorcan capital.

name: Hotel Joan Miró Museum
address: Carrer de Bartomeu Fons, 8, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Opposite the Marivent Palace and set on Palma’s seafront, Hotel Joan Miró Museum has an outdoor pool and is just 200 metres from the Fundación Pilar i Joan Miró. Each air-conditioned room includes free WiFi and a balcony. This charming hotel will feature original pieces of work from Joan Miró. All rooms come with air-conditioning, satellite TV and a safe. The Hotel Joan Miró Museum's restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for dinner. There is a modern lounge bar. Hotel Joan Miró Museum has 2 large event areas where guests can hold a variety of events. The accommodation also offers a garage for bicycles. The nearest golf course is 10 minutes’ drive away and guests can receive discounts on courses around the island. Porto Pí Shopping Centre is just 3 minutes’ drive away. The centre of Palma de Mallorca is 7 minutes away by car.

name: Grand Hotel Son Net
address: B-07133937, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This magnificent old country house has been lovingly restored to create a stunning 5-star hotel with luxurious modern accommodation, contrasting beautifully with the historic building with its original features. Parts of the Grand Hotel Grand Hotel Son Net date back to 1672, and great care has been taken to preserve the building’s historic charm while at the same time adding stylish modern accommodation and facilities. The 30-metre outdoor swimming pool is surrounded by individual cabins for private relaxation and the gourmet MAR&DUIX Restaurant adds an extra touch of luxury. The hotel also enjoys a superb setting, surrounded by citrus orchards and lush gardens, overlooking the village of Puigpunyent and the mountains. This luxurious hotel is ideal for a romantic or relaxing break, with a beauty centre offering a selection of relaxing and therapeutic treatments and pampering.

name: Palacio Ca Sa Galesa
address: Carrer de Miramar 8, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel is set in a 16th-century building in Palma’s Gothic Quarter, 100 metres from Palma Cathedral. It has a roof terrace with great cathedral views. Free bicycle use is offered. Palacio Ca Sa Galesa is 200 metres from Parc del Mar and the sea. The shops and restaurants of Palma’s Old Town are a short walk away. Featuring artwork by Miro, Calder or Bennasar, individually decorated rooms at Ca Sa Galesa offer Old World charm mixed with modern facilities. Each is air-conditioned and features satellite TV, a laptop safe and a hydro-massage bath. There is bathrobes and slippers are also provided. The hotel’s à la carte service offers gourmet dishes 24 hours. A la carte style breakfast is available;

name: Hotel Bordoy Cosmopolitan
address: Carrer de la Mar d'Aral, 4, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Bordoy Cosmopolitan is situated 500 metres from Palma Beach. Surrounded by palm trees, it offers an outdoor pool a hot tub, free WiFi throughout and a mini-golf course. Balconies can be found in all of the air-conditioned rooms in the Cosmopolitan. Bright and functional, all rooms have a TV and a safe. The gym is well-equipped, and there is special storage for bicycles. Tennis and paddle courts are available for an extra cost. Buffet breakfast and dinner are served in the dining room. It offers a range of Mallorcan and international dishes. The Cosmopolitan is located in a quiet area. A bus stop, offering regular services to Palma de Mallorca can be found less than 5 minutes’ walk away. The airport is about 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Sercotel Hotel Zurbarán Palma
address: Carrer De Josep Villalonga, 16, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in a tranquil residential area, just a short stroll from the old quarter of Palma de Mallorca, Sercotel Sercotel Hotel Zurbarán Palma is a modern and well-equipped hotel – an ideal base for sightseeing in the impressive Majorcan capital. After enjoying a hearty breakfast, take a walk into the city centre, where you can visit Palma de Mallorca’s famous cathedral, and wander around its well-preserved old quarter. The seafront promenade and port area is only 200 metres from the hotel, and is a peaceful area for a stroll. Famous bars and clubs lie within a short walk from the property. Check your emails, or surf the internet at any time in this hotel, which has internet connection.

name: Hotel Bordoy Continental Palma
address: Carrer de l'Industria, 10, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Centrally located, only 10 minutes' walk from the port and Palma de Mallorca's Cathedral, Bordoy Continental Palma is an exceptionally classy hotel, offering smart décor, air conditioning, and free Wi-Fi throughout. The heated rooms at the Bordoy Continental Palma feature an elegant design and flat-screen TV. The spacious, private bathroom comes with free amenities. The Bordoy Continental Palma has a fitness room, hot tub and sauna. There is also a car rental service. In the evening, you can admire the stained-glass ceiling and enjoy a selection of drinks at the bar. The hotel is just a few minutes' walk from the Cathedral and Paseo Marítimo Promenade. Guests can enjoy the shopping on Jaime III street, one of Palma's most important shopping areas, just 100 metres away. Santa Catalina fresh fruit and vegetables market is just 400 metres away.

name: Hotel Torre Azul & Spa - Adults Only
address: Carrer De Sant Bartolomeu, 24, S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Hotel Torre Azul & Spa - Adults Only is just 400 metres from the marina and beach, in Majorca's El Arenal. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool and a spa. The hotel is just a few metres from the nearest bus stop and Palma Airport is just 6km away. Free public parking is available nearby. The hotel's spa features a Turkish bath, hot tub and foot baths. There is also a range of massages available. Rooms at the Hotel Torre Azul & Spa - Adults Only are spacious and bright. They all have a balcony, air conditioning and free WiFi. The hotel also has elegant lounge areas, as well as a buffet restaurant and a bar. An evening entertainment programme is also offered. Pets are allowed as long as they weigh less than 8 kg. Pet access to the common areas of the bar, pool, dining room and spa is restricted for reasons of hygiene and well-being of our clients. For more information, ask at reception.

name: Hotel Araxa - Adults Only
address: Pilar Juncosa, 22, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in a quiet area of Palma de Mallorca, Hotel Araxa - Adults only is a 10-minute walk from the seafront and Bellver Castle. Set among green gardens, it features outdoor pool, free gym and spa available spa charges may apply. Large rooms at Hotel Araxa - Adults only are equipped with air conditioning, a TV and free wired internet access. Facilities include safe and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and shower amenities. Continental breakfasts and a combination of regional specialities from the Balearic Islands with international dishes are served at the on-site restaurant. During the summer months guests can enjoy outdoor dining. The spa includes hot tub, Turkish bath, infrared and steam saunas and massage treatments. Staff at the 24-hour reception of the Hotel Araxa - Adults only can help plan visits and excursions. A small free private parking is available. This property does not accommodate stag, hen parties or similar parties.

name: Gpro Valparaiso Palace & Spa
address: c/ Francisco Vidal Sureda, 23, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This luxury hotel is set in the exclusive Bonanova district, a secluded location in Palma de Mallorca. It boasts Majorca’s largest spa, beautiful gardens and stunning views. All modern rooms at Valparaiso Palace & Spa have a private balcony with spectacular city, bay or mountain views. They are spacious and air-conditioned, and include satellite TV, a minibar and bathrobes. The Valparaiso Spa includes a huge heated pool, sauna and hot tub. There is also a steam bath, gym, ice cave and vitamin bar. All spa facilities carry an extra cost. Babies from 0 to 1 can't enter the spa. Surrounded by gardens, Valparaiso Palace & Spa is high above Palma Bay and the city. Facilities include tennis and padel courts and two large swimming pools, as well as a poolside bar open all day in summer. The Valparaiso’s gourmet Paraiso Restaurant serves a varied buffet breakfast. Specializing in show cooking, its chefs prepare Mediterranean market cuisine in front of guests. With a poolside terrace the Bistro Bar serves lunches, dinners, lighter snacks and drinks. The hotel is located 12 km from the Palma de Mallorca Airport.

name: Can Bordoy Grand House & Garden
address: Carrer Del Forn De La Glòria 14, 07013 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Can Bordoy Grand House & Garden is in the Old Town of Palma de Mallorca and boasts pools at their large garden and rooftop, within a 4-minute walk of Palma Port. The luxurious suites at Can Bordoy Grand House & Garden feature a seating area and a private bathroom. All have individually-controlled air conditioning. The property has spacious living areas with a fireplace and a library and there is also a restaurant. A la carte restaurant is open every day. The swimming pool is climatized during all year. The property is close to Palma Yacht Club, Passeig del Born Avenue and Palma Cathedral. Plaza Mayor is 600 metres away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km from the property.

name: Mll Blue Bay
address: C/ Camino Vecinal de Genova-Sant Agusti, No. 30, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in a quiet area of Palma de Mallorca, on top of a hill, Blue Bay Hotel is 400 metres from Cala Mayor Beach and shopping area. Set in extensive gardens it offers outdoor pools. All air-conditioned rooms at Blue Bay have a satellite TV and private balcony. There is a private bathroom with a shower. Free internet via modem is available. There is a buffet restaurant and a lounge bar. In summer there is a poolside bar. Packed lunches can be requested. Entertainment is provided, and there is a children’s play area and a table tennis table. There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. You can hire a car, and free parking is available nearby, or private on-site parking for an extra charge.

name: Sol Barbados
address: Av. Notario Alemany 7, Calvia Beach, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Magaluf, Sol Barbados offers concierge services, rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and an outdoor pool. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a kids' club. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At Sol Barbados all rooms include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a vegetarian breakfast. Sol Barbados offers a children's playground, children swimming pools, Katmandu Adventures mini club, and a water park called Waterland. You can play table tennis at the hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Other services include fitness activities for adults, a bike repair shop, a bike cleaning station, and bike storage. Golf courses can be found nearby. Popular points of interest near Sol Barbados include Aqua land, Nikki Beach Mallorca and The Stage. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 28 km from the accommodation.

name: Calanova Sports Residence
address: Avenida Joan Miró, 327, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, this welcoming residence brings it all within your reach. Thanks to the convenient onsite parking, you can either leave your vehicle behind and let your feet make short work of the 9-minute walk to Cala Mayor Beach, or easily tackle the quick 4-minute drive to Port of Palma de Mallorca. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the seasonal outdoor pool (enjoy the sun loungers!), or sip a drink on the terrace of this residence, which also features outdoor furniture. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the free WiFi. This vacation rental features a safe and tour/ticket assistance. Bathroom amenities include towels and slippers.Expedia

name: Hotel Hospes Maricel & Spa
address: Carretera de Palma-Andraxt, 11, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Hotel Hospes Maricel y Spa is an impressive hotel located just 10 minutes’ drive from Palma de Mallorca. Featuring both modern, 16th and 17th-century architecture, it has an amazing seafront infinity pool and a well-equipped spa. The hotel is made up of the original mansion and a modern annexe building with contemporary décor and exposed stone walls, located on second sea line. You can access the property's private stone caves, some of which have been converted into seafront massage rooms. The Bodyna Spa at Hospes Maricel y Spa includes indoor and outdoor pools, a hot tub, sauna and Turkish bath. There is also a terrace, garden, a gym, and massage services are available. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Hospes Maricel y Spa feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each one comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, and some have a private pool. The hotel’s Maricel Restaurant offers traditional Mallorcan food and a range of quality local wines. At the bar you can enjoy a cocktail accompanied by live jazz. Breakfast can be also served on the Mediterranean-style terrace which overlooks the sea. Hospes Maricel y Spa has a private jetty where guests arriving by sea can moor a boat, and Calanova Sailing Club is 30 metres away. There is a golf course 500 metres away, and you can drive to Palma Airport in 15 minutes.

name: Zhero Hotel Mallorca
address: Carretera Palma-Andratx, 6, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Hotel Zhero is a chic boutique hotel in the hills overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, 7 km outside Palma de Mallorca. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool with loungers. All air-conditioned rooms at the Zhero Hotel feature stylish, minimalist décor all in white. They come with a flat-screen plasma TV, a private balcony and private bathroom complete with hairdryer. The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast. À la carte Mediterranean food is available for lunch. The Zhero has a lounge bar with a poolside terrace where you can get a cocktail or a coffee. The pool area is also equipped with ambient lighting and music for parties or other social events. The Hotel Zhero is 5 minutes’ drive from Bendinat Golf Course and 5 minutes from a secluded beach. It is a 10-minute drive to the town of Portals Nous where you can find several restaurants and bars.

name: Mll Mediterranean Bay Hotel - Adults Only
address: C/ Sant Bartomeu, 18, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: Mediterranean Bay is 350 metres from S’Arenal Beach and has an outdoor pool, an outdoor hot tub and sauna. Each air-conditioned room offers free WiFi, and a flat-screen TV. Hotel Mediterranean Bay has a buffet restaurant and a lounge bar. Breakfast in your room is available on request. The hotel’s rooms have elegant, modern design. They all include a private bathroom. The Mediterranean Bay has a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Free public parking is available nearby. The Mediterranean Bay Hotel is set in Majorca’s Palma Bay, 11 km from Palma city centre. The area has many shops and bars.

name: Saulo Beach Hotel
address: Avenida Bartomeu Riutort, 51, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set overlooking the beach of Playa de Palma, Saulo Beach Hotel is located on the edge of Can Pastilla, near Palma de Mallorca, the capital of Majorca. Stroll down to the beach from Saulo Beach Hotel and relax on the fine sands. You can take a dip in the Mediterranean Sea here, or hire a bike and ride along the seafront promenade. You can enjoy lunch and dinner at the Sauló’s onsite à la carte restaurant, or grab a snack in the café, which has a terrace opening out onto the beach. From here you can easily and quickly get to the centre of Palma by bus – the bus stop is located near the hotel. Palma airport is also just a short journey from Saulo Beach Hotel. Seasonal hotel - Open from 15 January until November.

name: Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only
address: Paseo De Illetas, 7, 07184 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Situated on the sea front in Illetas, Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only is set within beautiful gardens and features a small exclusive beach. This stylish Hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a sun terrace and an extensive spa with pool. Each of the bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá has stylish, modern décor, a flat-screen TV with Chromecast and a special pillow menu. Rooms also feature balconies with sea views. Red Level guests enjoy additional, exclusive services such as special discount in the parking, VIP check-in, free Nespresso coffee, free access to the Spa's thermal circuit and access to the Red Level lounge with free drinks. For an additional charge, guests have access to the SPA BY CLARINS, where health and beauty treatments are available. The spa includes a Finnish sauna, Turkish bath, hot water indoor pool and a hot tub. The fitness center is available 24 hours and it is free of charge. Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only has 4 restaurants, including the the Amaro Lounge, which offers light food, drinks and cocktails, a poolside restaurant Bardot, specializing in fresh fish, rice dishes and seafood meals. Arrels by Marga Coll is a fine dining restaurant offering tasting menus, with a beautiful terrace and sea views, serving traditional Mallorcan cuisine with a modern twist, and is only open for dinner. Perseo offers a delicious breakfast buffet with show cooking. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Portals Nous Marina and central Palma is just 7 km away. Bendinat Golf Club is a 10-minute walk from the Meliá.

name: Hotel y Apartamentos Leman
address: Avinguda Son Rigo 6, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, 100 metres from Playa de Palma Beach and 2.4 km from Can Pastilla Beach, Leman Hotel y Apartamentos provides a restaurant, sea views and free WiFi. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Some units include a seating area and/or a balcony. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. The aparthotel offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness room and children's playground. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Leman Hotel y Apartamentos, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Palma Yacht Club is 14 km from the accommodation, while Palma Port is 14 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from Leman Hotel y Apartamentos.

name: Hotel Oleander
address: C/ Acaia, 12, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Oleander is set just 200 metres from Playa de Palma Beach in La Maravillas, 10 minutes’ drive from Palma Airport. It features 2 swimming pools and rooms with balconies. The air-conditioned rooms at the Oleander are spacious and bright. Each has a satellite TV, safe and private bathroom. Some rooms offer views of the Mediterranean Sea. The Oleander’s buffet restaurant serves a varied breakfast and selection of Mediterranean cuisine for dinner. The hotel provides an evening entertainment programme. The area surrounding the Oleander is ideal for activities such as horse riding and cycling. Can Pastilla’s marina and sailing club are just 2 km away.

name: We Hostel Palma - Albergue Juvenil
address: Carrer Germans Schembri, 1, 07014 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Boasting a terrace, a bar as well as on-site dining, We Hostel Palma Albergue Juvenil is a youth hostel situated in Palma de Mallorca, a 15-minute walk from Palma Yacht Club. 2 km from Cala Major Beach, the property is also 2.1 km away from Palma Port. The property is non-smoking throughout. At the hostel, the rooms include a wardrobe. The property provides coffee machine and a kitchenette with a microwave. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the property. Speaking English and Spanish, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Lío Mallorca is 22 metres from We Hostel Palma. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 9 km from the property.

name: Zel Mallorca
address: Carrer Duc Estremera, 16, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on Majorca's south coast, in the Palmanova beach area, Zel Mallorca exudes Mediterranean charm and essence. The unique entrance is a distinctive feature: its courtyard welcomes you in a cozy atmosphere. The rooms are designed in a locally inspired style and offer stunning sea views. Its swimming pools offer sea views, one of them has direct access to the beach. The hotel encourages a healthy, active and relaxed lifestyle and features a fully equipped gym. To maximize your wellbeing there is a spa and a full activities programme, which includes yoga retreats and fitness. A wide range of sports activities are also available, such as tennis, golf, scuba diving, etc. Reconnect with your inner self at Zel Mallorca, your Mediterranean home

name: Aubamar Suites & Spa
address: Calle Misión de San Diego 17, 07600 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Aubamar Suites & Spa features a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Playa de Palma. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel each room comes with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with pool view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The rooms are fitted with a safety deposit box and certain rooms include sea views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Guests at Aubamar Suites & Spa can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including a sauna, and a hot tub, or in the garden. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa de Palma Beach, and Calo de Sant Antoni Beach. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from Aubamar Suites & Spa.

name: Azuline Hotel Bahamas y Bahamas II
address: Avenida De Europa, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: AzuLine Hotel Bahamas is 8 minutes’ walk from the beach in S’Arenal, just 10 minutes’ drive from Palma Airport. It offers an outdoor pool, hot tub and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony. A free daily shuttle service to Arenal Beach is offered. All rooms at the azuLine Hotel Bahamas have satellite TV and most rooms have views of the sea, swimming pool or pine forest. The hotel offers a varied entertainment programme for adults and children. There is also a games room with a pool table and arcade games. The buffet restaurant at azuLine Hotel Bahamas serves international food, and there are 2 bars. There is a variety of restaurants and bars on the seafront promenade, located under 10 minutes’ walk away. For cyclists, the property offers a bicycle workshop and washing station, bicycle storage and advice on cycling routes.

name: Hotel Manaus
address: Carrer De Josep Maria Quadrado, 7, 07600 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: A few minutes walk to Majorcas Palma Beach and in a quiet area surrounded by woods, this hotel has a charming bar and restaurant to relax in as well as an outdoor pool. Enjoy a quiet read in the inviting lounge. Grab a snack from the cafe and enjoy wholesome meals in the Manaus's restaurant. During the summer months, sit back and watch the show-cooking. Spend afternoons soaking up the sunshine by the Manaus's pool and hot tub. Make the pleasant, 600-m stroll down to Palma Beach where you can have a refreshing dip in the Mediterranean and lie back on the sandy shores.

name: The Hype Beachhouse
address: Carrer de la Grua 2, 07608 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located 100 metres from Playa de Palma Beach, The Hype Beachhouse offers a rooftop pool, and air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The units come with tiled floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The restaurant at the aparthotel serves Italian cuisine. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings. Can Pastilla Beach is less than 1 km from The Hype Beachhouse, while Cala Estancia Beach is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 2 km from the accommodation.

name: Isla Mallorca & Spa
address: Pilar Juncosa, 7, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Isla Mallorca & Spa is located in a quiet area of Palma de Mallorca. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, spa and chic rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel’s wellness spa has a sauna, Hammam and steam bath, and massages and other treatments are available. Use of the spa comes at an additional cost. The hotel also has a gym. The hotel's restaurant, Tragaluz, offers a range of Mallorcan, Spanish and international dishes. It has a terrace and large windows with views of the garden. The hotel is set in the residential area of Son Armadams, between the Pueblo Español and Bellver Castle. The seaside promenade is just 5 minutes’ walk away. Free parking is available in the streets near the hotel. The hotel reception offers car and bicycle rental service.

name: Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites
address: Calle Coral, 4, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Just 1 km from Alcudia’s historic centre, Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites boutique hotel has Wi-Fi access, a swimming pool and free spa access. Rooms and suites features Nordic-style dècor and come with air conditioning, wardrobe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and pool towels. Some feature a seating area and a hot tub. Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites has a terrace with loungers for sunbathing. The spa includes a sauna, hamman and hot tub. The à la carte restaurant offers international and vegetarian dishes and has outdoor seating. Bordoy Alcudia Port Suites is set a short distance from the harbour. Just 2 km away you will find a shopping centre and an ancient Roman amphitheatre.

name: Puig de Ros d'Alt
address: Camino Sa Torre, s/n, 07620 S'Arenal, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo
address: Carretera Palma-Andratx, Km 20, 07160 Peguera, Mallorca
description: Hilton Mallorca Galatzo is a tourist destination that prioritizes the well-being of its guests from arrival to departure. A restorative retreat where you can enjoy the Mediterranean climate and lifestyle during your stay on the island, whether it is a leisure or business trip. In the heart of nature, 20 minutes from Palma de Mallorca and 10 minutes from the marinas of Andratx and Puerto Portals, its 54,000 square meters of gardens promise guests relaxation and direct contact with the sea thanks to memorable views and the nearby beach of Paguera.Hilton

name: Hotel Seramar Comodoro Playa
address: Carrer Cala Blanca, 9, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Seramar Hotel Comodoro Playa is located on Son Matias Beach in Palma Nova, 15 minutes’ drive from Palma. It offers an outdoor pool, and rooms with private balconies and sea views. The air-conditioned rooms at the Seramar Hotel Comodoro Playa feature parquet floors and modern décor, a private bathroom and satellite TV. Seramar Hotel Comodoro Playa features a table tennis table and a 24-hour reception. Wi-Fi is available and free throughout the hotel. The hotel’s large restaurant serves international food. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The lively resort of Magaluf is 1' minutes’ walk away. You can drive to Palma Airport in around 20 minutes.

name: Hotel Son Caliu Spa Oasis
address: Avenida De Son Caliu 8, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Son Caliu Hotel Spa Oasis is conveniently located in the popular Calvia area. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, postal service, 24-hour front desk are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, additional bathroom, additional toilet, private pool, internet access wireless (complimentary). To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as yoga room, hot tub, fitness center, sauna, golf course (on site). No matter what your reasons are for visiting Majorca, Son Caliu Hotel Spa Oasis will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Zoetry Mallorca Wellness & Spa
address: Camí De Sa Torre 8,7, 07609 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Located in the countryside in southeast Mallorca, this impressive 14th-century country house has 3 restaurants, 3 bars, 2 swimming pools, and a spa centre. It offers large rooms with a flat-screen TV and Wi-Fi access. One out of the three restaurants, is runned by michelin star chef Andreu Genestra. The property has two accommodation areas, Tramuntana and Ponent, featuring luxurious rooms and suites, as well as historic buildings such as the windmill, dating back to the fifteenth century, and the neo-Gothic chapel "La Gran Cristiana". The air-conditioned rooms at Zoetry Mallorca Wellnes & Spa Mallorca feature smart, modern décor. They are equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Zoetry Mallorca also offers yoga retreats, tennis courts, a football pitch and a running track. Zoetry Mallorca Wellnes & Spa is just 10 minute’ drive from the beautiful beaches of south Mallorca. Palma Airport is 22 km away. Endless-Privileges®Inclusions: such as early check in and late check out (subject to availability), mini bar daily replenished, personalised concierge services, gourmet à la carte dining options with an assortment of organic food and beverage selections, room service offered 24-hours with a selection of dishes, wines and beverages

name: Santa Ponsa Pins
address: Avinguda Del Rei Jaume I 115, Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: This Mediterranean-style hotel is set just 300 metres from the beach. It offers an outdoor swimming pool with sun terrace and comfortable rooms with a private terrace. The air-conditioned rooms at Santa Ponsa Pins feature functional décor. Each includes a rental safe, plasma satellite TV, a telephone and private bathroom with hairdryer. Breakfast is served in the hotel’s buffet restaurant and there is a cafeteria. Guests can relax in the TV and reading lounge, play pool and get tourist information from the 24-hour reception. Santa Ponsa Pins features, a meetings room and a bicycle garage. Santa Ponsa Pins is 5 minutes’ drive from Santa Ponsa Marina. There are numerous bars, restaurants and shops nearby and 3 golf courses within 10 minutes’ drive. The hotel is 6 km from lively Magaluf and Palma Nova and 18 km from Palma and its airport.

name: Son Julia Country House Hotel
address: Crta. De S'Arenal a Llucmajor, 07620 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: A historic 15th-century mansion, beautifully restored into a splendid luxury rural establishment, situated close to Palma de Mallorca and the Mediterranean Sea, and with state-of-the-art facilities and an indoor heated pool. In a truly remarkable location overlooking the surrounding countryside we offer spacious rooms and impressive suites, where original features have been kept wherever possible. Air-conditioned room include a flat-screen TV, and minibar. Their private bathrooms come with free toiletries, slippers and bathrobes. Find peace and tranquility in the lovely garden where children can play and you can relax in the Majorcan sunshine. Son Julia Country House & Spa Mallorca features gym, tennis court and spa, as well as 2 swimming pools. There are several golf courses nearby and the property arranges cycle tours of the island. The Sa Magrana Restaurant & Terrace offers creative Mediterranean dishes made using fresh produce and the wine list includes includes its own wine, son Julia. The restaurant features a sandstone arched roof and a terrace overlooking the estate´s vineyards. In the summer, there is live music on Thursdays.

name: Lago Garden Apart-Suites & Spa Hotel
address: Buen Paseo s/n, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Our stylishly decorated hotel is a quiet and welcoming haven, where you will find a perfect balance between sophistication and comfort. Lago Garden is a real oasis in Cala Ratjada, as it is surrounded by pleasant gardens which make a perfect setting for the tasteful reception area and terraces. Our hospitable staff are there to ensure all guests are pampered and well looked after.

name: Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only
address: Carrer Castell 3, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only is set directly in front of Cala Millor Beach, in eastern Majorca. The complex has outdoor and indoor swimming pools and a lovely garden. This modern complex offers comfortable rooms. Featuring plenty of natural light, each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a seating area. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Hipotels Bahia Cala Millor - Adults Only has a restaurant where guests can enjoy a meal. The hotel also offers 24-hour front desk service. The area is an ideal destination for beach and nature lovers as it is located next to the Natural Area Punta de n'Amer.

name: Hipotels Flamenco
address: Av. Sa Coma, 13, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Situated right on the beach front, this modern, family-friendly hotel has superb facilities including a great outdoor pool and well-equipped fitness centre. Free Wi-Fi is provided. Located in the popular Cala Millor, enjoy wonderful sea views. Make the most of the Flamenco’s location by visiting the popular beach where you can swim in the mild waters and practise a number of water-sports. Enjoy hearty meals in the Flamenco restaurant. You can help yourself to a great variety of hot and cold dishes which include both international and regional cuisine. Then sit back and let yourself be entertained by the Flamenco team which put on varied live-music shows. There is plenty to keep you active while staying at the Flamenco. Other than a refreshing swim in the outdoor pool, you can enjoy a challenging workout in the gym or join the fun activities organised by the entertainment team. After all this, head to the sauna and hot tub for a genuine relax.

name: Hipotels Hipocampo Playa
address: Avd. Sa Coma, 45, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront in Cala Millor, this hotel is perfect for a break in the sunshine. Unwind with a drink on a sun lounger before diving into the swimming pool. The 4-star Hipocampo Playa has a wide range of facilities, making it the ideal setting for a family beach holiday on beautiful Majorca. Children are entertained by the hotel’s activity team or play in the swimming pool or playground. Meanwhile, you can head to the sauna or hot tub for some much-needed relaxation. Choose between the golden sands and clear Mediterranean waters of the beach, or the comfort of the hotel sun terrace and attractive gardens. Here you can lie back whilst enjoying refreshing drinks and snacks from the poolside bar. If you feel active during your stay you can make use of the on-site gym. You will also find a variety of water sports along the local coastline, as well as a number of golf courses in the stunning Majorcan countryside.

name: Hotel Astoria Playa - Adults Only
address: Carrer Astoria, 07400 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: The modern, adults-only Hotel Astoria Playa is located in heart of the popular resort of Alcúdia, just 150 metres from the beach. It has 2 outdoor swimming pools, including one with a chill-out zone, and free Wi-Fi. Set in 4000 m² of gardens, the hotel has spacious sun terraces featuring 3 outdoor hot tubs and a poolside snack bar. The restaurant offers show cooking. The Astoria Playa Hotel also provides a seasonal programme entertainment with Live Dj during the day and live music in the evening several times each week. Hotel Astoria Playa Adults Only is equipped to welcome athletes. It offers special menus as well as treatments and massages. There is a bicycle repair shop. There is an array of things to do in the surroundings of the Hotel Astoria Alcudia, such as a range of water sports, cycletourism, aerial sports and a golf course. The promenade is lined with bar, restaurants and shops. Pool towels can be requested with no extra cost.

name: Hotel Tora
address: Carrer De Galatzo, 3, Peguera, Mallorca
description: Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in a common area. Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).#Mandatory fees: You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the local government and will be collected at the property. The tax is reduced by 50% after the 8th night of stay and children under 16 years of age are exempt. Other exemptions and reductions may apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 November - 30 April, EUR 0.55 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 0.28 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 May - 31 October, EUR 2.20 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 1.10 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional fees: The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.
