The Sant Cugat Shopping Centre is very close to the hotel, as are several parks and a hiking area such as the Torrent dels Alous. You can arrive Barcelona by train in only 30 minutes. From here you can reach: Camp Nou several parks Teatre Joventut Palau Blaugrana many restaurants & bars port of Barcelona Aquarium Maremagnum shopping centre Barceloneta district with its city beaches Barcelona-El Prat Airport (BCN) is only 31 km from the hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Gran Hotel La Florida
address: Ctra. Vallvidrera al Tibidabo, 83-93, 08035 Barcelona
description: Set on Tibidabo Hill, the 5-star Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento offers views over Barcelona and the Mediterranean Sea. Guests enjoy free access to the Spa. Rooms at La Florida feature free Wi-Fi access and 37-inch interactive plasma TVs. The bathrooms come with l’Occitane amenities, a bathtub and shower. Some also have a private balcony. Guests can admire the views from the La Florida’s panoramic terraces and gardens. The Spa by L'Occitane includes a stainless steel swimming pool, both indoor and outdoor. A hot tub, sauna, pressure showers and a range of fitness equipment are also available. The hotel’s restaurant serves gourmet Catalan, Spanish and Mediterranean dishes. There are also 2 bars.

name: Hotel Princesa Plaza Madrid
address: Princesa 40, 28008 Madrid
description: Princesa Plaza is situated in the west of Madrid, in the Argüelles District. Some of the elegant rooms at the hotel feature a large reproduction of a famous painting from the Museo del Prado. The hotel comes with the Holiday Gym fitness centre, featuring a small indoor pool where aquagym classes are organised. The pool is available for guests over 16. Complimentary fitness classes are offerred, as well as cardiovascular equipment. Rooms at the Princesa are spacious with large windows and come with a seating area. They have satellite TV and air conditioning. Princesa Plaza is close to Plaza España Square, Gran Via Avenue and the Royal Palace. It offers car rental and currency exchange services. The tour desk can provide useful information on the surrounding area. The hotel also gives information about a company that organizes shuttle service at an extra cost.

name: Hospes Puerta de Alcalá
address: Plaza de la Independencia 3, 28001 Madrid
description: The elegant Hospes Puerta de Alcalá is set next to Puerta de Alcalá, in Madrid’s Salamanca district. It offers free WiFi, great views of the Retiro Park and free access to the Bodyna Spa. The stylish rooms at Hospes Puerta de Alcalá come with a flat-screen TV, a bathrobe and special amenities. The Bodyna Spa area has 4 treatment rooms, a soundproofed relaxation room, a hammam, gym and a small relaxation pool. All guests have access to the spa. The Malvar Restaurant offers meals, tapas and a large terrace with views of the Puerta de Alcalá. Guests can also enjoy a drink or relax in the Patio Chill Out. Private parking is available onsite for an additional cost. An elegant 5-star hotel, Hospes Puerta de Alcalá is set in a historic building dating from 1883. The Prado, the Reina Sofía Museum and Cibeles Fountain are within a short walk.

name: Hotel Maydrit Airport
address: Piragua 1, 28042 Madrid
description: Set 200 metres from Madrid’s El Capricho Metro Station, Hotel Maydrit Airport offers a free transfer service to Barajas Airport. Air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and minibar. The Maydrit’s à la carte restaurant serves creative international cuisine. Guests can also enjoy snacks and tapas in the café-bar. The Hotel Maydrit Airport is 500 metres from Madrid’s Juan Carlos I Park. Madrid city centre is less than 30 minutes away by Metro, and there is good access to the A2 and M40 Motorways.

name: Hotel Villa De Barajas
address: Avda De Logrono 331, 28042 Madrid
description: Hotel Villa de Barajas is set near Madrid Barajas Airport and the IFEMA Congress Centre. The rooms have free WiFi. Rooms in the hotel are non-smoking, decorated in warm colours and have parquet floors. All rooms have flat-screen satellite TV and air conditioning. Barajas Metro Station is just 250 metres from the hotel. This offers easy access to the historic centre of Madrid. The hotel offers a good-value continental breakfast, and there is a café.

name: Novotel Madrid Campo de Las Naciones
address: Calle De Amsterdam, 3, 28042 Madrid
description: Enjoy the modern facilities at the Novotel Madrid Campo de las Naciones hotel. In a quiet area, the hotel boasts excellent access to Puerta del Sol, 30 minutes away by metro, and the IFEMA exhibition center, a 5-minute walk away. It is home to nine meeting rooms and rooms that boast a contemporary design with every comfort, including complimentary WIFI. After a day playing golf on the adjoining course, relax at the poolside bar or in the restaurant and enjoy the Mediterranean cuisine served at Novotel.accorhotels.com

name: Silken Puerta Madrid
address: Juan Rizi, 5, 28027 Madrid
description: This modern hotel, with a gym, is a 5-minute drive from Madrid’s Barajas Airport and IFEMA Convention Centre. Located next to the A2 Motorway, Silken Puerta Madrid is convenient for transport links. The 146 Bus stops in the next street and takes 30 minutes to central Madrid. The 114 bus will take you to the Avenida de América interchange station. Spacious air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed and have satellite TV. There is a trouser press, safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and luxury amenities. The hotel's La Orza restaurant offers fresh à la carte cuisine, a daily set menu and an extensive wine list. There is also a café where you can choose from a varied menu at lunch or dinner. There is a 24-hour reception with tourist information. On-site parking is offered for an extra charge. Cancha de Golf Alcalá 525 Golf Course is 3 km away.

name: Exe Zarzuela Park
address: Calle Dario Aparicio 32, Madrid
description: The Exe Zarzuela Park enjoys a peaceful setting, surrounded by beautiful gardens and only 6 km from Madrid city centre. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and modern rooms with air conditioning. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel and there is free on-site parking. The hotel also operates a 24-hour reception for guests’ convenience. Paddle-tennis courts are available. A 50 square metres meeting room is also available for holding meetings or banquets. The restaurant at Exe Zarzuela Park serves creative fusion cuisine. During summer months guests can enjoy meals on the terrace. Moncloa is just a 10-minute bus ride away from Exe Zarzuela Park, with a bus stop directly in front of the hotel. Madrid Adolfo Suarez Airport is 25 minutes' drive from the property.

name: Pullman Madrid Airport & Feria
address: Avenida de la Capital de Espana 10, 28042 Madrid
description: Pullman Madrid Airport & Feria is in front of the Palacio de Congresos and just a few steps from IFEMA - Feria de Madrid. Its strategic location makes it perfect for a trip to the capital for business or pleasure. Enjoy its leisure spaces, like the terrace or pool, the excellent cuisine of the restaurant El Patio or Cosmopolitan Bar's special cocktails. Book and toast with us at this upscale hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Ilunion Malaga
address: Paseo Marítimo Antonio Machado, 10, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Set in a contemporary eco-efficient building within the port area and overlooking the sea, Ilunion Málaga offers an on-site restaurant, wellness area with indoor pool, and a fitness centre. Maria Zambrano Train Station is just 5 minutes' walk away. Featuring wooden floors and decorated in warm colours, the spacious rooms at Ilunion Malaga have air conditioning and free WiFi. They include a 32-inch flat-screen satellite TV and a free safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Many rooms also offer sea views and some have a private terrace. Daily breakfast is served in the restaurant, while an à la carte menu is available at lunch and dinner. Room service can be ordered from the bar-cafeteria during the day. They all include special products for celiac and food intolerant guests. The wellness area includes a sauna, sensation showers and heated loungers. Beauty treatments are available. There is also an indoor swimming pool, which during the summer months is turned into an outdoor pool. The Picasso Museum is a 20-minute walk from Ilunion Málaga, while Malaga Historic Centre is just 10 minutes away. Private underground parking is available at extra cost. The nearby Maria Zambrano Train Station is 500 metres from the hotel, offering direct connection to Malaga Airport and the rest of the Costa del Sol. Málaga Airport is 9 km away. Pets are allowed. A supplement of 25 EUR per pet per night applies. Please confirm that this is a pet-friendly reservation and call the hotel to check availability and ensure that the room is fully stocked. Pets are only allowed in the pet-friendly double room. Pets are not allowed in the other rooms. Upon arrival at the property, guests will be provided with access rules, which they must read and accept.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Malaga
address: Avenida Velazquez 126, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Settle into a comfortable and spacious guest room or suite at this Malaga hotel, equipped with everything you need to relax and stay productive. Stay connected with complimentary WiFi at the well-lit, ergonomic desk. Feel at home with a mini-refrigerator, adjustable air-conditioning, tea/coffee making facilities, and a spacious bathroom with complimentary toiletries. Browse Freeview channels on the flat-screen TV, and get a great night's sleep in the plush bed, which is dressed in clean, crisp linens. Host your next corporate event or social function at this Malaga hotel with 300 sq. m. meeting space, including a divisible ballroom - ideal for important business meetings, stylish cocktail receptions and unforgettable weddings for up to 250 people. Find everything you need to stay productive in the 24-hour business center, and enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel and in every guest room. Make the most of your leisure time at this welcoming new hotel in Malaga. Exercise with the latest cardio and resistance equipment in the complimentary 24-hour fitness center, or plunge into the sparkling outdoor pool. Dine on Spanish specialties and international favorites in the relaxed Garden Grille restaurant. Unwind in our stylish Lounge, or enjoy a selection of cocktails, beers, wines and light bites on the sunny outdoor terrace. Buy snacks, drinks and sundries at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry®, or order something tasty and convenient from our room service menu.Hilton

name: Holiday Inn Express Malaga Airport
address: Avenida de Velazquez 294 Salida, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Smart Malaga hotel next to Malaga-Costa del Sol Airport, with breakfast and WiFi included Bus line A takes five minutes from Malaga Airport to Holiday Inn Express® Malaga Airport hotel. Present your ticket at the reception and get one-way ticket per person reimbursed. Bus line A connects to Malaga's old town. Harbor Boulevard or Torremolinos and Benalmádena beaches are a short drive away, and the nearby MA21 motorway makes access to the exciting Andalusia region easy. Plaza Mayor mall and Centro Comercial Málaga Nostrum leisure centres are also at hand. Business guests are close to Polígono Guadalhorce, Polígono Villarosa industrial areas and trade fairs at Palacio de Ferias y Congresos in Malaga and Torremolinos. At this hotel, you can enjoy: - Free WiFi - Free Parking (subject to availability) - Continental Express Start breakfast buffet included in the room rate Relax in the comfortable rooms, enjoying free tea and coffee, while watching movies on the flat-screen TV. Family rooms offer sofa beds, ideal for children. Kids under 17 years can stay free when sharing their parents' room. The inclusive continental breakfast buffet offers regional favourites, and dinner is served daily. Early bird breakfast is served from 4am with a limited selection. Enjoy a drink with friends at the bar, lobby or the lovely sunny terrace.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Sol Guadalmar
address: Moby Dick, 2 - Urbanization Guadalmar, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Surrounded by attractive gardens, the Sol Guadalmar features 2 outdoor swimming pools for adults and children. All air-conditioned rooms enjoy free Wi-Fi and views over the Bay of Málaga from the balcony. The hotel has direct access to Guadalmar and Bajondillo Beaches. Guests have free access to the tennis court and indoor heated pool. For a supplement, you can use the gym, sauna and hot tub. Sol Guadalmar Hotel serves a breakfast buffet. The Cenachero Restaurant offers a buffet dinner with show cooking. You can enjoy cocktails on the terrace at Bar Picasso. Málaga Airport is 3 km from Sol Guadalmar and the historic centre of Málaga is 5 km away. Horse riding, water sports and excursions can be arranged by the hotel. A bus to Malaga City Centre stops outside the hotel.

name: Hotel Zen Airport
address: Camino de Los Fresnos, 9, 29620 Torremolinos, Andalusia
description: Featuring a heated outdoor pool and 2 terraces, Hotel Zen Airport is located in Torremolinos. This hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. A free airport and beach shuttle service is available. Rooms at Hotel Zen Airport are built around an interior patio. Some offer modern design and décor, and others are in the classic Andalusian part of the hotel. All are en suite and include a TV. Hotel Zen Airport is surrounded by tropical gardens and offers views of the sea. Guests can enjoy snacks out on the terrace and drinks at the pool bar. There is a restaurant pizzeria open all year round. A gym, games room and children´s play area are available for guests. The hotel is just 300 metres from La Colina Train Station and 4 stops from Málaga Airport, 4 km away. There is a bus stop within 50 metres. The beaches of the Costa del Sol are 1.5 km away. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

name: Hotel Plaza Del Castillo
address: Calle De Fedra (Calle Albania 3-5), 29196 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Featuring a unique medieval design, Hotel Plaza Del Castillo has a distinctive façade resembling a castle and beautiful ornate gardens. Its rooms have air conditioning, heating and a minibar. Featuring stained-glass windows, stone walls and medieval paintings, Plaza del Castillo offers several banquet rooms and a restaurant that serves both traditional and creative cuisine. Room service is available for a surcharge. There is a 24-hour reception and free parking. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout. Hotel Plaza Del Castillo is conveniently located between the A-7 and the A-357 motorways, only 2 minutes’ drive from Mercamálaga wholesale market. The Congress Palace and the Cortijo Torres Fairground are less than 10 minutes by car. The city centre is 10 km away, while Malaga Airport is 12 km away. A bus stop located just 300 metres away connects you with the city centre and Malagueta Beach.

name: Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito
address: Avenida Del Lido S/N, Málaga, Andalusia
description: The Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito is situated in Torremolinos, 100 meters from Playamar and Bajondillo beaches and the seaside promenade. A swimming pool, hot tub and free hammam are featured. Their air-conditioned and heated rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, kettle, coffee maker, safe and minibar. The private bathroom includes hair dryer, bathrobe, shower and free toiletries. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, sun terrace, a hot tub and a turkish bath. Their buffet restaurant offers a range of culinary options. Free WiFi is featured. The Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito is within easy reach of all kinds of attractions, places of interest and the renowned nightlife. Malaga Airport is 12 minutes drive away.

name: Hotel Málaga Nostrum Airport
address: Calle Herman Hesse, No.17, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: NEWLY REFURBISHED HOTEL Hotel Málaga Nostrum is located in a key point of Málaga, just 5 minutes by car from the airport, 10 minutes from the center and 10 minutes from the beach. We offer a unique experience aiding rest and relaxation. Our modern and bright rooms have free Wi-Fi, Smart TV with access to Netflix, air conditioning, desk and minibar. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and toiletries. Discover our breakfasts at Global Restaurant & Lounge, located on the ground floor of the hotel, which also houses our Sport Bar and a large leisure terrace. On the 4th floor you can enjoy the views of the sky of Malaga from our pool, and a splendid Chill Out area. We have a 24-hour reception and covered parking for €5/night for all our clients. Dogs are allowed according to availability with an extra cost of €15/night. Dogs weighing more than 10 kg will not be allowed.

name: Parador de Malaga Golf
address: Autovía MA-20 Málaga-Algeciras Salida 1, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: This luxury hotel blends great golfing with an authentic Andalusian feel and fantastic sea views. Come and enjoy a round beneath the warm, Mediterranean sunshine of the Costa del Sol. The Parador de Málaga Golf sits beside its own magnificent and historic 18-hole golf course. Originally dating from 1925, this course was designed by Tom Simpson, who also built the courses at Muirfield and Turnberry. It also includes 3 putting greens and 2 approach greens. After a round in the sunshine, refresh yourself with a dip in the outdoor swimming pool. Then head to the restaurant to try the delicious local specialities on offer. The hotel building itself is a fine example of Andalusian architecture. Its interior is full of fashionable, contemporary design features which create a unique feel. A seasonal outdoor pool is featured. Plaza Mayor shopping centre can be found 500 metres from the property while Malaga town centre is 10 km away. Malaga Airport is 4 km away from the property.

name: Elcano
address: Avd. Juan Sebastian Elcano 103, 29017 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located just 250 metres from the beach in Málaga’s eastern district of Pedregalejo, this hotel provides a peaceful setting for your stay in the capital of the Costa del Sol. Free WiFi is available throughout. The Elcano lies a 10-minute journey from the historic centre of this Andalusian port city. The nearby seafront promenade is also a great place to sample the city’s famous seafood cuisine. The hotel’s interior blends cheerful colors with charming traditional furnishings in wrought iron or attractive woods. Outside, the terracotta and whitewashed buildings create an authentically Andalusian feel. The hotel’s glassed terrace provides a great place to enjoy a quiet coffee or beer with a book. A natural Andalusian breakfast is offered at the property. A bike rental service is available. El Candado Nautical and Golf Club is 3 km away. Málaga city centre is 12 minutes' drive from the hotel. A-7 Motorway is a 3-minute drive away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 20 minutes's drive from the hotel.

name: Moon Dreams Calabahia
address: Calle Manuel Fernandez Moreno 6-7, 29720 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located in Cala del Moral, Moon Dreams Calahabia features a modern sun terrace with swimming pool. This hotel is set 100 metres from the Cala del Moral Beach. The spacious rooms at this property include a flat-screen TV, safe, desk, fridge, and free internet connection. Each private bathroom comes with free toiletries, a bath, and hairdryer. The property has free WiFi in the reception area and free wired internet in the rooms. There is an outdoor swimming pool available for guests. The property also offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and ticket services. Málaga Airport is a 20-minute drive from Moon Dreams Calahabia, and Málaga City Centre is 15 km away.

name: Rincón Sol
address: Avenida Del Mediterraneo, 174, Málaga, Andalusia
description: Rincón Sol is set at the beachfront of Rincón de la Victoria. It offers a range of leisure facilities such as a restaurant and cafeteria, a nightclub and a seasonal beach bar. Air-conditioned rooms at Rincón Sol are modern and spacious, featuring a private terrace with views of the promenade, the main street or the sea. They have a minibar, a satellite TV and a private bathroom, as well as free Wi-Fi and a safe. Guests can rent bikes onsite, and activities such as golf, tennis and paddle tennis can be practiced on the area. Other facilities include meeting and banquet rooms. Set on the Axarquía Route, this hotel is 10 km away from Málaga. Private parking is offered for an extra cost.

name: Hotel Best Siroco
address: Carril del Siroco, s/n, 29630 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Hotel Best Siroco is situated just 250 metres from Torre Bermeja Beach. Set in gardens, this hotel has 2 seasonal outdoor swimming pools and rooms with balconies. Hotel Best Siroco has brightly decorated rooms with wooden floors and furnishings. Each room has a TV and air conditioning. Free WiFi is available. Buffet meals and Spanish dishes are prepared and served in Best Siroco’s restaurant with its show kitchen. Guests can enjoy a drink in the terrace bar, where there is free WiFi access. Gluten-free food is available. Facilities include a gym, and a Turkish bath and sauna are available at an extra cost. Hotel Best Siroco is just 10 minutes’ walk from Torre Bermeja Marina and Torrequebrada Golf Course is approximately 3 km away.

name: Sunset Beach Club Hotel Apartments
address: Av. Del Sol, 5, Benalmádena, 29630 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Sunset Beach Club Hotel Apartments are located on the shores of the Mediterranean Sea, and feature 2 large outdoor pools, and 2 children’s pools. Facilities include 6 seasonal bars and restaurants, a large supermarket, and free wi-fi. All Apartments at the Sunset Beach Club have a balcony or terrace, fully equipped kitchenette, individually controlled air-conditioning/heating, satellite TV, and safe. A hair & beauty salon and fitness centre are also available (fees apply). Free guest activities and entertainment are offered all year round. Guests can enjoy hot buffet breakfasts and dinners inside the Oasis Restaurant. A la carte lunches and dinners, afternoon snacks and cocktails, are available at La Terraza terrace restaurant. The Panorama Bar boasts spectacular sea views, and shows live international sports on TV.

name: Fay Victoria Beach
address: Avenida Del Mediterraneo, 230, 29730 Rincón de la Victoria, Andalusia
description: Situated on the beachfront in Rincón de la Victoria, The Fay Victoria Beach Hotel belongs to Añoreta Golf, a golf course located just 2.5 km from the Hotel where you can enjoy special conditions. Hotel Fay Victoria Beach’s terrace café is set directly on the seafront promenade. Rooms at the Hotel Fay Victoria Beach have wooden floors and bright décor. They include satellite TV, a rental safe and a bathroom with a hairdryer. Information about the region is available from the hotel’s 24-hour reception desk. Hotel Fay Victoria Beach is located on the Costa del Sol, a 5-minute drive from the A7 Motorway. Málaga city centre is 15 km away, while Málaga Airport is within a 30-minute drive.

name: Camping Torremolinos
address:
7.4
Good
152 reviews
description: Set a 10-minute walk from the beach, Camping Torremolinos offers air-conditioned bungalows and mobile homes with a private patio and TV. The campsite features a bar and a restaurant. Some bungalows or mobile homes have a bathroom and a kitchen. Camping Torremolinos offers free WiFi throughout its premises. Malaga Airport is 4 km from the campsite and Malaga city centre is a 10-minute drive away. You can reach Aqualand Water Park and Plaza Mayor Shopping Centre in a 5-minute drive. Free parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Complejo Los Rosales
address: Urbanización El Olivar, Avenida Ricardo Gross, 8, 29620 Torremolinos, Andalusia
description: Hotel Complejo Los Rosales is located in the El Olivar residential estate, just 5 minutes’ drive from Málaga Airport. It has an outdoor pool and a multi-sports court. The air-conditioned rooms at Los Rosales feature a private terrace with views of the sea and the airport. Each one comes with free Wi-Fi, a TV and a private bathroom with a bath. tThe hotel offers traditional Spanish food during July and August.There is also a snack bar open all year and a daily buffet breakfast is available. A shuttle service to Playamar beach is available upon request subject to availability. Hotel Complejo Los Rosales is 300 metres from a bus stop which connects you with central Málaga, which is 12 km away. You can drive to the beach and Torremolinos town centre in 5 minutes. Shopping centers are within 15 minutes walk of the property.

name: Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida De Gran Canaria 24, Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Set overlooking the sea, the adults-only Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only is an ideal accommodation for spending a relaxing break in the sun on the island of Gran Canaria. Lie back and soak up the sun on one of the loungers or hammocks surrounding the complex’s year-round heated pool. There is also a free spa centre and fitness suite on site where you can enjoy a range of treatments or a relaxing massage for a surcharge. The on-site restaurant and bar, The Club, offers a buffet breakfast and a more formal sit-down meal in the evening. After dining, you can sit back with a drink in the poolside bar or in the rooftop chill out. The rooms in the Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only boast balconies or terraces with views of Puerto Rico and the sea. They all have a kitchenette and free WiFi.

name: Servatur Terrazamar Suite & Sun Suite
address: Avda de las Palmeras 5- 8, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: This large and well-equipped apartment complex is situated in the resort of Puerto Rico, in the south of Gran Canaria – ideal for a fun-filled holiday in the sun. Terrazamar Sun Suite is built on a valley side and has terraces on various levels offering great views of the valley and the Atlantic Ocean. You can also choose to relax and sunbathe on the large private terrace of your own apartment. Take a dip in the large on-site swimming pool or lie back in comfort on the sun loungers. You can also get active by playing a game of tennis on the complex’s courts. Use the Terrazamar as a base to visit the famous beaches of Puerto Rico, just over a kilometre from the complex.

name: Gloria Palace Amadores Thalasso & Hotel
address: La Palma, 2, 35139 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Gloria Palace Amadores is set on a cliff top, between Gran Canaria’s Puerto Rico and Amadores Beaches. This luxury spa hotel offers 2 outdoor pools and spectacular Atlantic Ocean views. Gloria Palace, one of the largest thalasotheraphy centres in Europe, offers a seawater pool, massage and various treatments. There is a sauna, Turkish bath and physiotherapy pool. Air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony with sea views. There is satellite TV, and you can hire the safe and minibar. Guests have access to free Wi-Fi in their room and throughout the hotel. Tennis coaching is available on the floodlit tennis court. There is a gym, and you can play table tennis, bowls, archery and darts. Children have their own swimming pool, playground and mini-club. Evening shows are provided for both adults and children. Amadores has a buffet restaurant with show cooking and nightly themed buffets are offered. There are several bars, including a piano bar and pool bar. Gloria Palace has a 24-hour reception and offers car hire. Free parking is offered.

name: Vistaflor Puerto Plata
address: Avenida de la Cornisa 7, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Vistaflor Puerto Plata offers accommodation set in Mogán, less than 1 km from Playa de Puerto Rico and 2.2 km from Amadores Beach. Free WiFi is offeredthroughout the property. Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchenette, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Some units feature a terrace and/or a balcony with garden views. The aparthotel offers 3-star accommodation with a solarium and year-round outdoor pool. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Vistaflor Puerto Plata, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Anfi Tauro Golf Course is 4.4 km from the accommodation, while Yumbo Centre is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 44 km from Vistaflor Puerto Plata.

name: Grupotel Revoli
address: Av. Mogan,11, 35140 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Set in Puerto Rico de Gran Canaria, 800 metres from Playa de Puerto Rico and 1.8 km from Amadores Beach, Grupotel Revoli offers accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a garden and a terrace. All self-catered units feature tiled floors and are fitted with a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box, an equipped kitchen with a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower. A toaster, a fridge and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Continental and vegetarian breakfast options are available every morning at the aparthotel. Grupotel Revoli offers 4-star accommodation with a public bath. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy table tennis on site, or go cycling or hiking in the surroundings. Playa de Tauro is 2.8 km from Grupotel Revoli, while Anfi Tauro Golf Course is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 44 km from the aparthotel.

name: Holiday Club Playa Amadores
address: Avenida Minstra Anna Lindh 1, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: With Amadores Beach reachable in 200 metres, Holiday Club Playa Amadores offers accommodation, a restaurant, pool with a view, a terrace and a bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Offering sea or pool views, each unit comes with a kitchen, a satellite flat-screen TV and DVD player, outdoor furniture, a washing machine and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and bathrobes. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The aparthotel offers 5-star accommodation with a solarium. A car rental service is available at Holiday Club Playa Amadores. Playa de Tauro is 800 metres from the accommodation, while Playa de Puerto Rico is 1.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria, 46 km from Holiday Club Playa Amadores, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Servatur Puerto Azul
address: Avda. de la Cornisa, 13, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: When you stay at Servatur Puerto Azul in Mogan, you'll be by the ocean, a 3-minute drive from Amadores Beach and 8 minutes from Puerto Rico Marina. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Holiday Club Vista Amadores
address: Calle Montana Clara,12, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Holiday Club Vista Amadores features a sauna and a fitness room, as well as accommodation with free WiFi and a kitchen in Amadores. The aparthotel offers a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hair dryer and bath or shower. A dishwasher and microwave are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Some units have a balcony. A Full English/Irish breakfast is available daily at Holiday Club Vista Amadores. Guests can enjoy a meal at the in-house restaurant, which specialises in local cuisine. The accommodation offers a year-round outdoor pool. A car rental service is available at Holiday Club Vista Amadores. Playa del Ingles is 15 km from the aparthotel. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 36 km from Holiday Club Vista Amadores.

name: La Laguna Gran Hotel
address: C/ Nava y Grimón, 18, 38201 San Cristóbal de La Laguna, Tenerife
description: Located in La Laguna and with the famous Leal Theatre within 600 metre. La Laguna Gran Hotel provides express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. We also provide a restaurant, the property, fitness centre and a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service including organizing tours for guests. Each room at La Laguna Gran Hotel has a wardrobe, desk, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. We offer continental and buffet breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation. La Laguna Gran Hotel offers a terrace. We have a section supporting Bike friendly enthusiasts. Catedral San Cristobal de La Laguna is 1.3 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Tenerife Norte Airport, 5 km from La Laguna Gran Hotel.

name: Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa
address: Mar Mediterraneo 1, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Set 800 metres from Gran Canaria’s Maspalomas Beach, this luxury complex features a spa, casino and heated lagoon-style swimming pools set in tropical gardens. Each room has a private balcony. Rooms at the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa are spacious and elegant, with marble floors and air conditioning. They all have satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bathrobes. The Costa Meloneras Resort’s stylish Ambassador restaurant serves nouvelle cuisine. The complex also offers buffet restaurants, cafés and a cocktail bar. The Lopesan Spa offers a hydrotherapy circuit and salt grotto. A wide range of wellness treatments is available. The complex also features an artificial beach and sun terraces with loungers. Situated next to Maspalomas Lighthouse, the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort is a 10-minute walk from Maspalomas Dunes. The hotel offers a free shuttle service to Meloneras Golf Course, just 1.5km away.

name: Kumara Serenoa By Lopesan Hotels
address: Touroperador Fritidsresor 4, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Featuring a garden, Kumara Serenoa By Lopesan Hotels is set in Maspalomas and is 3.6 km from Aqualand. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with an outdoor pool. Maspalomas Lighthouse is 2.4 km away. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe, flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. All rooms feature a terrace and views of the garden. Minibar and breakfast in the room services are available for an extra charge. Guests will find a buffet restaurant at the property. Kumara Serenoa By Lopesan Hotels offers a children's playground. Palmitos Park is 10 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 28 km from the property.

name: Hotel Riu Palace Oasis
address: Plaza De Las Palmeras 2, 35106 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Hotel Riu Palace Oasis is located on Maspalomas Beach and offers direct access to the beach, large lush garden, 3 heated pools and a spa center. The hotel also offers a gym and evening entertainment. There is also a children's pool, playground and a RiuLand Kids club. Air-conditioned rooms come with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower, double sink and vanity mirror. A hairdryer, bathrobe and free toiletries are provided. Playa del Ingles is 6 km from the accommodation, while Maspalomas is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 36 km from Hotel Riu Palace Oasis.

name: Bull Vital Suites & Spa
address: Avenida De Gran Canaria, 80, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: BULL Vital Suites & Spa offers luxury accommodation next to Maspalomas Golf Course, in southern Gran Canaria. The complex has 2 outdoor pools, gardens and 1 free spa entry per person per stay. Each spacious room features a private balcony or terrace with views over the golf course, Maspalomas Dunes or the pool. They come with air conditioning, 2 satellite TVs, free WiFi, safe for hire, and minibar. The spacious junior suites include a separate seating area and kitchenette. The bathroom has a bath or shower, bathrobe, hairdryer, and beach towels. The Vital Suites features a Roman-style spa, with a sauna, thermal pools, and steam bath. Massage and beauty treatments are available, and there is a gym. The property also offers medical services and rehabilitation treatments, and a personal trainer can be requested. The complex offers a restaurant and a poolside bar.

name: Hotel Faro, a Lopesan Collection Hotel - Adults Only
address: Plaza de Colon, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Situated by the lighthouse that gives it its name, the hotel overlooks the sea and is just a few strides from the southern end of Maspalomas beach. The property has one swimming pool included and there is also a second pool on the rooftop which is subject to additional charges. Thanks to the hotel’s unbeatable location, it offers spectacular views over a 6 km stretch of sand dunes and the ocean that bathes them. This 5-star hotel is flooded by daylight and has a functional and urban interior and décor. Close by there are 3, 18-hole golf courses, where golfers can enjoy their sport 365 days a year and benefit from the special services this establishment makes available. The hotel is well known for its excellent cuisine: in both the buffet restaurant and the à-la-carte restaurant you will find a high level of quality and service.

name: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace
address: Mar Caspio, 5, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace is next to Meloneras Beach and Golf Course in southern Gran Canaria. It has 3 swimming pools, a sun terrace, spa and striking design inspired by Antoni Gaudí. The rooms at the H10 Meloneras feature tiled floors and typical Mediterranean décor. They all come with a private balcony and satellite TV. The hotel’s Tamadaba buffet restaurant offers show cooking and international food. Gaudí Restaurant serves à la carte meals, and there is also a poolside bar-café and 2 other bars. Leisure facilities at the H10 Gran Canaria include tennis courts and a mini club for children. The lively resort of Playa del Inglés is around 10 minutes’ drive from the Hotel Playa Meloneras. Gran Canaria Airport is just 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: Elba Palace Golf & Vital Hotel
address: Carretera De Jandia, Km. 11, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: With swimming pools, tennis courts and an elegant restaurant, the Elba Palace Golf & Vital Hotel - Adults Only is located in Caleta del Fuste and within a golf resort. This hotel features wooden balconies and is located 800 metres from the beach. Each spacious room at Elba Palace Golf & Vital Hotel - Adults Only features free WiFi, air conditioning, and a private balcony. All have satellite TV, minibar, safe, coffee and tea facilities, and pillow menu. The large bathroom comes with a separate bath and shower, hairdryer, and bathrobes. The Elba’s impressive building boasts traditional Canarian architecture. It has tall palm trees, tiled floors and a grand chandelier. Guests can relax on the beautiful central courtyard. You can find a café, an a la carte restaurant, and a bar within the property. Vegetarian and low-calories options are available to guests.

name: Atlantic Mirage Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Eucaliptus, 4, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Located in Puerto de la Cruz, 1.5 KM from Martiánez Beach, Hotel Atlantic Mirage Suites & SPA offers an all year round swimming pool and free WiFi. All air-conditioned (cold/warm air subject to seasonality)rooms feature a balcony with sea view. Guests will find a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer and a flat TV with Satellite Channels. All units include a seating area with a sofa. The buffet restaurant Mirage offers a wide range of international options. Guests can also have a drink at the bar. Jardín Botánico and Puerto de la Cruz city centre are 1 Km from the property. The rearest airport is airport is Tenerife Norte Airport, 26 Km from the property.

name: H10 Atlantic Sunset
address: Avenida Adeje 300 Playa Paraiso, 38678 Callao Salvaje, Tenerife
description: No description found

name: Corallium Dunamar by Lopesan Hotels - Adults Only
address: Calle Helsinki, 8, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: The Corallium Dunamar by Lopesan Hotel, recently refurbished, is 200 metres from Playa del Inglés Beach, in southern Gran Canaria. Surrounded by tropical gardens, it features an outdoor pool complex. Set in a modern, pyramid-shaped building, the Dunamar Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. The minibar and safe can be rented, and most rooms have a private balcony. Regional and international cuisine is offered in the hotel restaurant, and there are 2 poolside snack bars. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the lively Yumbo Centre. Maspalomas Dunes are 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and Maspalomas Golf Course is 2 km away.

name: Abora Interclub Atlantic By Lopesan Hotels
address: Calle Los Jazmines, 2, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This all-inclusive club is located in the higher part of San Agustín, nestled in a 10 acre park boasting fantastic panoramic views of the Atlantic and the vast Maspalomas sand dunes. The complex boasts 168 double rooms plus 240 family rooms with capacity for up to 4 people. Many have sea views, though those with views over the spacious gardens are not less privileged. In the gardens themselves it is always possible to find a spot to place a sun lounger and relax under the palm trees. All roms are equipped with direct telephone, Satellite TV, Safe, Sofa, Bathroom with bath and WC and Balcony or terrace. Traditional Sports enthusiasts area catered well at the club with multi-functional sports facilities including 4 tennis courts and sport grounds. You are also sure to be tempted by the nearby San Agustín beach or one of the 2 onsite outdoor pools, to cool off with a refreshing dip. The complex also boasts a first-class entertainment team that makes sure the day is full of games, group sports, music and evening shows. During the summer months, children have their own mini club and there is a special programme of activities for young teenagersWebBeds

name: Abora Buenaventura By Lopesan Hotels
address: C/ Ganigo, 6 Plaza De Ansite, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Abora Buenaventura by Lopesan Hotels is located 500 metres from the beach in Playa del Inglés, on Gran Canaria’s south coast. It has 2 outdoor pool surrounded by palm trees, a children's pool and a hot tub. Free WiFi is provided. A varied entertainment programme for adults and children is offered at the Abora Buenaventura. Guests can enjoy a gym for free. All rooms at the Abora Buenaventura have a private balcony with garden or pool views. There is a TV with free channels, and you can hire a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Abora Buenaventura by Lopesan Hotels has 1 buffet restaurant and a snack & go bar. There are also 2 poolside bars and 2 bars. There is a 24-hour reception offering car hire and currency exchange. The hotel has a beauty salon and various shops on-site.

name: Mur Neptuno Gran Canaria - Adults Only
address: Avenida Alfeceres Provisionales, 29, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Neptuno is an adults-only hotel, next to the Yumbo Shopping Centre, and 900 metres away from the beach Playa del Inglés. All air-conditioned rooms have free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a furnished balcony. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The hotel spa includes a sauna, Turkish bath and gym. The Neptuno's swimming pool is heated from October until April and live music can be enjoyed in the bar several times a week. There is a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. Maspalomas Golf course is 3 km away. You can hire a car and there is free on-site parking.

name: Bohemia Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida Estados Unidos, 28, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This hotel is located about 150 m from the beach. Guests will also find restaurants, bars and links to the public transport network around 150 m from the hotel. It lies 400 m from Yumbo, with its 2 shopping centres and nightspots and is just 500 m from the centre of Playa del Ingles. The hotel is 18 km from Vecindario. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 95 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Services such as a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces (for a fee). Additional services include medical assistance, room service and a laundry. A bicycle hire service (for a fee) gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, a living room and a bathroom. Most rooms feature a balcony or terrace. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms or a king-size bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. Tea and coffee making equipment is included as standard. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and wireless internet access. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. A terrace, a sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. There is also a poolside snack bar. For those wishing to enjoy some exercise, tennis and golf are offered onsite. A gym and squash are some of the sports and leisure options available at the establishment. The establishment offers various wellness options, including a spa and a sauna, or for a fee, a steam bath, a hammam, a beauty salon and massage treatments. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, dinner, B & B and half board. Guests can enjoy the show cooking, during which the chefs create delicious specialities. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Seven Hotel & Wellness - Gay Men Only
address: Avenida Ttoo Tjaereboerg 3, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Seven Hotel & Wellness - Gay Men Only is set next to Maspalomas Golf Course in southern Gran Canaria. It features a heated outdoor saltwater pool, and each room comes with a furnished porch. The bright, air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV. Some offer a sofa bed. There is a private bathroom, and a safe is available. Other facilities available at the property include the Abora Restaurant. Seven Hotel & Wellness - Gay Men Only is 2.5 km from Maspalomas Dunes and the beach. Faro 2 Shopping Centre is 1 km away. You can hire a car and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

name: Abora Catarina by Lopesan Hotels
address: Avenida de Tirajana, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Abora Catarina by Lopesan is located in Playa del Inglés, 250 metres from the Maspalomas Sand Dunes. This hotel features a buffet restaurant, bars, 5 outdoor swimming pools, and fitness centre. All rooms have air conditioning, TV, telephone and sofa bed. The Double Family Pool and Double Deluxe Pool rooms have a terrace and private pool. The Double Superior room with hydromassage and terrace and the Double Garden room have a terrace with garden view. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and a shared terrace. Guests can also enjoy the games room and there is a playground for children. Gran Canarias Airport is located a 20-minute drive from Abora Catarina by Lopesan, and the city of Las Palmas is 55 km away.

name: Club Vista Serena
address: Capricornio, 2, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: The Vista Serena is located in Maspalomas, 1 km outside Playa del Inglés in Gran Canaria. Surrounded by gardens, they offer 2 outdoor pools and a sun terrace with loungers. All apartments at the Vista Serena have a private terrace. They also consist of a bedroom, a living-dining room with sofa bed, and a bathroom. The kitchen is equipped with a hob, fridge and microwave. There is satellite TV in the living room, and the complex offers a DVD rental service. Vista Serena has a restaurant, the Celebration Restaurant, which serves contemporary cuisine. There is also a poolside bar where you can get a drink to enjoy on the sun terrace. Maspalomas Golf Club is just 1.2 km away from Vista Serena, and the sand dunes are 2 km away. Aqualand Water Park is also 2 km away.

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Castillo
address: Avenida Del Castillo, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: Canary Island paradise right on the seafrontThe Barcelo Castillo Beach Resort is a hotel especially for families or water sports enthusiasts set in the tranquillity and beauty of Caleta de Fuste. It is located near the airport and the capital of Fuerteventura Puerto del Rosario.This exclusive establishment has modern bungalows and studios next to the beach. They are large and fully equipped to make you feel at home and have been recently refurbished while retaining the traditional Canary Island style. It is a unique resort for sports lovers especially fans of scuba diving and windsurfing but also for those who love golf beach volleyball or any other water sport or outdoor activity. The hotel has several buffet or a la carte restaurants bars and a theatre with a programme to suit audiences of all ages. In addition there is a luxurious USpa for visitors who want to relax and try out the most innovative health and beauty treatments or work out in the fitness studio. There is a kids club offering an endless range of activities and three great swimming pool areas which are also for adults.Barcelo.com

name: Occidental Jandía Mar
address: C/ Playa Del Jable, 35625 Pájara, Fuerteventura
description: When you stay at Occidental Jandía Mar in Pajara, you'll be near the beach, within a 15-minute walk of Las Gaviotas beach and Matorral Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Pajara? This hotel has 10204 square feet (948 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Servatur Don Miguel - Adults Only
address: Av. De Tirajana, 30 5, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Servatur Don Miguel - Adults Only in Playa del Ingles provides adults-only accommodation with a restaurant, a bar and a garden. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a balcony. All guest rooms at Servatur Don Miguel - Adults Only feature air conditioning and a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Drinks are not included in dinner. Servatur Don Miguel - Adults Only offers 3-star accommodation with a hot tub and sun terrace. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Playa del Cochino, Yumbo Centre and Pacha Gran Canaria. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 27 km from Servatur Don Miguel - Adults Only.

name: Vanilla Garden Boutique Hotel - Adults Only
address: Avda. Arquitecto Gomez Cuesta, 5, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: Featuring free WiFi and an on-site restaurant, Vanilla Garden Hotel is located in Playa de las Americas. The hotel has a year-round outdoor pool and sun terrace. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, electric kettle, and a balcony. Certain rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. The private bathroom includes free toiletries, a hairdryer, and shower. A safe is available for an extra charge. There are a buffet restaurant and a bar. Guests can enjoy a taste of French cuisine at the a-la-carte restaurant Chez Damien. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for golfing. The hotel also offers car hire. Veronicas Strip is a 3-minute walk from Vanilla Garden Hotel, while Siam Park is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Cordial Green Golf
address: Avenida Tjaereborg, 2, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Offering free transfers to Maspalomas Beach and Playa del Inglés, Bungalows Cordial Green Golf features 2 outdoor swimming pools. It is located next to Maspalomas Golf Course and sand dunes. All Cordial Green Bungalows have bright, modern décor and a private terrace. There is a well-equipped kitchenette and a lounge area with sofa bed and TV. Only superior bungalows have air conditioning available in bedroom and living room. The Cordial Green complex features a poolside snack bar and a buffet restaurant with a terrace. There is also an on-site supermarket. Various shops, restaurants and bars can be found within a short walk in central Maspalomas. Las Palmas Airport is a 20-minute drive from the bungalows.

name: Seaside Sandy Beach
address: Av. Menceyes, 1, Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This Arabic-style hotel offers free WiFi, tennis courts and an outdoor swimming pool with jets, surrounded by subtropical gardens. Playa del Inglés Beach is just 500 metres away. Seaside Sandy Beach’s spacious, air-conditioned rooms include satellite TV and a furnished balcony. Hairdryers and bathrobes are available on request. Guests can enjoy wonderful ocean views from the outdoor gym. There is also a Hammam, sauna and massages service. A private terrace with a hot tub is also available to hire. Sandy Beach has an air-conditioned buffet restaurant and meals can also be served on the beautiful garden terrace. There is also a poolside snack bar and an on-site bakery. Coffee and cakes are served in the afternoon. The hotel is located in central Playa del Inglés, within a 10-minute walk of popular Yumbo Shopping Centre. Maspalomas Golf Course is only 1.5 km away.

name: Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa
address: Urbanización Costa Del Papagayo, 35580 Arrecife, Lanzarote
description: Located in Playa Blanca, Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa offers beachfront accommodation 200 metres from Playa Dorada and provides various facilities, such as a bar, a shared lounge and a garden. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also features with a restaurant, a water park and a year-round outdoor pool. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and room service. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a rain shower. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada. The accommodation offers a children playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada Resort & Spa. A car rental service is available at the property. Playa Blanca is less than 1 km from the hotel, while Flamingo Beach is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Lanzarote, 35 km from Dreams Lanzarote Playa Dorada, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Ereza Mar- Adults Only
address: Avenida José Franchy Roca 6, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Located on the seafront, the hotel Ereza Mar offers a magnificent view across the Atlantic Ocean. It has a privileged location situated at a mere 350 metres from the beach, as well as being near to all of the main leisure and recreation centres. Hotel Ereza Mar has 160 double and twin rooms and ten Junior Suites. Six of the rooms ares specially designed for guests with disabilities.FarePortal

name: Europe Villa Cortes
address: Avenida Rafael Puig, 38, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: Europe Villa Cortes GL is located on the seafront in southern Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas resort. It offers a fitness room, spa, 6 restaurants and luxurious rooms with private balconies. The Villa Cortes GL is styled in the manner of a luxurious Mexican mansion. Rooms feature custom-made Mexican furniture, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The Villa Cortes GL has a beach club restaurant and a variety of gourmet dining options. There are also 3 bars, including a beach bar. A buffet breakfast is offered and half-board rates include dishes from the specific daily menu of the half-board restaurant. The hotel’s outdoor pool features a waterfall and a children’s area. There is also a tennis court and a sun terrace with Balinese beds. Las Américas Golf Course is just 5 minutes’ drive from the Villa Cortés. Guests can also drive to Tenerife Sur Airport in 20-25 minutes. The hotel will remain completely closed for improvements to its facilities from May 2 to May 17, 2024

name: Oasis Lanz Beach Mate
address: Avenida Del Jablillo, 5, 35508 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Oasis Lanz Beach Mate has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and garden in Costa Teguise. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. The air-conditioned rooms provide pool view and come with a wardrobe and free WiFi. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area. Guests at Oasis Lanz Beach Mate can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. You can play table tennis and tennis at Oasis Lanz Beach Mate, and car hire is available. Speaking German, English, French and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Playa del Jablillo is 300 metres from the hotel, while Aqua Park is 2 km from the property.

name: Hotel Lanzarote Village
address: Calle Suiza 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Located opposite Los Pocillos Beach, Hotel Lanzarote Village has its own outdoor swimming pool and tennis courts, and elegant rooms with furnished terraces. Guest can enjoy a relaxing beach holiday at Lanzarote Village, excellently located in the popular Puerto del Carmen resort. Each room feature views of the sea or swimming pool. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. The property has a non-smoking buffet restaurant and a cocktail bar with daily live music. Hotel Lanzarote Village provides billiards, table tennis and darts facilities. There is a game room and a playground for kids along with entertainment activities. Bike rental service is possible at reception. Guest can also enjoy sunbathing by the hotel’s pool, relax in the hot tub or with a massage.

name: THB Flora
address: Calle Reina Sofia 25, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: An attractive holiday resort located in a peaceful area of Puerto del Carmen, THB Flora is just 800 metres from the beach and 500 metres from the shopping centre. There are leafy gardens that surround the Flora Apartments Lanzarote, where you will find 2 swimming pools with a terrace, bar, mini club and children’s playground. In addition, to keep you entertained, there are billiards, table-tennis, a games room, fiestas, dances and a wide entertainment programme for both adults and children making this a great option for all the family. Some room types features a kitchenette. Each one comes with satellite TV. The Hotel THB Flora has a bar-restaurant and a snack bar. There is also an on-site supermarket. The airport is just 10 km from the property, and Arrecife is 17 km away.

name: Abora Continental By Lopesan Hotels
address: Avenida de Italia, 2, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Situated in the centre of the lively Playa del Inglés resort, the hotel is just a few minutes’ walk from a 6 km stretch of beach that extends up to Maspalomas. Abora Continental by Lopesan Hotels features a cheerful and relaxed ambience and many of its comfortable rooms have sea views. There are 2 swimming pools for adults, a children’s pool and four hot tubs. Daytime and evening entertainment is available.

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Mar
address: Avenida de El Castillo, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Quality and comfort with a Canary Island soulThe Barcelo Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa hotel is built on Caleta de Fuste Beach. Basking in the tranquillity of the bay it offers the perfect destination for unwinding with the family. Its proximity to the marina also makes El Castillo a great place to discover new sports and leisure.It has 462 rooms that are spacious and full of natural light in a modern functional style. The rooms are also fully equipped so that guests have everything they need to enjoy their holiday to the full. Parents have the tranquillity of taking their children to the modern childrens miniclub that has a pirate theme or to the magnificent theatre with daily shows. Couples and groups of friends can enjoy the endless variety of water sports and outdoor activities on offer as well as the hotel restaurants bars and its famous thalassotherapy centre unique in Fuerteventura where they can have the latest type of treatments. The Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa is designed so that its guests can discover new experiences while they enjoy the beautiful surroundings peaceful beaches and welcoming locals or while they simply sit back and enjoy their holiday in this privileged location.Barcelo.com

name: Hotel Las Madrigueras Golf Resort & Spa
address: Golf Las Américas, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: Hotel Las Madrigueras Golf Resort & Spa - Adults Only has a beautiful setting within the Las Américas golf course, in South Tenerife. It has a full spa centre and a lovely outdoor pool. There hotel features panoramic views of the golf course, Atlantic Ocean and La Gomera Island. There is a large outdoor swimming pool. The spa centre includes a sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. There are massage treatments and a beauty salon. Hotel Las Madrigueras Golf Resort & Spa - Adults Only offers guests green fee discounts at Golf Las Américas. A free golf buggy is included in all rooms. Free WiFi and wired internet are available in all public areas and rooms. Each elegant room comes with satellite TV, a bathrobe and a private balcony. Free private parking is available onsite. Las Américas beach is within walking distance.

name: Hotel Beatriz Playa & Spa
address: C/ Mato nº 2 - Puerto Del Carmen, Puerto Del Carmen, 35510 Tías, Lanzarote
description: Offering rooms with balconies, the Beatriz Playa is set on Puerto de Carmen’s Matagorda Beach, 3 km from Lanzarote Aiport. It features an outdoor pool and spa. Each air-conditioned room at the Playa has simple décor and satellite TV. All come with a private bathroom, small fridge and safety deposit box. Mediterranean cuisine is on offer at the buffet restaurant, which features an attractive terrace. The Davao bar serves snacks by the pool and there is also a piano bar, and a lounge bar. The spa features an indoor hydromassage pool, a sauna and hot tub. Treatments on offer include massage and facials, and there is also a gym. The centre of Puerto de Carmen is less than 10 minutes’ drive from the Beatriz Playa and the nearest golf club is just 6 km away.

name: Hotel Miramar
address: Avenida Coll, 2, 35500 Arrecife, Lanzarote
description: The Hotel Miramar sits next to the sea in the commercial centre of Arrecife. There is free Wi-Fi throughout the property. The rooms in the Hotel Miramar are large and light, and most have a sea view. All come with minibar, bathroom with hairdryer, satellite TV and telephone. The Hotel Miramar has a restaurant offering local dishes, and a snack bar Arrecife offers good road connections to all parts of the island of Lanzarote. The hotel is about 6 km from the airport and 2 km from the port. From the port you can get a ferry to Gran Canaria. The popular resort of Costa Teguise is about 5 km away.

name: Gold by Marina - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Los Estados Unidos, 15, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Gold Playa del Ingles - Adults Only is located 500 metres from the beach in Playa del Inglés. This modern hotel has a spacious pool area with stylish design, 2 pools, a hot tub and lots of loungers. The air-conditioned rooms at this adults-only hotel feature cool, white décor with turquoise details. Each one has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and a mini-kitchenette with a hob, microwave and toaster. All rooms have a private balcony or terrace, and some have sea views. The hotel's restaurant serves an extensive daily buffet breakfast until 12:00. You can enjoy lunch by the pool, and the bar serves cocktails. The hotel's large Planetarium chill-out area with suspended orbs hanging from the ceiling and is a great place to relax with a cocktail. The lively Yumbo Shopping Centre is just 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. You can walk to Maspalomas Sand Dunes in around 10 minutes.

name: Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa
address: Calle Gran Bretana, Costa Adeje, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa is located in Adeje’s coast, offering spectacular views of the Atlantic Ocean and La Gomera. The luxurious facilities include 12,000 m2 of gardens. Each elegant room has a balcony or terrace with outdoor furniture, flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, and safe. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower and hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout. There is an a-la-carte and a buffet restaurant on site, as well as a snack bar and several lounges. The nearest beach is 400 metres from Dreams Jardin Tropical Resort & Spa. Siam Park is a 3-minute drive from the property, and Tenerife Sur Airport is 15 minutes away by car. - The establishment offers Preferred Club®, with preferential status and exclusive services such as: - access to the Preferred Club Lounge with a selection of snacks and drinks during the day, - exclusive concierge service, selection of the best rooms including superior attributes, - among other special advantages.

name: Royal Hideaway Corales Beach - Adults Only, by Barceló Hotel Group
address: Avenida Virgen de Guadalupe 21, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: All rooms are very spacious Junior Suites with sea views.A wide gastronomic offerMARESIA GASTRONOMIC SPACE led by the prestigious canarian chef Juan Carlos Padron winner of 1 Michelin star and 2 Soles Repsol.NAO ATLANTIC FOOD EXPERIENCE Atlantic buffet style restaurant breakfast and dinner.SAN HO A la carte restaurant specialized in Nikkei fusion cuisine Japanese Peruvian. STARFISH A la carte restaurant specialized in rice dishes fish and grilled meat. LA GELATERIA Traditional Italian ice cream shop.*1.000 m2 Spa and Wellness centre a unique area in which to enjoy an extensive array of massages and treatments.Barcelo.com

name: Spring Hotel Vulcano
address: Avda Antonio Dominquez Alf 8, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Offering an outdoor pool, a garden and entertainment staff, Hotel Vulcano is located in Playa de las America, just 300 metres from Playa de Las Americas Beach. There is free Wi-Fi throughout. Rooms at this hotel come with a terrace, air conditioning and satellite TV. Their private bathrooms also come with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms offer sea views. At Hotel Vulcano you will find a buffet restaurant offering grilled and vegetarian dishes and a snack bar. Guests can play billiards on site or golf just 1.5 km away. Siam Park Water Park is a 5-minute drive away Tenerife Sur Airport is 17 km away. Parque Nacional del Teide Nature Reserve is an hour’s drive away.

name: Regency Torviscas Apartments Suites
address: Cataluña 2, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Set around a shared swimming pool, 1.5 km from the beach in Adeje, Regency Torviscas Apartments and Suites offers apartments with sea views. This aparthotel features an on-site spa. All accommodation has a furnished private terrace, as well as a living room with a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player and sofa bed. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, microwave, coffee machine and kettle. There is a bathroom with a shower, bathrobe and hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are included. The spa includes a sauna and massage services, available for an extra cost. A fitness centre, bar and games room can also be found at the property. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Siam Park Waterpark is 3 km from Regency Torviscas Apartments and Suites and Las Americas Golf Course is 4 km away. Tenerife South Airport is 18 km from the property.

name: Barceló Tenerife
address: Avd. Grenamora, No. 1, Urb. San Blas, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Barcelo Tenerife has 331 fully equipped rooms; a buffet restaurant; La Proa gourmet restaurant; four bars and the Magma performance hall. It also includes other original proposals for leisure and rest such as a navigable lake; a climbing wall; a gym; a recreational sports area with a beach volleyball court; basketball; handball and paddle tennis; eight swimming pools /two of which are heated throughout the year/ and a Wellness areaBarcelo.com

name: Barceló Fuerteventura Royal Level
address: Avenida Del Castillo, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: The perfect place to rest.The Barcelo Castillo Royal Level is located right on the beachfront at Caleta de Fuste in Fuerteventura where you can enjoy relaxing walks by the sea with the best views of the Atlantic. The tranquillity of the area and the beauty of the beach make it the perfect destination for families and groups of friends wanting to combine rest with fun during their holidays. There is a marina in the area offering a large range of water sports such as Jet Skis Windsurfing and a Diving School. There are 30 bright spacious apartments with fully equipped modern kitchens. Guests have the added benefit of being on the Barcelo Castillo Beach Resort complex and being able to enjoy all the facilities on offer as well as the Thalassotherapy Centre in the Barcelo Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa. Discover the best local gastronomy in our recently opened restaurant.Barcelo.com

name: Barceló Teguise Beach - Adults only
address: Plaza Janubio s/n, 35508 Costa, Lanzarote - Costa Teguise, 35509 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: This completely refurbished 4 adults only hotel provides stylish elegance and breathtaking sea views in Lanzarote.Barcelo Teguise Beach is a lifestyle oasis with all the modern facilities you need for a relaxing beachside holiday. Most of the romos feature a private hot tub.Combining fabulous facilities with excellent cuisine at the two on-site restaurants we guarantee you will enjoy an unforgettable adult break with your friends or partner.Barcelo.com

name: HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Italia, 21, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Located 100 metres from Playa del Inglés Beach, HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés offers an outdoor swimming pool and a rooftop sun terrace. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Each air-conditioned room features a private balcony. It includes a flat-screen TV, a minibar, safe, and a kettle. The complex includes a large restaurant, offering regional dishes. HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés also offers a poolside snack bar and live entertainment. Maspalomas Dunes, and the lively centre of Playa del Inglés, are within a 20-minute walk of HL Suitehotel Playa del Inglés. The Yumbo Centre is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Lopesan Villa del Conde Resort & Thalasso
address: Mar Mediterraneo 7, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Lopesan Villa del Conde Resort offers a picturesque setting and ocean views from its setting on Meloneras Beach. It features a spa, large outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. The Lopesan is 800 metres from Maspalomas Nature Reserve. This large resort and spa has landscape gardens and spacious rooms. All air-conditioned rooms feature stylish décor with bright colours. Each has a balcony or terrace, satellite TV and a minibar. There are 5 restaurants including a buffet option, Mediterranean and an Italian restaurant. The Alpendre Salt Grill serves a large salad buffet, while the Patio Café offers cakes and crêpes. There are 6 bars, one offering live music. The spa covers 1, 200m² and is right on the sea front. It has Turkish baths, an African sauna, flotation pool and hydrothermal circuit. A range of treatments is available for an extra cost.

name: Parque Santiago IV Official
address: Avenida Rafael Puig Lluvina, 40, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Facing the beachfront, Parque Santiago IV Official offers 3-star accommodation in Playa de las Americas and has a fitness centre, garden and terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi. The hotel offers a hot tub and a concierge service. At the hotel, all rooms have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms are fitted with a coffee machine, while some rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Parque Santiago IV Official offers a children's playground. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include El Bunker Beach, Camison Beach and Playa de las Americas. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 19 km from Parque Santiago IV Official.

name: Hotel Livvo Risco Del Gato Suites
address: Calle Sicasumbre, 2, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: The elegant Hotel LIVVO Risco del Gato Suites is situated 200 metres from Sotavento Beach in Costa Calma. Set within gardens, it is surrounded by swimming pools on different levels and offers a heated indoor pool. The suites feature air conditioning, a living room with satellite TV, a coffee-maker and a private bathroom with a whirlpool bath. Each has its own inner patio with an outdoor shower. There is also a terrace and small private garden. La Terraza del Gato restaurant offers á la carte Mediterranean cuisine and a breakfast buffet is served in the El Despertar restaurant. Guests can enjoy drinks in the El Mirador lobby-bar. Hotel LIVVO Risco del Gato Suites offers a spa and wellness centre complete with a gym, sauna, Turkish bath and hot tub. There is an indoor heated swimming pool, and massage services are also available. The town centre of Costa de Calma is 2 km away from the hotel with shops, restaurants and bars. Fuerteventura Airport is 66 km away. Please note that for stays of 7 nights or longer, half-board service, guest will have a free bottle of wine.

name: Lopesan Baobab Resort
address: Mar Adriático, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Lopesan Baobab Resort is a luxurious resort set in tropical gardens with African-style decór throughout. It features a large outdoor swimming pool and is 600 metres from Maspalomas Beach. Rooms at the Lopesan are elegant and spacious. All feature air conditioning and a balcony. The bathrooms have toiletries and bathrobes. A safe is available for a surcharge. The Baobab’s Pili Pili Restaurant specialises in grilled meats and seafood, while the Akara offers African cuisine. There is a buffet restaurant, as well as 2 stylish poolside bars and a coffee shop. The Lopesan also has a children's club and a babysitting service. The hotel's 24-hour reception provides luggage storage. The Baobab Resort offers impressive views of the Atlantic Ocean. It is just 10 minutes’ walk from Maspalomas lighthouse and the seafront path.

name: Beatriz Costa & Spa
address: Atalaya, 3, 35509 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Beatriz Costa & Spa is situated in a tranquil area of the Costa Teguise and has nearby spectacular gardens, waterfalls and lakes adorning the interior of this region. Free WiFi is provided. The complex boasts facilities aimed to help you both be active and to relax, including a Talasoterapia centre and a sports centre for the practice of tennis and minigolf. One of the main attractions in this establishment are the 2000 m² of swimming pools situated in the middle of this tropical garden. One pool is heated and another for children. The hotel has 3 restaurants, including an Oriental restaurant, all offering buffet meals. Show cooking is also available.

name: Gf Gran Costa Adeje
address: Avenida de Bruselas, 16, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: The 5-star GF GRAN COSTA ADEJE is set 500 metres from El Duque Beach, in Tenerife’s Playa de Fañabe resort. It offers a spa and free parking on site. Rooms at the hotel have a balcony with views of the mountains, pool or sea. They are also equipped with air conditioning. The GF GRAN COSTA ADEJE has 3 swimming pools, surrounded by a sun terrace and tropical gardens, and a roof top pool for adults, offering panoramic views of the Costa Adeje and Fañabe Beach. There are 2 exclusive areas for naturist use. The hotel’s spa has a sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. There is also a gym and outside the hotel guests can find mini golf and tennis courts. The hotel has a buffet restaurant, 2 à la carte restaurants and 3 bars. There is a full entertainment programme, with live shows and games. Tenerife South Airport is just 20 km from the hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Resort Lanzarote
address: Avda. Del Mar, 26, 35508 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Radisson Blu Resort, Lanzarote Adults Only is located next to Bastian Beach in Lanzarote’s Costa Teguise Resort. It offers 4 outdoor pools. The air-conditioned junior suites and suites at Radisson Blu Resort, Lanzarote Adults Only feature modern décor, satelite TV and a mini bar. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, and most come with a private balcony. The hotel’s Tremor Buffet Restaurant serves a range of international food. Sesto Senso restraunt is an al a cart italian restaurant and the Dono features a dancefloor and nightly entertainment. There is also a poolside snack bar and a beach bar with a stunning view to the Bastian beach. Radisson Blu Resort, Lanzarote Adults Only has a beauty and wellness centre offering a range of treatments. Cucharas Beach is around 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Central Arrecife and Lanzarote Airport are 15 minutes’ drive away. Please note that the hotel Radisson Blu resort Lanzarote will change to ADULTS ONLY +16 hotel from 01.05.2023

name: Rainbow Golf Gay Men-only Resort
address: Avenida Touroperador Finnmatkat, 6, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Rainbow Golf Bungalows, Gay Men-only Resort is in a quiet part of Maspalomas, 20 minutes' walk from the famous sand dunes. It offers an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi zone.
