Each modern bungalow features a furnished terrace at the front and the back. The living room has a sofa and flat-screen TV with free satellite channels. There is a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave, ceramic hob and coffee maker. There is also a toaster and kettle. Safes are available to rent. You will receive a bottle of champagne and water on arrival. You can also purchase capsules for the coffee maker. Guests can use the hot tub. Free parking is available nearby and the complex is within 10 minutes' walk of the lively Yumbo Centre. There is an on-site minimarket and a pool bar, where breakfast can be served. Services available include laundry and massage, as well as car rental. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

name: Sir Anthony
address: 3 Meandro, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Featuring direct access to Camisón Beach in Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas, this stylish hotel offers a spa and an outdoor pool. Air-conditioned rooms include a balcony with ocean views and free WiFi. The rooms at Sir Anthony feature parquet floors and modern, elegant décor. Each one has a flat-screen TV, safe and minibar. There is a pillow menu and the private bathroom comes with hairdryer. Some rooms have a private plunge pool. Guests receive a welcome glass of cava on arrival. The Windsor Restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes, and it also features a terrace. There is a poolside juice bar and a private beach club offering live music. Guests can use the neighbouring Mare Nostrum’s spa, where you can find a hot tub, fitness centre and tennis courts. Las Américas Golf Course and Siam Park are 1 km away. Tenerife South Airport is 15 km from the hotel.

name: Iberostar Selection Sábila - Adults Only
address: Ernesto Sarti, 5, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only is located on Fañabe Beach on Tenerife’s Costa Adeje. It has large gardens. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All rooms at Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only come with a balcony, as well as a private bathroom with hairdryer. There is also satellite TV in each room. Iberostar Sábila - Adults Only has a buffet-style restaurant as well as a selection of bars. These include the lobby bar with terrace and a poolside bar serving snacks and drinks. Guest will find a gourmet market on-site offering a unique gastronomic experience enlivened with music. The hotel offers a gym and the Spa Sensations offers a spa circuit and health and beauty treatments. The hotel is just 10 minutes’ walk from Puerto Colón, an area full of restaurants, bars and nightclubs. Tenerife South Airport is a 20-minute drive away from the hotel.

name: Atypicap Capsule Hostel
address: 22 Calle Agustín de Betancourt, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Atypicap Capsule Hostel has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Puerto de la Cruz. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is allergy-free and is set 300 metres from Playa del Muelle. All guest rooms at the capsule hotel come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. At Atypicap Capsule Hostel all rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Atypicap Capsule Hostel. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. Popular points of interest near the capsule hotel include San Telmo Beach, Playa Martianez and Plaza Charco. The nearest airport is Tenerife North–Ciudad de La Laguna Airport, 24 km from Atypicap Capsule Hostel.

name: Ramada Residences by Wyndham Costa Adeje
address: Torviscas Alto, Calle Galicia, 6, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Thank you for choosing our Ramada hotel. Ramada is a global upper-midscale hotel brand with over 820 properties located in over 50 countries worldwide. Most Ramada hotels feature free wired and wireless high-speed internet access, meeting rooms, business services, fitness facilities and upgraded bath amenities. Many properties have an on-site restaurant/lounge, while other sites offer a continental breakfast. You do your thing, leave the rest to us.Wyndham

name: Bungalows Rebecca Park
address: Noruega, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Bungalows Rebecca Park features charming whitewashed studios and bungalows, and a lovely swimming pool surrounded by gardens and terraces. The complex is 1.5 km from Playa del Inglés Beach and has an on-site supermarket. All of the bungalows and studios at the Bungalows Rebecca Park come with a private terrace. An electric stove, satellite TV and a tea/coffee maker can be found in the kitchen. The restaurant serves buffet meals, while there is also a bar and pool bar. An entertainment programme is offered in the evening. The complex offers easy access to the town's shopping centres, bars and restaurants. Playa del Inglés lies in the south of the island of Gran Canaria. The airport is around 25 km away.

name: Spring Arona Gran Hotel - Adults Only
address: Avenida Juan Carlos I, 38, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: The elegant Spring Arona Gran Hotel - Adults Only is next to Tenerife’s Los Cristianos beach, with amazing views of the bay. It has large outdoor pools, a sauna and a gym. The hotel's spacious rooms have a private balcony, minibar and safe. Rooms offer satellite TV and air-conditioning. They also have a full bathroom, including bathrobes and a hairdryer. The adults only hotel’s restaurant serves buffet lunch. There is a snack bar and a lounge-bar with live music and shows every night. WiFi access is free in public areas of the hotel. The Arona's 24-hour front desk offers currency exchange and car rental. Free public parking is available nearby. The Spring Arona Gran Hotel - Adults Only is set on the seafront promenade, a short walk from Los Cristianos Harbour. From here, there are regular ferry services to the islands of La Palma and La Gomera.

name: Hovima Jardin Caleta
address: Avenida Las Gaviotas, 32, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: This modern aparthotel is located just 50 metres from La Enramada Beach in the La Caleta. It offers comfortable apartments, 3 outdoor swimming pools and a hot tub. The bright HOVIMA Jardin Caleta apartments feature a furnished balcony with pool or sea views. Each has a lounge with sofa bed, satellite TV and rental safe and kitchenette with hob, kettle and toaster. The hotel has a buffet restaurant with BBQ and a poolside bar with sun terrace. The sports bar offers evening entertainment and has a pool table and darts. The Jardin Caleta has a children’s playground and kid’s club. There is a ping-pong table and one of the pools is heated in winter. Bike and car rental are offered and the Costa Adeje Golf Resort is 1 km away. Tenerife South Airport is 25 km away.

name: Seaside Los Jameos Playa
address: Playa De Los Pocillos, Calle Marte,2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Situated on Los Pocillos Beach, the Canarian-style Los Jameos Playa offers outdoor pools surrounded by palm trees and 4 tennis courts. It features a small Finnish spa with a gym, bio-sauna and Turkish Bath. Each spacious air-conditioned room at Seaside Los Jameos has a balcony and is decorated with soft colours and light wood furniture. They include satellite TV, and minibars and safes can be rented. The main restaurant, with its beautiful covered terrace, offers a varied buffet dinner, with special themes and BBQ nights. The Belingo Bar offers a animated entertainment programme with live music and dancing. Los Jameos Lanzarote offers daily activities for adults and children, including minigolf and beach volleyball. There are also games and activities for children. Several bars, restaurants and shops are within 10 minutes’ walk away. Los Jameos Playa Hotel is just a 10-minute walk from Matagorda, and 2 km from central Puerto del Carmen. Lanzarote Arrecife Airport is just 5 km away. There is a golf course less than 3 km away.

name: Sheraton Fuerteventura Beach, Golf & Spa Resort
address: Avenida De Las Marismas No. 1, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Ideally located on the eastern coast of Fuerteventura, one of the Canary Islands that is especially renowned for its idyllic beaches and warm temperature all year round. Sheraton Fuerteventura Beach, Golf & Spa Resort has 266 comfortable rooms and suites designed in elegant Canarian style with private terraces. Our 5-star hotel is home to excellent restaurants offering delicious gastronomic experiences. Guests recharge in the 1,000 m2 wellness center, Hespérides Thalasso spa with a state-of-the-arts thermal circuit and 12 treatment cabins. Yambaland kid´s club offers hours of fun for children with plenty of creative activities. The rest of the leisure facilities include: 4 swimming pools, a fitness center, a tennis court, a mini golf, access to the beach and access to the close by Fuerteventura Golf Club. The selection of meeting rooms with natural sunlight are ideal for hosting any type of social events or meetings.Marriott

name: Occidental Jandía Playa
address: C/ Sancho Panza, 35625 Pájara, Fuerteventura
description: Established in 2004 and located in Pajara, Occidental Jandia Playa features a rooftop terrace, plus views of Fuerteventura. It provides beach views and complimentary Wi-Fi. The hotel has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. For those travelling with children Occidental Jandia Playa offers supervised child care/activities, a kids pool and a kids club. Occidental Jandia Playa features 498 air conditioned rooms filled with all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. Each comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, as well as a private bathroom. Guests of Occidental Jandia Playa can wake up to a satisfying breakfast each morning at Morro Jable Snack Restaurant, as well as dinner at Corralejo Buffet Restaurant in the evening. There are a variety of cafés and restaurants near the hotel, and Costa Calma and Tarajalejo are an easy car trip away. La Lajita Oasis Park can be easily accessed by car.Revato

name: Aparthotel la Piramide
address: Berlina, 7, 35610 Caleta de Fuste, Fuerteventura
description: Aparthotel la Piramide is a 10-minute drive from Fuerteventura Airport and 3 km from Castillo Beach. It features an outdoor pool, hot tub and sauna, as well as a gym and tennis court. All apartments have a balcony with pool views. There is a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV. You can hire the safe, and there is a private bathroom. The kitchenette includes a fridge, hob and coffee maker. The complex has a café, restaurant and poolside bar. Packed lunches can be requested and there are vending machines for snacks. Free parking is available nearby and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. Fuerteventura Golf Club is 5 km away.

name: Hotel Riu Palace Palmeras
address: Avenida De Estados Unidos De America, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Hotel Riu Palace Palmeras - All Inclusive has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a fitness centre and bar in San Bartolomé. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. Each room includes a balcony. At the hotel, rooms come with a TV and a private bathroom. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Hotel Riu Palace Palmeras offers an on-site restaurant with a terrace, where guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Other facilities at the property include a pool bar and 2 heated swimming pools. A fitness centre and a kids playground are also available. Playa del Ingles is 600 metres from the accommodation, while Maspalomas is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 27 km from Hotel Riu Palace Palmeras - All Inclusive.

name: Spring Hotel Bitácora
address: c/ California 1, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Set on Playa de las Americas Beach, Hotel Bitácora is located in Santa Cruz de Tenerife. Offering a varied food buffet, the air-conditioned hotel has sea views. Each bright room features a flat-screen TV and balcony with views. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. There is a bar and a restaurant available for guests, as well as an entertainment staff. Hotel Bitácora has an outdoor swimming pool and furnished terrace. Las Americas Golf Course is 2 km away. Los Cristianos Port is within the same distance offering ferries. Teide National Park is 15 km from the property and Santa Cruz is a 45-minute drive. Tenerife South Airport is located within 20 minutes’ drive.

name: Suites & Villas by Dunas
address: Avenida Sunair, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Set within extensive gardens, this bungalow complex is next to Maspalomas Dunes and Golf Course. It features 3 outdoor pools surrounded by sun terraces and air-conditioned rooms with a terrace. The charming accommodation at Suites & Villas by Dunas features a lounge area with satellite TV and a terrace with a garden. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. The buffet restaurant offers a different theme each day. There is a pool bar and lobby bar where guests can relax with a drink. Facilities at Suites & Villas by Dunas include a fitness centre and a bike centre. Suites & Villas by Dunas also features a water park, miniclub and entertainment for children. Some rooms have a terrace with direct access to the water park. The hotel complex is situated approximately 30 km away from Gran Canaria Airport. A free shuttle service runs to Maspalomas Beach 4 times a day.

name: Birdcage Gay Resort - Adult Only
address: Egipto, 10, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Aimed at gay men, the 4-star Birdcage G ay Resort men only Lifestyle Hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from the Yumbo Centre in Playa del Inglés. Set in tropical gardens, it features a nudist-friendly outdoor pool, hot tub, hammock and spa area. You choose between deluxe rooms and suites, some with a private garden and sun loungers. All have a fan, flat-screen satellite TV and DVD player, as well as a fridge and minibar. Bathrooms come with bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Suites have a separate bedroom and living room with a sofa. Rooms are studio style and feature air conditioning. A varied breakfast can be enjoyed daily on the terrace. There is a stylish lounge with a fireplace, where you can relax with a book from the library or a cocktail, tea or coffee. The spa offers massages, manicures, pedicures, hair styling and more in the garden massage temples or in your room. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are provided and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. Playa del Inglés Beach is a 10-minute walk away and the famous Maspalomas Dunes is 2 km from the complex.

name: Gara Suites Golf & Spa
address: Calle Landa 2, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: Located in Playa de las Americas, 1 km from Siam Park, Gara Suites Golf & Spa offers amenities including an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Offering a garden, the property is located within 1.3 km of Piramide de Arona convention centre. The tour desk is available to assist guests in planning their days out. Featuring a terrace, all guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the property. There is an in-house restaurant, which serves a variety of Mediterranean dishes. Gara Suites Golf & Spa offers a children's playground. Speaking German and English, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Safari Shopping Centre is a 16-minute walk from the accommodation, while Chayofa is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 14 km from the property.

name: Hotel Las Costas
address: Avenida De Las Playas 88, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Located on Pocillos Beach, the rooms at Las Costas feature a private balcony, free WiFi, a microwave and fridge. It offers a gym, hot tub, and outdoor pool with sea views. The buffet restaurant at Hotel Las Costas features a terrace. There is a poolside bar with hammocks, which serves light refreshments. Gluten-free meals are available on request. The hotel has a games room with billards, darts and table tennis. There is also an entertainment programme for children. Wi-Fi is available in all bedrooms for an extra cost, and in reception for free. The hotel is situated in the tourist area of Puerto del Carmen with many services, shops and entertainment nearby. Lanzarote Airport is 4 km away.

name: Aparthotel Green Field
address: De Tenerife 6, Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Aparthotel Green Field is a modern complex just 5 minutes' walk from Playa del Inglés Beach. It has a large outdoor pool with loungers, and all rooms have a balcony or a terrace. The Green Field has studios and apartments with separate bedrooms and kitchens. All air-conditioned rooms feature a private bathroom, TV and seating area. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The Green Field complex offers a massage service and a hairdresser. The pool heating and sauna are available from November to April. The hotel also organizes daily shows. Green Field is close to shops and restaurants and it is only a 20-minute walk to the Maspalomas Dunes.

name: Hotel Zentral Center
address: Avenida Arquitecto Gomez Cuesta, Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Hotel Zentral Center is next to Tenerife’s Las Americas Golf Club, 400 metres from Playa de las Americas Beach. It has an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub and sauna. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Rooms at the Zentral Center are modern and air-conditioned. They all include a TV, safe and minibar. Rooms also have a private bathroom. The Zentral Center Hotel has an elegant restaurant and a bar. There are also spacious lounge areas. The 24-hour reception offers currency exchange, and car and bicycle rental. Hotel Zentral Center is set in a quiet area of Las Americas, in southern Tenerife. Tenerife Sur Airport is around 15 km away.

name: Mirador Maspalomas by Dunas
address: Calle Einstein Sonnenland, E-35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria, Spain., 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Mirador Maspalomas by Dunas is located in the Sonnenland area of Maspalomas, in Gran Canaria. It offers 2 outdoor pools with loungers, a hot tub, and rooms with private balconies. All rooms at the Mirador Maspalomas by Dunas feature tiled floors and light furniture. They are also equipped with ceiling fan, flat screen TV with international channels, and a balcony or a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Pool towels are available for an additional cost. The Mirador Maspalomas’ restaurant serves a variety of Spanish and international food. There is also a poolside bar and a Discotheque (only open in winter (Nov-Apr). Children can enjoy a separated pool and a club with an entertainment program. Guests can benefit from a pool table. Other facilities include a wellness centre with beauty treatments and massages for a surcharge. Playa del Inglés Beach and Playa Meloneras Beach are 3 km from the hotel, and there is a free bus service 4 times a day. Here you can find a range of watersports facilities, and there are 2 golf courses within 2 km.

name: Gf Victoria
address: Calle Fernando Lopez Arvelo, 1, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Located in Costa Adeje just 150 m from Playa del Duque Beach, GF Victoria offers 4 bathing areas and 2 restaurants. Free private parking is available on site. The 242 Suites offer a bedroom with ensuite bathroom, lounge area with separate WC, kettle, coffee-maker and minibar. Smart TV, safety deposit box, air-conditioning and amenities are provided. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Guests will find an adult pool, a family area and naturist pool on the property. GF Victoria also features a glass pool, with transparent walls and bottom which overhangs the façade of the hotel. Children will enjoy the aquatic park, which includes a surf pool. Guests will find sun loungers service. The wide gastronomic offer includes the cuisine of the à la carte restaurant Donaire, and the buffet restaurant Chaboco, where children can learn about healthy food choices. Guests can visit the chill-out Sky Bar Zambra only for adults. Plaza del Duque Shopping Centre is a 2-minute walk from the accommodation, while Gran Sur Shopping Centre is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 17 km from GF Victoria.

name: Seaside Grand Hotel Residencia
address: Avenida Del Oasis, 32, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This luxury complex, set in tropical gardens, is 400 metres from Gran Canaria’s Maspalomas Dunes. Spanish colonial-style villas have private balconies or terraces, and there is a free spa and a heated outdoor pool. Air-conditioned villas at Seaside Grand Hotel Residencia are decorated in relaxing blues and yellows by French interior designer Alberto Pinto. They have modern facilities like satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Grand Hotel Residencia guests have free access to the spa’s gym, hydro-massage saltwater pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Free Taichi and agua-gym classes are also available at the neighbouring Seaside Palm Beach. The restaurant serves Canarian and international cuisine. It has an outdoor terrace with views of the lush gardens and mountains. There is a poolside snack bar and a piano bar. Guests have free access to a tennis court and other facilities in the Hotel Seaside Palm Beach complex 200 metres away, and Meloneras Golf Course is 2 km from the hotel. There is also a DVD library with films in various languages.

name: Hotel Fariones
address: C/ Roque Del Este 1, 35510 Tías, Lanzarote
description: Set within tropical gardens, Hotel Fariones has direct access cove in Puerto del Carmen. The main infinity pool is surrounded by palm trees and an infinity pool on rooftop with panoramic views. All rooms offer views of the Atlantic Ocean. Hotel Fariones has restaurants, a la carte restaurants with Macaronesia cuisine and Asian restaurant. The property also has a snack bar located in the main pool and a main buffet. The Hotel Fariones has a tennis court, a sauna and massage service which can be found at the Fariones Sports Center 50 meters from the hotel. Puerto del Carmen's main beach is just 50 metres from Hotel Fariones and has a direct access from hotel. Lanzarote Airport is 10 km away from Fariones while Arrecife is 16 km away.

name: HD Beach Resort
address: Avenida Islas Canarias, s/n, 35509 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Located 250 metres from Las Cucharas Beach, on Lanzarote’s Costa Teguise, HD Beach Resort offers tennis courts, gym, spa and outdoor pool. The spa includes an indoor pool, sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. Air-conditioned suites have a balcony with views of the Atlantic Ocean or mountains. There is a seating area with a sofa bed, safe and flat-screen satellite TV. A fridge, toaster and coffee maker are provided, and a microwave is available on request. The HD Beach Resort features 2 restaurants. It also has a bar and snack bar, and packed lunches can be requested. The complex has free Wi-Fi and on-site water sports facilities. There is a night club and entertainment staff. Free parking is offered nearby, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. An airport shuttle service is available for a supplement.

name: Aqua Suites
address: Anzuelo, 23, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Aqua Suites is a boutique hotel in Puerto del Carmen. This property features a swimming pool and hot tub. It is 10 walking minutes away from the beach. Each modern suite Aqua Suites has a private furnished terrace and air conditioning. There is a satellite TV, a living area with kettle and fridge and a bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries. This resort is 12 km from Arrecife Airport. The property offers free parking.

name: Sol Tenerife
address: Avenida Rafael Puig Llivina, 12, 38640 Arona, Tenerife
description: Sol Tenerife is located 200 metres from the beach in Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas Resort. It offers 3 outdoor pools with sun loungers, a tennis court and rooms with a furnished balcony with partial or front sea views. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Sol Tenerife feature tiled floors and cheerful colours. They are equipped with satellite TV, fridge, desk and chair. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. There is free WiFi available in all areas of the hotel. The hotel has a kids' club, hairdressers and supermarket on site. Sports facilities include a volleyball court and a small football pitch. There is also a massage service. The Tenerife Sol’s restaurant serves international buffet meals. There are also 2 bars, including a poolside bar. Las Américas Golf Course is 500 metres away from the hotel. Tenerife Sur Airport is 14 km away. You can take a boat to La Gomera Island in 35 minutes.

name: Hotel Lava Beach
address: Calle Marte 6, 35510 Tías, Lanzarote
description: Set in Puerto del Carmen, Hotel Lava Beach offers 5-star accommodation with a fitness centre, a garden and a terrace. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The tour desk is available to assist guests in planning their days out. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. You can play mini-golf at the hotel. Puerto del Carmen is 2 km from Hotel Lava Beach. The nearest airport is Lanzarote Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: Sbh Costa Calma Palace Thalasso & Spa
address: Avenida Jahn Reisen, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: This elegant hotel, 50 metres from Fuerteventura’s Costa Calma Beach, features indoor and outdoor pools, a spa and free parking. All air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony with sea views. The SBH Costa Calma Palace & Spa offers 2 tennis courts, a giant chess board, and a golf area with a putting green. You can also go windsurfing and diving for an additional charge. The large, bright rooms at the SBH Costa Calma Palace & Spa come with satellite TV. You can rent a safe, and the private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. Guests can relax in the Costa Calma Palace thalassotherapy spa, with its indoor seawater swimming pool and treatments. There is a gym and sauna, and massage is available. The hotel has a restaurant and 2 bars. You can also have lunch or a drink at the poolside snack bar. Live music and shows are offered daily.

name: Bungalows Cordial Sandy Golf
address: Campo Internacional
description: Set in the old touristic town of Maspalomas, the bungalows are ideally located next to the golf course and just 2 km from the spectacular nature reserve of the Dunes of Maspaloma. Just a few minutes away from the shopping centre, Faro 2, these comfortable and completely-renovated bungalows are also within easy reach of golf and tennis facilities. In addition to this, a free shuttle bus is offered to the beach of Maspalomas and the centre of Playa del Inglés. The bungalows are completed by access to the resort’s swimming pool (heated in winter), and poolside snack bar. Meals are offered at Cordial Green Golf, just in front of the complex.

name: Park Club Europe
address: Avenida Rafael Puig, 23, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: Set in tropical gardens just a few metres from the sea, Europe Park Club offers 2 outdoor pools, tennis courts and a free Wi-Fi zone. It is a short walk from some of the best beaches in the south of Tenerife. Rooms at Europe Park Club have a balcony and a ceiling fan. Decorated in warm colours, rooms include satellite TV, a seating area and a private bathroom. Each evening, you can dine in one of the complex’s restaurants, where you can enjoy buffet-style meals. Barbecue meals are served on the terrace of the Gavina restaurant, open seasonally. Park Club Europe features a gym, and offers a wellness program. It also offers a variety of activities including archery, volleyball, and football, among others. Europe Park is located in the popular resort of Playa de las Americas. You can walk to the beach in 7 minutes. The centre of Los Cristianos is only 2 km away.

name: Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity
address: Calle Swing, Salobre Golf Resort, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Set within the 18-hole Salobre Golf Course, Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity features 7 outdoor swimming pools and a spa. This hotel is 15 minutes' drive from Maspalomas. Guest rooms at the resort are equipped with a terrace with mountain views as well as a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath. A safe is available at no extra charge. Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity features 3 restaurants offering a wide range of international and local dishes. Guests can also have a drink in one of the 3 bars available. The wellness centre offers a variety of facial and body treatments. Guests can also join the on-site gym or sports activities such as yoga, basketball or cycling. The property offers a free shuttle to Meloneras Beach. Playa del Ingles is 7 km from Salobre Hotel Resort & Serenity, while Playa de las Burras is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 31 km from the property. Please note that both the Sunset Pool and the Spa Centre are adults only. Please note beach transfer is possible every hour from 11:00 to 18:00, subject to availability. Please note that the Gala dinner on the 31st December is included for all rates. Half board dinners are buffet-style. All guests will need to provide a valid ID, including children. Please note that guests must present the credit card used to make the reservation on arrival. Since 17th October 2022, The New and The Old Course merged to feature three different loops by combining the Old Course’s 18 holes and holes 1 to 3 and 13 to 18 of par 36 New Course that will defy you to enjoy the challenges of a course with unparalleled personality.

name: H10 Conquistador
address: Avenida Rafael Puig, 36, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: H10 Conquistador is situated on Tenerife and offers 4-star accommodation as well as outdoor tennis courts and a Turkish steam bath. This modern hotel is close to everything Playa de las Americas has to offer. There are a range of facilities at H10 Conquistador that guests can enjoy, such as body treatments, a swimming pool and a golf course. The hotel's amenities, such as meeting rooms, kids pool, kids club and playground, and massage make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. All provide a mini bar, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. H10 Conquistador is within walking distance of Playa de las Vistas. The hotel's multilingual staff will make sure that every guest has a comfortable stay.Revato

name: Plus Fariones Suite Hotel
address: C/. Acatife, 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: The Plus Fariones Suite Hotel offers direct access to the beach and 3 outdoor pools. It offers rooms with terrace and views of the Atlantic Ocean and is a 10-minute drive from Lanzarote airport. Free sun loungers and towels are provided. The bright suites have a living room with satellite TV. The property offers free safes. Plus Fariones Suite Hotel has a buffet restaurant and a poolside snack bar. There are shops and restaurants nearby. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Puerto del Carmen Marina is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Lanzarote Golf Course is 3 km away.

name: Caybeach Princess
address: Sonneland
description: Caybeach Princess features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a restaurant and bar in Maspalomas. This 3-star resort offers a kids' club, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and free shuttle service. At the resort every room comes with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a garden view. Caybeach Princess provides certain units with pool views, and all rooms come with a coffee machine. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a Full English/Irish breakfast. Caybeach Princess offers a children's playground. Meloneras Beach is 2.8 km from the resort, while De Las Mujeres Beach is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 30 km from Caybeach Princess.

name: Tivoli la Caleta Resort
address: C/la Enramada 9, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Immerse yourself in luxury at Tivoli La Caleta Tenerife Resort, the first Tivoli property to open in Spain. A fully renewed property, the hotel benefits from an astonishing seafront setting in Tenerife’s exclusive Costa Adeje resort. The hotel itself has a distinctive southern Moroccan style that includes sensual lines and soft edges. Inside, guests will find 284 guest rooms and suites that have been designed as inviting spaces. During their stay, guests will enjoy use of a luxurious collection of leisure facilities, including three swimming pools, a 24-hour gym, a spa, paddle/tennis courts and a terrace with gardens. A dining destination in itself, Tivoli La Caleta Tenerife Resort provides guests with a fantastic selection of food and beverage options, including four restaurants and five bars. From the signature Tivoli Breakfast Buffet to the widest cocktail offering in the area and the three restaurants signed by Olivier, guests will find an option that suits their cravings at any time of day.NH Hoteles

name: H10 Costa Adeje Palace
address: Playa La Enramada La Caleta, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Situated just 50 metres from La Enramada Beach in Tenerife, H10 Costa Adeje Palace features large outdoor pools, a hot tub and spa. The chic rooms include a furnished balcony. The hotel runs a free shuttle service to the popular resort of Playa de las Americas, 4 km away. Costa Adeje Golf Course is less than 2 km away. The hotel also offers golf packages and special green fees for some courses. The luxurious Despacio Spa Centre has a heated indoor pool, gym and Turkish bath. Guests can also book health and beauty treatments. A full programme of sport and other activities is available. H10 Costa Adeje Palace offers many dining options, including buffet and á la carte restaurants. There is a poolside bar

name: Sbh Monica Beach Resort
address: Avenida Ltu 1 (Also Avenida Jahn Reisen ), Costa Calma, Pajara, Fuerteventura, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Metres from Fuerteventura's beautiful Costa Calma coastline and stunning beaches, this hotel has bedrooms overlooking the gardens or the Atlantic Ocean. Enjoy entertainment, 3 pools and fine dining. Set in 77,000 m², the SBH Monica Beach Resort enjoys a fabulous setting for enjoying Fuerteventura's sun, sea and sand. Take part in the entertainment programme which also performs live music and children's activities. Kids will also make new friends in the mini club. All the SBH Monica Beach Resort bedrooms boast a private balcony or terrace. Each one comes with satellite TV, a mini-fridge and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Stay active this holiday with a game of tennis, a challenging workout in the SBH Mónica's gym or a surf lesson. Then treat yourself to a massage or a session in the sauna, available for an extra cost. After a buffet meal head to the bar for a delicious cocktail. You can also enjoy afternoon tea and biscuits in the cafe.

name: Adrián Hoteles Colón Guanahaní Adultos Only
address: Avenida de Bruselas,9, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Situated in the exclusive area of Costa Adeje, on the island of Tenerife, this small and attractive colonial-style property is just a short walk from Playa Fanabe beach. Adrián Hoteles Colón Guanahaní offers various heated pools surrounded by beautifully tranquil gardens. There are also sun loungers surrounding the pool, providing you with the perfect place to relax during the day. Follow this with a relaxation session in the beauty salon. Breakfast and dinner can be enjoyed in the main restaurant, which is next to the swimming pool, and boasts a large terrace. During the day, you can sample a light snack or an à la carte lunch by the pool.

name: Relaxia Lanzaplaya
address: Calle México no 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Set in the Puerto del Carmen resort, this apartment complex is set overlooking the beach. It offers outdoor pools for adults and children, surrounded by sun terraces and loungers. The attractive apartments feature a private balcony or terrace. They come with a well-equipped kitchen and a lounge area with satellite TV. Relaxia Lanzaplaya offers a buffet restaurant, which often hosts themed dinners. Light meals are available from the poolside snack bar. Facilities at Lanzaplaya include ping pong and billiards. The lounge-bar has a TV with international channels. Located in the south of Lanzarote, the resort of Puerto del Carmen has many bars, restaurants and shops. Lanzarote Airport is 10 km away.

name: H10 Tindaya
address: Punta Del Roquito, 35627 Costa Calma, Fuerteventura
description: Set on the beautiful, white sandy beaches of the Costa Calma, this hotel is an ideal spot to enjoy a sunny break in Fuerteventura. This new hotel has been built in a modern, Canarian style and is set around 3 outdoor swimming pools. When not relaxing in the pool or on one of the sun loungers beside it you can head to the hotel’s spa centre for a session of pampering. Here you can enjoy a dip in the hydromassage or indoor pool, experience showers, a sauna, and a range of massage and beauty treatments. Out in the sunshine, you can have fun playing mini-golf whilst children enjoy themselves at the mini club. Then, round off the day with a meal at the buffet restaurant and drink at the bar.

name: Club Atlantico
address: Calle Pedro Barba 16, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Centrally located in Puerto del Carmen, Club Atlántico is just 200 metres from the beach, and features a heated outdoor swimming pool and children's pool. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each apartment is south-east facing and offers pool views from its balcony or terrace. They have a lounge with sofa bed, a full bathroom and a kitchenette with ceramic hob, toaster, microwave and kettle. Apartments also have satellite TV with a range of international channels. The Club Atlántico also has a poolside club house and there are plenty of sun beds available for relaxing by the pool. Every Friday there is a barbecue for all guests, and there is live entertainment on some evenings. The multi-lingual reception staff can assist with car and bike rental, organising trips and more. Puerto del Carmen is well known for its restaurants, bars and shops. Lanzarote Airport is about 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Paradise Park Fun Lifestyle Hotel
address: C/ Hawaii 2, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: Paradise Park Fun Lifestyle Hotel is ubicated in Los Cristianos in the south east end of the island of Tenerife, very close to Costa Adeje and Playa de las Americas. These are three of the most recognized touristic areas and is known for its excellence, pleasure ant entertainment is guaranteed. It has also become a reference for family tourism thanks to our facilities. If you are looking for a family hotel in Tenerife where you can enjoy a family vacation to the fullest. Despite being an unrestricted hotel for adults only, among the hotel facilities you will find Adults Only spaces where you can enjoy the tranquility, comfort and relaxation so characteristic of an adults only hotel in Tenerife.FarePortal

name: Catalonia Oro Negro
address: Arq. Gómez Cuesta 14, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: Catalonia Oro Negro is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Playa de las Américas Beach in southern Tenerife. The hotel features free WiFi, a large outdoor swimming pool and rooms with satellite TV. All rooms are bright and simply decorated with air conditioning. They have either a private balcony or terrace, some of which have sea views. Premium rooms have access to a rooftop pool, available only for guests over 18. Hotel Catalonia Oro Negro offers a buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner in the hotel restaurant. There are 2 bars, including the Show Bar which provides evening entertainment. A modern gym is also available at the Oro Negro. Daytime activities include aerobics, table tennis and volley ball. The hotel has a terrace with loungers, a garden and children’s playground. The Alegria onsite spa features massage services. Catalonia Oro Negro is located less than 1 km from the centre of Playa de las Américas and 20 km from Tenerife Sur Airport.

name: H10 Gran Tinerfe
address: Av. Rafael Puig Lluvina 13, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: H10 Gran Tinerfe is situated on Tenerife and provides 4-star accommodation as well as outdoor tennis courts. Guests also have exclusive access to the casino and Bar Discoteca Teide nightclub. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Guests can take advantage of the recreational activities available, such as an outdoor pool, billiards and a sauna. H10 Gran Tinerfe is an adults-only hotel. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They also offer a range of entertainment options, including a flat-screen TV. Guests of H10 Gran Tinerfe Hotel can sit down to a satisfying breakfast daily at Asensen Food & Experience, plus dinner at Los Menceyes after a day of sightseeing. Places to dine at the hotel include Mike's Coffee and El Mirador Brasserie. There is also a variety of beverages to choose from at the outdoor bar, which offers a view of the beach. There are a range of cafés and restaurants close to H10 Gran Tinerfe Hotel Tenerife, and Adeje and Costa Adeje are a brief drive away. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Playa de las Americas.Revato

name: Hd Parque Cristobal Tenerife
address: Rafael Puig Lluvina, 15, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: This extensive holiday complex offers spacious bungalow accommodation in the heart of Playa de las Américas, just 200 metres from the beaches of southern Tenerife. Enjoy a relaxing and fun family break in the year-round sunshine of this unique Canary Island with a stay at the Parque Cristóbal Tenerife. Its tropical gardens surround 2 huge outdoor swimming pools for adults, both heated in winter. Children can enjoy themselves in the supervised mini club or their own 2 swimming pools. Alternatively, stay active with a game on the tennis court or a session in the gym. Each apartment opens onto a private terrace and features a well-equipped kitchen.

name: Sol Barbacan
address: Av de Tirajana, 27, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Located in Playa del Inglés, Sol Barbacan is only 2 km from the nearest beach. The complex features a swimming pool, 2 hot tubs, and free WiFi in all areas. Sol Barbacan offers a buffet restaurant and an a la carte restaurant, as well as a pool bar and an evening lounge with a terrace. Set in gardens, the complex includes minigolf and beach volleyball facilities. There is also a gym and entertainment activities, including a kids’ club and teens’ club. Maspalomas Golf Course is a 5-minute drive from the property.

name: Hotel Tropical Park
address: Avda.el Jable N41, 38678 Callao Salvaje, Tenerife
description: Featuring apartments with balconies set around an outdoor pool with free sun loungers, Hotel Tropical Park is set just 150 metres from Callao Salvaje Beach. It has a buffet restaurant and a gym. Each apartment at the Hotel Tropical Park has modern décor with tiled floors. All come with air conditioning and a seating area with satellite TV. Kitchenettes are equipped with a microwave, fridge and kettle. Guests can enjoy a range of Spanish cuisine in the Tropical Grill Restaurant. Drinks are not included in half board. There is an on-site supermarket and a range of smaller shops within 5 minutes’ walk of the Hotel Tropical Park. The lively town of Playa de Las Américas is a 10-minute drive from the hotel, while Tenerife Sur Airport is just 15 km away.

name: Avanti Lifestyle Hotel - Only Adults
address: Delfin, 1, 35660 Corralejo, Fuerteventura
description: AVANTI Lifestyle Hotel - Only Adults is located opposite the beach, in the old town of Corralejo. It features a restaurant and a roof terrace with a hot tub. This small, adults-only hotel offers room looking onto the ocean or the town of Corralejo. The chic rooms at AVANTI Lifestyle Hotel - Only Adults have minimalist, white décor with turquoise finishes. All rooms have free WiFi, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The restaurant serves Spanish cuisine and specialises in seafood, paella and fish dishes. The terrace offers ocean views. There is a lounge on the terrace. On the rooftop guests will find a solarium, a bar and a restaurant. Guests can practice a wide range of water sport activities in the area such as paddle surf, kite-surf, diving, and sailing. Corralejo Nature Reserve is within 3 km of the hotel. Puerto del Rosario and Fuerteventura Airport are less than 45 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Suite Villa Maria
address: Av. De Los Acantilados, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: This 5-star hotel complex is located 1 km from La Caleta de Adeje Beach, in south-west Tenerife. It offers villas with furnished terraces and views of the Atlantic Ocean and the island of La Gomera. Some villas at Hotel Suite Villa María have a hot tub and others have a private pool. All have free internet access and feature a lounge with flat-screen satellite TV, a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with hydromassage shower. A buffet breakfast is served daily at Villa María. The á la carte La Torre Restaurant serves traditional Canarian dishes while the Pool Bar offers light snacks and drinks. The hotel can organise excursions, including green fees for Costa Adeje Golf Course, located less than 1 km away. Car rental service can also be arranged at the property. A free shuttle service to Plaza del Duque Shopping centre is provided twice a day. Tenerife South Airport can be reached by car in 25 minutes.

name: Apartamentos Parque del Sol
address: Calle Londres 11, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Set in Adeje, 400 metres from Playa de Fanabe, Apartamentos Parque del Sol offers accommodation with free WiFi, a terrace or a balcony and access to a garden and a year-round outdoor pool. Featuring a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Apartamentos Parque del Sol you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Mexican and Spanish cuisine. The accommodation offers 3-star accommodation with a beauty services, fitness room and solarium. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Apartamentos Parque del Sol, while cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Torviscas Beach, El Duque Beach and Enramada Beach. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 21 km from Apartamentos Parque del Sol.

name: Elba Carlota Beach & Convention
address: Avenida de Las Marismas 3, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: Elba Carlota Beach & Convention Resort is set within Fuerteventura Golf Club and a few metres from the beach. This resort features a casino, 2 outdoor swimming pools, sports facilities and 2 restaurants. Rooms at the Elba Carlota are spacious and bright. All rooms are air conditioned and have a minibar and satellite TV. The resort offers guests a wide range of dining options, including Tindaya Buffet Restaurant and El Arrecife Restaurant, which serves Italian dishes. The Chiringuito Restaurant and Bar is set on a small island opposite the hotel and serves seafood cuisine. The Elba features a heated swimming pool, a hot tub and gym. There are beach volley ball courts, tennis courts and a shooting range. There is also evening entertainment for adults and daytime activities arranged for children. Gran Casino Antigua Fuerteventura is located inside the hotel. It offers a range of games including Roulette, Black Jack and Texas Hold 'Em. The Costa Calma is an ideal location for activities such as golf, sailing and surfing.

name: H10 Las Palmeras
address: Avenida Rafael Puig, 28, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: H10 Las Palmeras is situated on Tenerife and offers 4-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi and outdoor tennis courts. This modern hotel is close to everything Playa de las Americas has to offer. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Guests can benefit from the in-house fitness centre and outdoor pool. The hotel also has its very own gym, Swimming Pool. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. All offer an in-room safe, an in-room closet and a telephone. Guests of H10 Hotel Las Palmeras Tenerife are invited to sample Italian cuisine at Specchio Magico, or try Asian dishes at Sakura Teppanyaki. Places to dine at the hotel include Mike's Coffee and Garoé. Tenerife South Airport is less than a 20-minute drive from H10 Las Palmeras Hotel Tenerife. It is also a short drive from Adeje and Los Cristianos.Revato

name: Coral Ocean View - Adults Only
address: Avenida de Los Pueblos, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Coral Ocean View - Adults Only is set on Tenerife and provides 4-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. It is also moments from Playa de las Americas's well-known tourist spots. Guests staying at Coral Ocean View - Adults Only can enjoy taking a dip in the swimming pool, working out in the gym or relaxing with a drink in the on site bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can help with booking tours and tickets. Coral Ocean View - Adults Only is an adults-only hotel. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a kitchenette, a private balcony and a refrigerator. Bathrooms are equipped with necessities such as slippers and bathrobes. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Guests can also try one of the various bars and cafés nearby. Local attractions close to the hotel include Aqualand Costa Adeje, Siam Park and The Patch. Those wishing to discover the region are able to visit Adeje, situated within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: Los Olivos Beach Resort
address: Paris, 1, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: With a stay at Los Olivos Beach Resort in Adeje (Costa Adeje), you'll be a 4-minute walk from Fanabe Beach and 13 minutes by foot from El Duque Beach. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Elba Sara Beach & Golf Resort
address: Carretera de Jandia, Km. 11, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: Located on Caleta de Fuste Beach in Fuerteventura, Hotel Elba Sara has an outdoor pool, tennis court and free parking nearby. Fuerteventura Golf Course is a 10-minute drive away. All air-conditioned rooms at the Elba Sara Beach & Golf Hotel have a private balcony, most with superb ocean views. There is a minibar, TV and private bathroom. The hotel’s restaurant serves buffet meals, and has a terrace overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. There is also a poolside grill bar, and a snack bar at the beach. The Sara Beach & Golf Resort features a gym, hot tub and sauna. There is also mini golf, ping pong and a pool table. Children have a dedicated pool, play area and supervised activities club. Fuerteventura Thalasso Spa is 400 metres from the hotel.

name: Gran Melia Palacio de Isora
address: Avenida Los Océanos, s/n, Alcalá, 38686 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: With its privileged Oceanfront location, this spectacular Design Hotel offers stunning views of the island La Gomera and Mount Teide. It is perfectly integrated in the South west coast of Tenerife, in the fishing village Alcala, Guia de Isora. The resort is at five minutes car distance from the beautiful Los Gigantes cliffs, while offering an inspiring proposal to live magic moments and new sensations. Highlights are the impressive colonial Plaza with fountains and chill-out corners and the huge sea water lagoon infinity pool. In addition various fresh water pools, including a pool only for adults, a family pool and a separate childrens pool, as well as the exclusive RedLevel pool. 6 Restaurants, 6 Bars, Yhi Spa with thermal circuit and Yhi Moves, a 24 hours fitness centre. The resort also offers a programme of life enriching activities, professional animation, tennis and paddle courts, archery, miniclub and subtropical gardens. The glorious room facilities are all very spacious with beautiful garden and ocean views and a minimum of 48sqm with private terrace of balcony. The exclusive RedLevel Demi Suites and Oceanfront Garden Villas offer an even superior level of luxury and personalised service, for adults only.priceline.com

name: Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur
address: C/ Roque Nublo, 1, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: This colonial-style hotel on the Costa Adeje features a luxurious spa and beautiful views of the Atlantic Ocean. It offers 5 swimming pools, surrounded by sun terraces and gardens. The elegant rooms at the Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur have a balcony and sea views. They include an interactive flat-screen TV, and a separate hydromassage shower and bath. Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur includes the Nammu Spa with thermal circuits. Massage and beauty treatments are also available. Duque Beach is just 500 metres from the hotel and there is also a fitness centre on-site. Bicycle and car rental can be organised for guests. There are 2 restaurants at the Vincci La Plantación del Sur, one serves creative Canarian cuisine using local produce; the second one, is specialised in charcoal-grilled meat. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. There is also a bar. Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur is 20 minutes’ by car from Reina Sofía Airport.

name: Royal Sunset Beach Club
address: Calle Londres 6, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Royal Sunset Beach Club offers the convenience of at-home living, fantastic on-site amenities and close proximity to the beach. When youre not relaxing in your spacious Apartment, youll have the choice of playing pool, table tennis, squash or other recreational games on-site. Royal Sunset Beach Clubs great location one block from Playa de Fanabe allows you to instantly grab a sunset drink at a beachside bar, swim in the sea or experience the many restaurants and shops along the coast. No matter if youre a sunseeker or a foodie, you and your group will find everything you need in or around Royal Sunset Beach Club.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Floresta
address: Calle Mercurio, 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Hotel Floresta offers spacious apartments located 200 metres from Lanzarote’s Playa de los Pocillos Beach. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool and tennis courts. The apartments are modern and practical with a seating area and air conditioning. They can accommodate up to 2 adults and 2 children. Guests can enjoy a restaurant and bar at Floresta apartments Lanzarote, as well as a terrace to enjoy meals and drinks outside. There are also gardens, play areas for children and an entertainment programme for all ages.

name: Club Tenerife
address: Los Diamantes II Urb. Oasis Del Sur, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: Featuring a shared outdoor heated swimming pool, Club Tenerife Apartments is located in Los Cristianos, a 15-minute walk from the beach. This property offers a sun terrace and a pool snack bar. All apartments have a living space with a sofa, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safe to rent, and a dining table, as well as a kitchen equipped with an oven, fridge, microwave, and electric kettle. There is a private bathroom and a balcony. Some apartments offer views of the pool. The property has a shared terrace, games room, and library. A shuttle service to the airport is available for an extra charge. You can find a restaurant, bar, and grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of Club Tenerife Apartments. Los Cristianos Port, with ferry services to La Palma and La Gomera, is 2.6 km from the property, and Tenerife Sur Airport is 15 minutes away by car.

name: Holiday Inn Express Bilbao
address: Zarandoa Kalea, 5, 48160 Derio, Biscay
description: Comfortable hotel close to Bilbao, with breakfast, free Wi-Fi and free airport shuttle. Holiday Inn Express Bilbao is only 2 km from Bilbao Airport and 20 minutes from the city centre by bus. There are plenty of green areas around to go for walks. The sights of Bilbao city centre can be reached by car or by bus that departs from outside the airport. The iconic, Frank Gehry-designed Guggenheim Museum Bilbao houses a world-renowned collection of modern art. There's also a Fine Arts Museum, and in the delightful Old Town, you can eat traditional pintxos and browse independent shops. At this hotel, you can enjoy: - A free shuttle bus to and from the airport - A continental Express Start Breakfast, included in the room rate - Free Wi-Fi - Complimentary on-site parking during your stay - Family rooms that sleep up to 4 guests, max 2 adults/room. In the spacious lobby, you can sit back on one of the comfy sofas and enjoy a drink from the bar. For lunch or dinner you don’t need to head far: next door to the hotel, Urbe Restaurant offers seasonal Spanish dishes, and there are plenty more options within a short drive.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Vallemar
address: Avenida de Colon 4, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Just 300 metres from Puerto de la Cruz’s beaches and the pools at Lago Martiánez, Hotel Vallemar offers stylish rooms with balconies. It features an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace with fantastic views over the Atlantic Ocean. Each spacious, air-conditioned room at Hotel Vallemar features classic-style décor. All rooms come with a TV, minibar and a private bathroom. Rooms offer garden or ocean views. A buffet breakfast is served in the Vallemar’s restaurant, which also hosts themed dinners with a range of Canarian and international dishes. You can enjoy a drink and snacks on the poolside terrace, and there is also a bar with live entertainment. The hotel is next to Puerto de la Cruz’s oceanfront promenade, and shops, bars and restaurants can be found nearby. Plaza del Charco Square is a 5-minute walk away. Los Rodeos Airport is a 15-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Blue Sea Costa Jardin & Spa
address: Guerrero, 14, Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Set in tropical gardens, Blue Sea Costa Jardin & Spa is just over 1 km from the beaches at Puerto de la Cruz. It features a spa, outdoor swimming pool and rooms with balconies. Blue Sea Costa Jardin & Spa offers bright, air-conditioned accommodation with satellite TV and a minibar. Each of its rooms has a fully equipped bathroom. The hotel’s El Drago buffet restaurant serves a selection of Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a poolside bar overlooking the hotel’s attractive grounds. The spa features a hydromassage tub and sauna, and offers a range of treatments including massage. There is also a gym on site. The centre of Puerto de la Cruz can be reached in around 5 minutes by foot and there is a golf course just 2 km from the hotel. The impressive Mount Teide Park is approximately 15 km from Blue Sea Costa Jardin & Spa.

name: Mynd Adeje
address: Calle el Jable 36, 38678 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Situated in Adeje, 500 metres from Playa de Ajabo, MYND Adeje features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. 1.6 km from Las Galgas Beach and 2.2 km from Playa El Pinque, the property offers a restaurant and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, all rooms at MYND Adeje have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also boast a terrace. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or vegan options. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. Playa Las Salinas is 2.6 km from MYND Adeje, while Aqualand is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: Barceló Tenerife Royal Level
address: Avenida Greñamora 1, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Barcelo Tenerife Royal Level has 59 fully equipped and renovated rooms. A range of exclusive gastronomy options and the Magma performance hall. It also includes other original proposals for leisure and rest such as a navigable lake; a climbing wall; a gym; a recreational sports area with a beach volleyball court; basketball; tennis and paddle tennis; eight swimming pools /two of which are heated throughout the year/ and a Wellness area.Barcelo.com

name: Alua Atlantico Golf
address: Avenida Del Atlántico, 3, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in San Miguel de Abona. Boasting a kids' club, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, indoor pool, karaoke and a 24-hour front desk. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bath and a desk. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. The establishment also offers My Favourite Club®, with exclusive services and special attributes in room categories. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive The accommodation offers a terrace. You can play table tennis, and tennis at Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Playa San Miguel de Abona, Playa El Barranco and Playa de San Blas. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur, 10 km from Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Coral Compostela Beach Golf
address: Calle Arenales, 16, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: Apartment complex situated n the south side of the Las Américas Golf Course, and only 800 metres from Las Vistas Beach. Two-floor building comprised of fully-equipped apartments of one or two rooms, creating a pleasant ambience. The premises also comprise an a la carte restaurant, bar, and a fresh water swimming pool that is heated in winter. The offering of nearby restaurants and leisure possibilities is considerable, owing to the hotel’s advantageous location. The complex also offers an entertainment program and sells green fees for the golf course. It is, without a doubt, an ideal place for golfers, or families who want to spend their holidays in a tranquil atmosphere. A children's club is also available.

name: Hotel Estefania Boutique Suites
address: 2 Calle Llano del Grillo, 38652 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: No description found

name: Apartamentos HG Tenerife Sur
address: Avenida de Ámsterdam, 3, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: Hg Tenerife Sur Apartments are a 10-minute walk from Los Cristianos Beach, in southern Tenerife. Set in gardens, they offer 2 outdoor pools, a sauna and squash court. All Canarian style apartments at HG Tenerife Sur have a private terrace and TV. Satellite TV is available for surcharge. There is a private bathroom, and a kitchenette equipped with a fridge, kettle, toaster and electric hob. There is a bar and a restaurant at the Hg Tenerife Sur apartment complex. Wired internet is available in public areas for an extra charge, and there is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. The complex has a games room and a children’s play area. There is easy access to the TF1 Motorway, and Playa de las Americas and Las Americas Golf Course are a 5-minute drive away.

name: Las Terrazas de Abama Suites
address: Carretera General, TF- 47 Km9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: Offering an outdoor pool and views of the sea, Las Terrazas de Abama Suites is situated within the Abama Golf Course, and features stunning views of La Gomera and the Teide Volcano. Set in a luxurious complex, this property is surrounded by beautiful gardens. Some suites feature views of the sea and the golf course, while others feature views of the complex. Guests can benefit from a free transfer to the facilities within the property and the beach. Featuring a terrace, each air-conditioned suite features a dining area and a living space with a satellite flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher, oven and microwave. A refrigerator and kettle are also featured. Other facilities on site include the Melvin Restaurant, offers guests a variety of dining options. The menu, designed by Berasategui, is a special selection of local products that constitutes a unique culinary offer. There is also a gourmet shop at Abama Terraces, offering a wide range of local artisan products and an exquisite selection of wines. Puerto de la Cruz is 37 km from Las Terrazas de Abama Suites. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 26 km from the property.

name: Gf Fañabe
address: Avda de Bruselas 13, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Situated 500 metres from Fañabe Beach in Costa Adeje, Tenerife, GF Fañabe has a large year-round outdoor pool and sun terrace. The colourful rooms have air conditioning and balconies. GF Fañabe has a basketball court and mini golf. The wellness centre offers massages, sauna and hot tub. Two more pools can be found on the roof terrace. There is also a separate area for naturists. There is a kids’ club and an entertainment team that organizes a range of daytime and night time activities. A pool for children is also available. The GF Fañabe’s restaurant offers a varied buffet with show cooking and regular themed dinners. The informal pool bar serves light meals and cocktails, while the hall bar offers live music. Free WiFi is also provided.

name: Amarilla Golf Residences
address: Avenida María Ángeles Ascanio Cullen, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: With Playa El Barranco reachable in less than 1 km, Amarilla Golf Residences offers accommodation, a restaurant, an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and a garden. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a dishwasher, and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. A microwave and kettle are also provided. Guests at Amarilla Golf Residences can enjoy a buffet breakfast. If you would like to discover the area, hiking is possible in the surroundings. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa San Miguel de Abona, Playa Colmenares and Golf del Sur. The nearest airport is Tenerife South, 6 km from Amarilla Golf Residences, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Abama
address: Carretera General, TF-47, km 9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: The Ritz-Carlton Tenerife, Abama is an oasis of tranquility and seclusion, where sea, land and subtropical vegetation effortlessly collide with Moorish-inspired architecture. The 459 guest rooms & suites - divided between the Citadel and four exclusive rows of villas - enjoy magnificent views over the Atlantic Ocean, Mount Teide or our lush gardens. The resort offers a collection of restaurants ranging from light, simple cooking to world-class gourmet cuisine. At the top end of the scale, our Michelin-starred restaurants - M.B awarded with two stars and Kabuki with one. Providing a heaven of escape, this timeless island retreat features 7 swimming pools, a 2500m2 Spa & Fitness Center and the largest Ritz Kids in Europe. Guests can enjoy an 18-hole championship golf course designed by Ryder Cup player Dave Thomas, the Abama Tennis Academy, and an exclusive area on the Abama beach with complimentary use of sunbeds and umbrellas, serviced by our Ladies & Gentlemen.Marriott

name: Flamingo Suites Boutique Hotel
address: Avda De Espana 6 - San Eugenio Bajo, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Hotel Flamingo Suites is a popular choice amongst travelers in Tenerife, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Facilities like Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, airport transfer, babysitting, family room are readily available for you to enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hot tub, sauna, golf course (on site), outdoor pool, diving. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Tenerife, Hotel Flamingo Suites will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas
address: Calle Landa Golf, 1, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: Set in magnificent tropical gardens, 1 km from water park Siam Park, the colonial-style Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas features 3 outdoor pools. It offers a free shuttle bus to the beach, a 20-minute walk away. Bright, spacious apartments and suites have air-conditioning, and living room with a TV and sofa bed. Private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. All apartments and suites have a dining area and kitchenette with a fridge, microwave, kettle and coffee maker. Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas has a restaurant, and the snack bar overlooks the pools. A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered, and there is a mini-market on-site. Green Garden Eco Resort & Villas features a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. There is parking on-site.

name: Coral Compostela Beach
address: 8 Av. Las Américas, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: On the beach front of the popular "Las Américas", this is a pleasant complex with gardens, and very near the commercial area of the town and the famous atmosphere at Arona. The rooms are distributed between 8 buildings and over 4 floors and all comprise a double room, balcony or terrace, kitchen and lounge. The restaurant offers a la carte service and menus, and there is also a snack bar where you can grab a bite. This is a great option to enjoy holidays with the family in complete independence, with all services within easy reach. Sport lovers can take advantage of the various golf courses nearby, or the water sports on offer.

name: Los Jardines de Abama Suites
address: Carretera General, TF 47 KM 9, 38687 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: Situated in Guía de Isora, 2.8 km from Playa del Barranco de Erques, Los Jardines de Abama Suites features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms are equipped with a kettle, while some rooms include a balcony and others also boast pool views. At Los Jardines de Abama Suites rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel. Los Gigantes is 13 km from Los Jardines de Abama Suites, while Aqualand is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 34 km from the hotel.

name: Wyndham Residences Tenerife Costa Adeje
address: Calle Finalandia No 8, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Thank you for choosing our Wyndham Hotels and Resorts. Wyndham Hotels and Resorts is the crown jewel of the Wyndham family. Situated in spectacular resort and urban destinations, each Wyndham Grand provides a one-of-a-kind experience with compelling local flavor, attentive service, relaxing surroundings and thoughtful touches. Guestrooms are comfortable and refined, dining experiences are crafted by master chefs and artfully appointed lounges invite you to linger.  Flexible meeting spaces, elegant halls and sophisticated media offerings ensure a memorable and successful social or business event.Wyndham

name: Gran Oasis Resort
address: Meandro, 3, Golf las Américas, 38650 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Gran Oasis Resort is a luxury aparthotel, set next to Las Américas Golf Course. Set in gardens, this complex has a large outdoor swimming pool and views of the Atlantic Ocean. The hotel is set between Playa de Las Américas and Los Cristianos. The nearest beach is less than 2km away. The Oasis resort offers a bus service to the beach and Siam Park. The Gran Oasis has comfortable, bright apartments with one or 2 bedrooms. They all have a kitchenette, air conditioner and satellite TV. The complex has a bar and a restaurant. There is a 24-hour reception in the hotel, offering currency exchange, car rental. There is also a tour desk and a small supermarket. The rooms have air conditioning.

name: Parque la Paz
address: Luis Díaz de Losada, 2, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Hotel Parque La Paz Tenerife is located just 150 metres from the Playa de las Americas. Situated in the resort centre, it offers free parking. The apartments are practical and light, with a living room and a bedroom. They also have a kitchenette and a terrace. All apartments have a TV and safe. The Parque La Paz complex has a large freeform swimming pool, plus a small one for children. It also has a large area for sunbathing. You can find plenty to choose from in the hotel’s buffet restaurant. The hotel also organises occasional poolside barbeques. Drinks can be found in the bar lounge or poolside bar. Playa de las Americas is a popular area in the south of Tenerife. Parque La Paz is surrounded by shopping centres, restaurants, bars, parks and gardens, and entertainment.

name: Hovima Santa María
address: Avenida De Espana 10, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Just 300 metres from La Pinta Beach in Playa Fañabe, HOVIMA Santa María offers tennis courts and outdoor pools, 1 heated in winter. Apartments and studios have furnished terraces and well-equipped kitchenettes. Each bright HOVIMA studio has 2 single beds, a sofa bed, satellite TV and a rental safe. Apartments have separate bedrooms and living areas. Kitchenettes include a hob, toaster and kettle. HOVIMA Santa María’s restaurant serves varied buffet meals. You can relax with a drink in the bar, or enjoy the nightly entertainment. The complex has a 24-hour reception, where beach towels, currency exchange, car hire and babysitting services can be arranged. Staff are happy to provide information about the surrounding area. A range of shops and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk, while Colón Marina is 350 metres away. Tenerife Sur Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Servatur Caribe
address: V Centenario, 38670 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: These apartments are in Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas resort, 100 metres from Magma Conference Centre and 600 metres from Siam Park. There is an outdoor pool and all apartments have a private balcony. There is a tennis court and a games room at Servatur Caribe. Golf Las Americas is under 1 km away. The property has a tour desk and you can hire a car, electric motorbikes or bicycles at the apartments. a 24-hour reception is available for guests. Only a few kilometres from the Caribe Apartments you can discover rural attractions such as Barrance del Infierno Cliff, Teide National Park and several charming, small towns. Premium One Bedroom Apartment Pool View + Premium One Bedroom Apartment Sea View offer improved bedroom comfort, reclinable chairs, bedroom towards pool, bathroom with hairdryer as well as a bottle of sparkling wine and snacks on arrival.

name: Hotel Botanico & The Oriental Spa Garden
address: Avenida Richard Yeoward, 1, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Hotel Botanico y Oriental Spa Garden offers 3 outdoor pools and luxurious accommodation set in attractive gardens, overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and Mount Teide. Free unlimited spa access is included for all guests over 16 years old. Hotel Botanico Tenerife’s spacious rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV and views of the ocean, mountains or hotel gardens. All rooms have a large, fully equipped bathroom. The 3,500 m2 spa includes an indoor swimming pool, as well as outdoor pools, a Japanese sauna, and Turkish baths. Beauty treatments including massages and aromatherapy are available. There are 4 restaurants on site, offering Asian, Spanish and Italian dishes. The La Palmera restaurant features an outdoor dining area in the gardens, where you can also find an elegant cocktail bar. Jardin Beach is a 10-minute drive from the property.

name: Beverly Hills Heights - Excel Hotels & Resorts
address: Urb. Oasis Del Sur, C. Sierra Nevada, 1, 38650 Arona, Tenerife
description: Located in Los Cristianos, Beverly Hills Heights provides free WiFi. Guests can benefit from an all year round outdoor swimming pool. This 3-star hotel offers free shuttle service to the city centre. All guest rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, microwave, a kettle, a bath and a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom. At Beverly Hills Heights, each room comes with a seating area. Pool and sea view area available subject to availability. Buffet breakfast and dinner are available at our sister property. Guests can make use of a bar. When booking half board or full board, please note that drinks are not included. Excursions can be booked at reception. Playa de las Americas is 2.4 km from the accommodation, while Puerto de la Cruz is 75 km from the property. Tenerife Sur Airport is 12 km away.

name: Royal Hideaway Corales Suites - by Barceló Hotel Group
address: Avenida Virgen de Guadalupe 21, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
