description: Spacious and modern apartment style Deluxe Suites with 1 2 or 3 bedrooms for all guests. Terrace with ocean views and many also have a private pool.Family friendly.Wide gastronomy offer in exclusive restaurants.1.000 m2 Spa and Wellness Centre 16 yearsBarcelo.com

name: Royal Sun Resort
address: C/ Los Geranios, 16, 38683 Los Gigantes, Tenerife
description: Set by Los Gigantes Cliffs, Royal Sun Resort Tenerife features outdoor swimming pools with fantastic panoramic views of the coast. The resort offers stylish apartments with private, furnished terraces. Each apartment at Royal Sun Resort includes a lounge area with sofas and flat-screen satellite TV. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, microwave and dishwasher, and the bathroom has a circular bath tub and free toiletries. By the pool is Oasis Abraxas bar, and the resort also has a range of other bars with live entertainment, as well as the buffet restaurant Regency and the à la carte restaurant Aqua. Royal Sun Los Gigantes has a gym and a squash court. Safes, a laundry service and Wi-Fi internet are available at an extra cost. Staff can provide tourist information and help arrange car rental or airport transfers. Royal Sun Apartments Los Gigantes is 1.5 km from both Los Gigantes Harbour and Puerto de Santiago.

name: Flamingo Beach Mate
address: Avenida de España, No3, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Flamingo Beach Mate is set in Adeje and has an outdoor swimming pool, a children's pool, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the various facilities are a terrace and a bar. The accommodation offers free WiFi. All rooms, apartments and studios in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each is equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while apartments will provide you with a kitchen. Guest rooms are fitted with a seating area. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Flamingo Beach Mate. There is also a snack bar. Staff at the reception can provide guidance on what to do in the area. Popular points of interest near Flamingo Beach Mate include La Pinta Beach, San Eugenio Shopping Centre and Gran Sur Shopping Centre. Tenerife Sur Airport is 16 km away.

name: Labranda Bahía Fañabé & Villas
address: Avenida de Bruselas, 5-7, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Labranda Baha Faab & Villas is a charming hotel located in the south of Tenerife, in the tourist area of Playa Faab in Costa Adeje, just a 5-minute walk from the famous beaches of El Duque and Faab. Close to a diverse selection of shops, restaurants, bars and night clubs. Transportation is also easily accessible with nearby bus stops and taxi stop. The complex is made up of 180 bright, spacious and comfortable apartments. They are also surrounded by gardens and swimming pools.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Tigaiga
address: Parque Taoro 28, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens, Hotel Tigaiga offers an outdoor swimming pool and restaurant with terrace. Each air-conditioned room features a private balcony with sea or mountain views. Free WiFi is provided. The Tigaiga Hotel is set in a quiet area of Tenerife’s Puerto de la Cruz, next to Taoro Park. Playa Jardín Beach is 900 metres away and Martianez Lake is within a 30-minute walk. Teide National Park is 40 km away. Guests at the Tigaiga can relax under palm trees and enjoy a massage, or visit the hotel’s sauna. There is also a table tennis table and a lounge. The Tigaiga’s tour desk offers information about the local area, including visits to Mount Teide. Staff at reception can arrange car rental. Free parking is available on site.

name: Coral Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Calle Noelia Afonso Cabrera, 10, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Located 400 metres from the beach in Playa de las Américas, this adults-only design hotel offers a spa and outdoor pool. The rooftop terrace enjoys stunning views over the Atlantic. The Coral Suites & Spa offers stylish accommodation, decorated in bold colours. Rooms include a kitchen and a balcony. The lounge area comes with a sofa and flat-screen TV. Sunprime Coral Suites is situated near the beaches of Troya and Las Vistas. The Las Américas Golf Course is also within walking distance. Guests can enjoy breakfast and dinner in the Nuevo restaurant with views over the pool. There is a poolside bar and the Lobby Bar where cocktails are available.

name: Hotel Baobab Suites
address: Roques Del Salmor 5, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Set 10 minutes’ walk from Duque Beach in a residential area of Costa Adeje, Hotel Baobab Suites offers 2 heated outdoor pool and sun terrace, Saplings Kids club and Squash. Featuring a white, modern décor and large windows, each bright suite includes a living-dining area with a flat-screen TV. Their kitchen areas include an oven, microwave, dishwasher and washing machine. Free WiFi is available throughout. Guests can enjoy a welcome package. The hotel offers 3 breakfast options; Breakfast box can be delivered in the privacy and intimacy of the suite. Also, breakfast is served at Bite Buffet restaurant. The centre of Costa Adeje is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Baobab Suites and offers a selection of restaurants, bars and shops. Sports and activities such as spinning, pilates, yoga, meditation, and beach volleyball are organized at the on-site Activate sports and leisure center, which also offers paddle tennis courts and boules. Wellness and beauty Centre based on Ayurveda. Teide National Park is around 45 minutes’ drive away, while Tenerife South Airport is just a 20-minute drive from the complex. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Alua Tenerife
address: C. Antonio Ruiz Alvarez 7, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Alua Tenerife is 300 metres from Playa Jardín and 10 minutes’ walk from Puerto de la Cruz. It has 2 outdoor pools a children and an adult one, a buffet restaurant and a free pitch and putt golf course. Guests have access to an indoor pool, sauna and hot tub for an extra charge. Facilities also include gym, tennis and squash courts. The establishment offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: - personalized check-in and check-out, access to My Favorite Club Lounge with snacks and drinks, - access to exclusive areas - and welcome bottle of sparkling wine and a letter from the General Manager at check-in. Each room comes with a fridge, balcony or terrace and satellite TV. A safe, cot or extra bed are available on request. Air conditioning is available during certain hours of the day throughout the summer months. Free WiFi is available in rooms. There is a small on-site shopping centre including a supermarket. There is a children’s play area and a games room. There is a bus station 15 minutes’ walk away in Puerto de la Cruz offering services to other parts of the island.

name: Hotel Rural Finca La Hacienda
address: Nuestra Senora De Lourdes, 2, 38470 Los Silos, Tenerife
description: Hotel Rural Finca La Hacienda offers rustic apartments, 13 km from Icod de los Vinos, Tenerife. Set in gardens with sun terraces and barbecue facilities, all apartments offer mountain views. Apartments feature wooden floors and heating. The living room has a satellite TV and sofa or sofa bed. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. The kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Breakfast is available in the buffet restaurant and there is a bar. Packed lunches can also be requested. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are offered. There is a tour desk, where you can hire a car or bicycle, and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. A wide range of hiking trails can be found very nearby.

name: Hotel Jardines de Nivaria
address: Paris S.N., 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: The luxurious Hotel Jardines de Nivaria is set next to Fañabé Beach in southern Tenerife. It offers exotic gardens with 2 outdoor pools, a spa and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private balcony. The air-conditioned rooms at the Jardines de Nivaria Hotel feature modern décor and tiled floors. They are equipped with satellite TV and the balconies are furnished with loungers. The extensive leisure facilities include a putting green, tennis court and a fitness centre. The hotel’s spa features a sauna, steam bath and Vichy shower. This member of Adrian Hotels in Tenerife serves an extensive buffet breakfast. There is also a poolside bar and 3 restaurants, including an international buffet and a gourmet restaurant. The Cúpula Restaurant is set beneath an impressive stained-glass dome. There are 3 golf courses within a 10-minute drive from the Jardines de Nivaria. Tenerife Sur Airport is just 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Checkin Bungalows Atlantida
address: Avenida Londres, 3, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: With fantastic facilities, Checkin Bungalows Atlántida are perfect for combining independence and a fun-filled holiday in the Tenerife sunshine with all the family. Make the most of the sports facilities and the 3 swimming pools, 2 of which are heated during winter season. Checkin Bungalows Atlántida has outstanding possibilities for keeping active during your holiday. Gather a group of friends for a game of tennis or squash. Soak up the sunshine beside the pool and then play mini golf or basketball in the fresh air. Relax with a refreshment in the restaurant or bar with large sun terrace. Checkin Bungalows Atlántida is situated in the fishing and sailing village of Cristianos, near Tenerife's wonderful beaches and views of the Atlantic Ocean.

name: Labranda Suites Costa Adeje
address: Avenida Bruselas 8, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: LABRANDA Suites Costa Adeje is located in a coastal area that bears the same name and is one of the main tourist spots on the island of Tenerife, next to Playa de Las Américas-Los Cristianos and Puerto de la Cruz in the Spanish Canary Islands. Very close to the hotel is the Blue Flag beach of Playa Fañabé where guests can enjoy various aquatic activities. The hotel is also near several shops and restaurants for families, couples, groups of friends or solo travelers to explore. Rooms at LABRANDA Suites Costa Adeje are distributed in two areas: Family and Only Adults. Each has been designed for a specific type of traveler. Therefore, guests with families have their section and adult only type travelers have their own. The space for families has facilities that entertain both adults and children. Amenities for children include a play area, splash park, pool and sports area. The hotel also has a stage where family and kid friendly entertainment can be enjoyed. This portion of the hotel is also home to the Meepo Club, Kids & Teens Club and includes amusement arcade room. The adults only section seeks to provide this distinct group of guests with a truly relaxed vacation. Amongst the unique facilities in this section is a well-structured outdoor space with Balinese beds, a solarium and pool. This section also offers a more refined food & beverage proposition to suit this consumer segment. The adults-only rooftop area provides guests with an exclusive space that includes showers and a bar service from where they can enjoy magnificent sunsetsOfficial Hotel Information

name: Bahia Principe Sunlight Tenerife
address: Idafe Urb Playa Paraiso, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Featuring outdoor pools, sun terraces and on-site restaurants, Bahia Principe Tenerife is set on the Costa Adeje coast, 10 minutes’ drive from Adeje town and Costa Adeje Golf Club. The property includes an on-site gym, tennis courts, spa and children’s playground. You will also find entertainment options such as karaoke. Air-conditioned rooms come with a private balcony and TV. They each have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Playa de las Americas is a 20-minute drive away, and there you will find a range of shops and dining options. Tenerife Sur Airport can also be reached in 20 minutes’ drive.

name: The Villas at Bahia del Duque
address: Avenida de Bruselas, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: With pool views, The Villas at Bahia del Duque is set in Adeje and has a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, bar, garden, sun terrace and children's playground. Both WiFi and private parking are available at the villa free of charge. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with bathrobes, bidet, bath and shower. A microwave, a fridge and minibar are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A continental breakfast is available every morning at The Villas at Bahia del Duque. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a spa facilities, wellness packages and beauty services. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at The Villas at Bahia del Duque, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the villa include El Duque Beach, Enramada Beach and Playa de Fanabe. The nearest airport is Tenerife South, 21 km from The Villas at Bahia del Duque, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel
address: Urbanizacion Golf Del Sur, 38620 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel is situated on Tenerife and provides 5-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. Popular amenities, such as a sauna and a swimming pool, make for an enjoyable stay in San Miguel de Abona. The hotel treats guests to a variety of recreational facilities, such as billiards, a playground and Swimming pool. For those travelling with children Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel offers a games room and a kids pool. Rooms have a modern décor, air-conditioning and a refrigerator. They come with tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and an in-room dining area. Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel provides a variety of places to dine, including Golden Buffet and Piano Bar. Eateries at the hotel include Cakes & Bakes Café and Spice Garden. A selection of dining options can also be found in the area. Grand Muthu Golf Plaza Hotel has easy access to Amarilla Golf and Country Club. For guests with a car, parking is available and Granadilla de Abona is a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Regency Country Club, Apartments Suites
address: Calle Armiche, 1, 38650 Chayofa, Tenerife
description: Located in Arona, Regency Country Club CHAFOYA is a perfect starting point from which to explore Tenerife. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Regency Country Club CHAFOYA. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Regency Country Club CHAFOYA combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Tenerife unforgettable.Agoda

name: Hollywood Mirage - Excel Hotels & Resorts
address: Calle Sierra Nevada, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: Set in Los Cristianos, Hollywood Mirage - Excel Hotels & Resorts provides a terrace, bar and an all year round outdoor swimming pool. This 4-star hotel offers free shuttle service to the city centre and a 24-hour front desk. International cuisine is served at the restaurant. All units are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, oven, a coffee machine, a bath and a wardrobe. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster. The rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. Cycling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near Hollywood Mirage - Excel Hotels & Resorts. Playa de las Americas is 2.5 km from the accommodation, while Puerto de la Cruz is 43 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur Airport, 12 km from Hollywood Mirage - Excel Hotels & Resorts.

name: Hotel Playa Sur Tenerife
address: Gaviota,36, 38612 El Médano, Tenerife
description: The Hotel Playa Sur Tenerife is located in El Médano, on the first line of the longest natural beach in Tenerife and only 10 minutes from Tenerife Sur Airport It has a seawater pool and a pleasant solarium with Balinese beds, free WIFI in all the facilities and free private parking. The 24-hour reception provides tourist information, car rental and excursion services Buffet restaurant is open for breakfast from 08:00 – 10:00 and offers a wide variety of hot and cold options. It also has an à la carte restaurant that offers specialties of Mediterranean gastronomy, such as paella and fish. The rooms are simple, some with sea views, have a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries, flat-screen TV, telephone, safe and balcony The surrounding area is ideal for windsurfing, kitesurfing, cycling and hiking. The hotel has a bicycle room and surfboxes to store surf equipment safely. Dogs up to 10kg are welcome. Please book a Superior Double room and always check availability with the hotel before booking

name: Alexandre Hotel Troya
address: Rafael Puig Lluvina, 2, 38670 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Set in tropical gardens, Alexandre Hotel Troya is located in Playa de las Americas beachfront. The hotel boasts an outdoor pool, spa and fitness center. The bright and modern rooms at the Troya Hotel include air conditioning, satellite TV and a balcony. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. The hotel’s poolside Palapa Restaurant serves snacks, as well as Mediterranean and international cuisine. There is also a buffet restaurant and a cocktail lounge. There is a children’s play area and paddling pool at the hotel. Massage is available, and you can play billiards. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The Troya has easy access to the TF-1 Motorway, and Siam Water Park is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Sol Costa Atlantis
address: Avenida Venezuela, 15, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Sol Costa Atlantis Tenerife has an ideal setting 50 metres from Martiánez Beach and the Lago Martiánez pool complex. This hotel features a spa and outdoor swimming pool, and free WiFi. Each of the property’s air-conditioned rooms has elegant décor and a balcony. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. A safe is available for an extra cost. The on-site restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Spanish cuisine for dinner. There are also a pool bar and a modern bar-lounge with terrace. The spa is located on the hotel's top floor and offers sea views. It features a thermal circuit with sauna, Turkish bath and a pool with several water jets. It also offers beauty treatments, including massages. Entry comes at an additional cost. Free fitness facilities are available. Sol Costa Atlantis Tenerife is located in the city centre, where you can find a selection of shops, bars and cafés. Loro Parque Theme Park is less than 3 km away.

name: Alexandre Hotel Gala
address: Av. Del Arquitecto Gomez Cuesta, 3, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Alexandre Hotel Gala is set in Playa de las Américas, approximately 100 metres from the beach. This large complex features an outdoor swimming pool, spa and rooms with balconies. The Gala offers simple, attractive décor throughout. The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and have a desk and a minibar. Buffet-style cuisine is on offer in the Gala’s restaurant. There is also a pool bar and cocktail bar. Guests can relax in the Gala’s Chill-Out terrace, which offers views of Atlantic and the island of Gomera. The hotel provides evening entertainment and a range of activities throughout the day. There is also a children’s club. The TV lounge has free WiFi, while computers with internet access are available in reception for an extra cost. The Gala’s spa has a large indoor pool, and offers a range of hydrotherapy and massage treatments. There is also a hot tub and gym area.

name: Select Sunningdale
address: Golf Del Sur, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Wyndham Residences Golf del Sur provides great value self-catering holiday accommodation. This is a wonderful resort to stay on Tenerife with its pool lined with palm trees, relaxed family vibe and set in the green oasis of Golf del Sur. Guests at Wyndham Residences Golf del Sur will enjoy views of the impressive Mount Teide as they make special holiday memories. Choose from the curved swimming pool or a dip in the blue waters of the ocean; dine at the resort’s restaurant, the multitude of local fish restaurants at the nearby village of Los Abrigos, or head into Las Americas for a taste of the Island’s nightlife. A fantastic Tenerife resort for families of all ages, with an onsite entertainment team to keep you smiling the whole holiday, Wyndham Residences Golf del Sur is ready and waiting to welcome you to the Island of Eternal Spring.

name: Santa Barbara Golf & Ocean Club
address: Avenida Del Atlantico, 38620 Los Abrigos, Tenerife
description: From the sand on the golf course to the sand on the beach, Santa Barbara Golf and Ocean Club will tempt you to relax outdoors throughout your stay. This seaside resort features spacious Apartments and dazzling on-site amenities like a cinema, solarium, sauna and game room. Private cars, golf carts and cycles are available for rent if you want to explore the island at your preferred pace. Youll return each night to a comfortable Apartment with sea views, a swimming pool with a poolside bar and a Moorish-inspired architectural design that rivals the amazing landscape just beyond the propertys gates.iHotelier/iStay

name: Royal Garden Villas & Spa
address: Campo de Golf Costa Adeje - Finca Los Olivos, Adeje, Tenerife
description: This 5-star resort features luxurious, Balinese-style villas with private heated pools. Set in gardens, Royal Garden Villas offers a gym, spa and impressive ocean views. Each spacious property is individually decorated with chic décor and wooden furnishings. All villas have a terrace, a 40-inch flat-screen TV, DVD player and a well-equipped kitchen. Each one comes with a hydromassage shower and bath. The Royal Garden’s Jardín Restaurant offers à la carte cuisine and a selection of Spanish dishes in a stylish environment decorated with intricate wooden lattices. The Tucán Tucán Pub serves a range of cocktails and light snacks. The Golden Pond spa features Oriental-style design and has an indoor pool and Turkish baths. It also has a hot tub, ice fountain and various beauty treatments. There is also a squash court and gym. The Royal Garden can arrange yacht hire, green fees for local golf courses and various excursions, including trips to Puerto de la Cruz and the island of La Gomera.

name: Roca Nivaria Gran Hotel
address: Av. Adeje 300, 38678 Adeje, Tenerife
description: This luxurious 5-star hotel is situated on Costa Adeje, overlooking Playa Paraiso Beach. It features a spa area and a heated infinity pool with stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. The modern rooms at Adrián Hoteles Roca Nivaria include air conditioning and satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. The hotel has tennis and archery facilities. A hot tub, mud bath and a range of beauty treatments are also offered. Guests have access RoniAventura, the hotel's water and adventure park, which includes 2 pools, 4 slides, climbing walls and suspension bridges. Adrián Hoteles Roca Nivaria features a buffet restaurant and 2 à la carte restaurants, serving Italian and Spanish cuisine. There is also a poolside bar.

name: Beverly Hills Suites - Excel Hotels & Resorts
address: Rodeo, 9, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: Set in Los Cristianos in the Tenerife Region, 2.3 km from Playa de las Americas, Beverly Hills Suites - Excel Hotels & Resorts boasts an outdoor pool, and terrace. Puerto de la Cruz is 43 km away. Free WiFi is available. You can play tennis and billiards at the property, and the area is popular for cycling. Adeje is 9 km from Beverly Hills Suites - Excel Hotels & Resorts, while El Médano is 17 km from the property.

name: Hotel Blue Sea Interpalace
address: Calle Acevino 21, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Located in Puerto de la Cruz in Tenerife, Hotel Blue Sea Interpalace overlooks the Atlantic Ocean. It offers a tennis court, outdoor pools and air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony. The rooms at Hotel Blue Sea Interpalace feature carpeted floors and plenty of natural light. Each one comes with satellite TV and a private bathroom, and some have sea views. Free WiFi is available. The hotel’s restaurant serves international food and has a terrace. There is also a poolside bar. The hotel has its own children’s playground. There is also an entertainment programme for children. Tenerife’s famous Teide National Park is a 40-minute drive from Hotel Blue Sea Interpalace. Tenerife Norte Airport is just 20 minutes’ drive away. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

name: Sol Arona Tenerife
address: Avenida Juan Carlos I, 25, 38640 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: Sol Arona Tenerife lies 200 metres from the beach of Los Cristianos, in Tenerife. It features a large outdoor pool with sun loungers and rooms with balconies, most with sea views. A safe is available in all rooms for an extra charge. Children can enjoy their own swimming pool and activities in a playground such as climbing and the superjumper. Meanwhile, parents can enjoy a session in the gym or simply sunbathing on the sun terrace. At the end of the day the family can come together to share a meal in the buffet restaurant before enjoying the nightly entertainment. Tenerife South Airport is less than 20 minutes´ drive from Sol Arona Tenerife.

name: Spa & Sport Hotel Mar y Sol
address: Avenida Amsterdam 8, 38650 Los Cristianos, Tenerife
description: Located in Arona, Spa & Sport Hotel Mar y Sol offers accommodation with free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Opening to a terrace with sea, pool or garden views, all units are fitted with a kitchenette with a fridge and kitchenware. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the aparthotel you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Spa & Sport Hotel Mar y Sol offers a range of wellness facilities including a wellness packages and a public bath. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near Spa & Sport Hotel Mar y Sol include Playa De Los Tarajales, Los Cristianos Beach and Playa del Callao. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 18 km from the aparthotel.

name: Luz Del Mar
address: Avenida Sibora, 10, 38400 Los Silos, Tenerife
description: Located in the traditional village of Los Silos, this spa hotel has a tropical garden and a solar-heated swimming pool. Free WiFi is available. The hotel’s wellness suite offers an organic sauna, a dry sauna, a relaxation room and adventure showers. There is also a fitness centre. Hotel Luz del Mar is surrounded by the Teno Mountains and the El Teide National Park. There is free public parking on site and the sea is a short walk away. Buenavista’s 18-hole Golf Course is within a short drive. The Luz del Mar is in the Isla Baja region, full of traditional farm houses. The hotel has a large wind-protected terrace and rooms have a balcony or terrace. There is also a Chimney Lounge with an open fireplace.

name: Royal River, Luxury Hotel - Adults Only
address: Calle Alcojora, 38670 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Royal River, Luxury Hotel - Adults Only has four restaurants, five outdoor swimming pools, a fitness centre and three bars in Adeje. Boasting suites and villas, each with a private pool or plunge pool, this property offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. All units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a bath and free toiletries, villas also feature a terrace and pool view. Continental and buffet breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Guests can relax in the spa and wellness centre, including a hammam and a sauna, or in the garden. Playa de Fanabe is 2.7 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur, 25 km from Royal River, Luxury Hotel - Adults Only, and the property offers an airport shuttle service for an extra cost.

name: Hotel Hacienda Del Conde a Meliá Collection Hotel
address: Paseo Severiano Ballesteros, Buenavista del Norte, Tenerife
description: Featuring free WiFi, 3 restaurants and 2 pools, Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only is a luxury hotel located in Buenavista del Norte, Tenerife. This adults-only property has a spa centre and hot tub. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a furnished terrace, flat-screen TV with international channels, seating area with a sofa, and walk-in closet. The luxurious bathroom comes with a bath, walk-in shower, hairdryer, VIP toiletries, and double vanities. The property has an 18-hole golf course, designed by Severiano Ballesteros, as well as a free fitness centre and banquet rooms. The spa includes a thermal circuit, sauna, and Turkish bath. Free parking is provided. Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only offers bike parking, wash station, bicycle workshop and personalised cycling routes. Tenerife South Airport is 70 km from Hacienda del Conde member of Meliá Collection - Adults Only.

name: Las Adelfas 2
address: Calle Los Cardones, 47, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Set in beautiful gardens within Golf del Sur, Las Adelfas is 1 km from the Atlantic Ocean. Featuring 2 outdoor pools, the complex is 4 km from Tenerife South Airport. WiFi is free and available throughout all units. The modern Las Adelfas studios and apartments have a private balcony overlooking the pools and private entrance. Each has a kitchen with cooking facilities. There is a living room with a sofa, and most units have a safe. Guests can dine in The Waterfall restaurant, enjoy the Sports Bar or have a drink by the pool. San Miguel Marina, with its shops, bars and restaurants, is 20 minutes’ walk away. The complex has a tour desk, where you can hire a car or bicycle. Free on-site parking is available.

name: Palm Beach - Excel Hotels & Resorts
address: Avenida V Centenario, 11, 38660 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Offering stunning views of the Canary Islands, this attractive apartment complex is set just 10 metres from Troya Beach. It features an adult and children’s outdoor pool, a gym, hot tub and sauna. Apartments and studios at Palm Beach - Excel Hotels & Resorts Club feature elegant décor and pool or sea views. Lounges have a sofa bed and plasma TV with DVD player and modern kitchens include microwave, fridge and toaster. DVDs and a safe can be rented at reception. The complex has a cafeteria, bar and a selection of restaurants, as well as on-site supermarket and beauty salon. It is within 5 minutes’ walk of numerous shopping centres, bars and restaurants. You can rent a car, exchange currency and book excursions at Palm Beach - Excel Hotels & Resorts’s 24-hour reception. Las Americas Golf Resort is 10 minutes’ walk away and Tenerife South Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Royal Tenerife Country Club
address: Calle San Andreas, 38620 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Royal Tenerife Country Club can tee up an exceptional holiday for golfers and beachgoers alike. This family-friendly resort within two kilometres of the shoreline offers an outdoor pool, book library, on-site car rental and a variety of other services and amenities that complement the spacious self-catered Suites. These 1- and 2-Bedroom Apartments are only minutes from Tenerife Sur Airport, helping you maximize your holiday without spending valuable time driving to and from the terminal. With plenty of on-site amenities and a great location near some of Tenerifes most popular attractions, Royal Tenerife Country Club is a fantastic option for a self-catered getaway in Spains Canary Islands.iHotelier/iStay

name: Vincci Tenerife Golf
address: Urbanizacion Golf Del Sur. Carretera de Los Abrigos, 38639 Los Abrigos, Tenerife
description: Located 100 metres from Tenerife’s Golf del Sur Golf Course, this seafront hotel offers an outdoor pool and a spa. Many rooms at Vincci Tenerife Golf include a private balcony, some with sea views. The Vincci Tenerife’s spacious rooms are decorated in soft, natural colours. They are all air conditioned and include flat-screen satellite TV and a modern bathroom with toiletries. The hotel’s Nammu Spa has a sauna, steam room and dynamic swimming pool, and massages and beauty treatments can be booked. The hotel also has a sun terrace with loungers. Vincci Tenerife Golf offers a buffet restaurant and a bar with a terrace, overlooking the sea. Upon request, the hotel can offer products for special diet requirement including celiacs. Room service is available. The Vincci’s reception can arrange car rental and currency exchange. Staff can also provide information about the region and help to book excursions, including tours of the impressive Mount Teide National Park.

name: Sunset Bay Club
address: Calle Antonio Navarro, 1, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Youll discover multiple reasons to spend your vacation at Sunset Bay Club when you learn about the many on-site services and amenities throughout the property. Just beyond your spacious Apartment, youll find two sparkling pools, a solarium, a fitness center and other great recreational facilities. The convenient on-site services include golf cart and car rentals, laundry facilities, a book library, a currency exchange and a babies accessories catalogue. Sunset Bay Club is ready to provide young families, couples and solo travelers everything they need for a comfortable and convenient stay.iHotelier/iStay

name: Meliá Jardines del Teide
address: Urbanizacion Mirador del Duque, 38670 La Caleta (Tenerife)
description: Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only is built around a pool complex and 12,000m² of tropical gardens. It has views of the coast and mountains, including Mount Teide. All rooms at the hotel have air conditioning and satellite TV. Each room has a balcony or terrace, with views of the pool, sea or mountains. Free WiFi is available throughout. The Level services are available in some rooms, including a private lounge with free coffee and tea, private check-in area and daily cocktail hour, as well as private pool and rooms with, pillow menu, coffee maker with a selection of coffees and designer toiletries. Melia Jardines del Teide - Adults Only offers 2 swimming pools, one being exclusive for The Level guests. Dining options includes a buffet restaurant, there are 2 a-la-carte restaurants, one has a bar and there is also a lobby bar with large terrace and panoramic ocean views. The hotel is set just 5 minutes’ walk from Playa del Duque beach, in southern Tenerife. Costa Adeje Golf Club is 1.5 km away. There is also a free shuttle service to a nearby shopping centre. There are also several shops on site.

name: Only You Hotel Valencia
address: Plaza Rodrigo Botet,5, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located in Valencia and with Norte Train Station reachable within 700 metres, Only YOU Hotel Valencia provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. The property is 200 metres from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, and within 400 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. At Only YOU Hotel Valencia each room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Spanish and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Speaking Arabic, Bulgarian, Catalan and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near Only YOU Hotel Valencia include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Turia Gardens and Jardines de Monforte. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Holiday Inn Express Valencia-Ciudad Las Ciencias
address: Escritor Rafael Ferreres 22, 46013 Valencia, Valencia
description: Welcoming Valencia hotel near the City of Arts and Sciences, with breakfast included and a bar Holiday Inn Express® Valencia - Ciudad Las Ciencias is the closest hotel to the Oceanogràfic aquarium, a short walk away. It's a five-minute walk to the striking City of Arts and Sciences, while dining and shopping is just next door, at the El Saler mall. There's a bus stop directly in front of the hotel for easy access to Valencia city centre. You can drive to popular Las Arenas beach or the handsome Old Town in 15 minutes. Business guests have access to 4 naturally lit meeting rooms, and the Palacio de Congresos de Valencia conference centre is less than 20 minutes by car. Valencia Airport is 14 km away. At this hotel you can enjoy: - Free Wi-Fi - Parking for a daily fee - A continental Express Start Breakfast buffet included in the room rate The comfortable rooms provide single beds for business guests, or sofa beds and connecting suites for families. Some rooms have views of the City of Arts and Sciences, and kids under 19 stay free with their parents. Breakfast is served in a spacious dining room overlooking seasonal outdoor pool. For dinner, you can sample the many restaurants in the adjacent shopping mall, or head to Alqueria del Pou, a rustic restaurant surrounded by fields, just 1 km away. End the day with a drink in our lobby bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Port Azafata Valencia
address: Cuesta Aeropuerto 15, 46940 Manises, Valencia
description: Port Azafata Valencia is located just 500 meters from Valencia Airport and offers free transportation to the airport, an outdoor pool, gym, sauna and restaurant services. Rooms at Port Azafata Hotel features wooden floors and modern design. Each air-conditioned room includes an LCD TV, safe and a bathroom with hairdryer. In addition, it has 7 meeting and convention rooms. An extensive buffet breakfast is served each morning at Port Azafata Hotel. The hotel´s restaurant specialises in rice dishes such as typical local paella. The hotel is situated just 15 minutes by car from the centre of Valencia, and a 5-minute drive from Manises Golf Club. Tickets for the City of Arts and Sciences are available at the Port Azafata’s reception.

name: Hotel Xon's Valencia
address: Avenida Comarques Del Pais Valencia, Parallel to Highway A-3, Exit 345, 46930 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located just 7 km from Valencia Airport, Hotel Xon's offers free Wi-Fi and modern rooms with satellite TV. It features an outdoor swimming pool and a gym with sauna. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at the Xon's feature parquet floors and smart décor. Each one comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant. Guests can also enjoy Mediterranean and international specialities for dinner. There is a terrace bar. The Bonaire Shopping Centre is next to the Hotel Xon’s Valencia. Opposite the hotel there is an ice rink, and the Ricardo Tormo de Cheste Race Circuit is 10 minutes' drive away. The hotel can organise car rental for guests as well as excursions. The Manises Golf Club is less than 3 km away.

name: Plaza Alaquas
address: Hermanas Mirabal, 1, 46970 Valencia, Valencia
description: Plaza Alaquas is ideally located near Valencia Airport and a short drive from Valencia city centre. This modern design hotel offers free Wi-Fi. The hotel is set in a quiet area, with convenient access to public transport. Biopark Valencia is just 4 km away and the City of Arts and Sciences is 8 km away. The Alaquas has a bar-café serving snacks and drinks. The restaurant serves typical Spanish food and a buffet breakfast. The hotel also has a 24-hour reception desk. Rooms at the Plaza Alaquas are bright and spacious. They all have a small seating area. Rooms are comfortable and air-conditioned, with extra-long beds.

name: ibis budget Valencia Aeropuerto
address: Carrer Camp de L'Olivereta, 46940 Valencia, Valencia
description: Discover our Ibis Hotel at Valencia Airport. Carmen Baviera, in charge of the management, welcomes you to our Ibis Hotel located just 10 minutes walk from the Manises-Valencia International Airport and 200 m from the Rosas Metro, which connects to central Valencia. The fully equipped rooms have AC, heating and state-of-the-art WiFi. The hotel has a restaurant, breakfast buffet, bar and parking.accorhotels.com

name: Parador de El Saler
address: Avda. De Los Pinares, 151, 46012 El Saler, Valencia
description: This Parador is located on the famous El Saler golf course, within a coastal nature reserve. Luxurious and contemporary, it has a spa and free Wi-Fi. The rooms of the Parador Campo de Golf El Saler are modern and spacious. All have heating, air conditioning and TV. Many of them have views of the golf course. In the spa you will find a range of exclusive treatments and massages. It also has saunas and a heated swimming pool. During the summer the hotel has an outdoor swimming pool. The Parador has free parking. The restaurant of the El Saler specialises in local rice dishes, above all paella. The El Saler golf course is ranked in the top 10 in Spain. Alternatively, you can explore the Albufera Nature Reserve which is home to a wide range of plant and wildlife. The city of Valencia is just 18 km away.

name: El Plantio Golf Resort
address: Ctra Antigua Alicante, Elche km3 (A-79), Alicante, Valencia
description: Surrounded by pretty gardens, this luxurious resort features 2 golf courses. Located 10 minutes’ drive from the beach and 3 km from Alicante, it offers 2 outdoor pools, a gym and modern apartments with a balcony. All elegant, air-conditioned apartments at the El Plantío Golf Resort have satellite TV, a modern kitchen equipped with dishwasher and washing machine and a dining room. A daily cleaning service is also provided. The resort’s buffet restaurant serves international food, and there is also a bar. A Carrefour supermarket is 5 minutes’ drive away. Plantío Golf has a golf school, a children’s playground and a large sun terrace. It has a 24-hour reception and Alicante Airport is 3 km away.

name: Alicante Aparthotel Evolution
address: Calle San Francisco 20, 03001 Alicante, Valencia
description: Situated in Alicante, 700 metres from Postiguet Beach and 200 metres from the centre, Alicante Aparthotel Evolution features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a bar. The apartment provides guests with a terrace, mountain views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and slippers. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At Alicante Aparthotel Evolution you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation, while fishing and hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near Alicante Aparthotel Evolution include Alicante Train Station, Explanada de España and The San Nicolas Co-Cathedral. The nearest airport is Alicante–Elche Miguel Hernández Airport, 16 km from the apartment.

name: Hotel Boutique Calas de Alicante
address: Avinguda de la Costa Blanca, 22, 03540 Alicante, Valencia
description: Hotel Boutique Calas de Alicante is a Medieval-themed hotel in Cabo de Huertas, Alicante. Set around the outdoor pool, rooms offer free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and private terraces with sea or garden views. The restaurant serves a range of local and Mediterranean dishes. Gluten-free meals are available on prior request. There is also a bar-café, open every day from breakfast time until midnight. You can find a bakery, shop and tapas bars opposite the property. The beaches of La Almadraba are 200 metres from Hotel Boutique Calas de Alicante, while La Albufereta Beach is 400 metres away. San Juan Beach and central Alicante are within a 10-minute bus ride, and regular bus services stop near the hotel.

name: Hotel Maya Alicante
address: Canónigo Manuel Penalva, 2, 03002 Alicante, Valencia
description: Set at the foot of Santa Barbara Castle, Hotel Maya is 5 minutes’ walk from Alicante Beach and 10 minutes’ walk from the centre. It has a seasonal outdoor pool, free WiFi and a gym with panoramic views. All air-conditioned rooms at the Maya have satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. The Maya has easy access to Postiguet Beach, which is 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. The hotel provides an entertainment programme for adults and children during July and August. The restaurant serves local and international dishes, as well as rice specialities. There is also a café. Room service and packed lunches are available and there are vending machines selling drinks and snacks The Plaza Mar 2 Shopping Centre is 100 metres away. The train to Terra Mítica Theme Park and Benidorm stops opposite the Maya. The C6 airport bus stop is just 50 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Castilla Alicante
address: Av. de Los Paises Escandinavos, 7, Alicante, Valencia
description: Castilla Alicante is just 200 metres from Alicante’s San Juan Beach, and has an outdoor pool. Its air-conditioned rooms include flat-screen satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and private terraces. The Castilla restaurant serves home-made food, and there is a café with a summer terrace. There are various restaurants and bars in the immediate vicinity. The Castilla Alicante is 1.5 km from ARENA Sports Club, where guests can enjoy the spa facilities at an extra cost. It is also 1.2 km from Alicante Golf Club, which offers discounts to hotel guests. The hotel is 70 metres from the tram stop to Alicante, which is 8 km away. You can hire a car at the hotel’s tour desk, and there are good connections to Benidorm from Alicante.

name: Hotel Albahia
address: Sol Naciente 6, 03016 Alicante, Valencia
description: Hotel Albahia Alicante is located 8 minutes' walk from Alicante's La Albufereta Beach, and within 2 km from the old town. It features 9 tennis courts, a free gym and free WiFi. Hotel Albahia Alicante is located 300 metres from the tram to Alicante city centre, Postiguet Beach, Benidorm and Terra Mítica Theme Park. There are also 2 bus routes into the centre. The Montemar Athletic Club, the Plaza Mar 2 Shopping Centre and the Santa Barbara Castle are all under 5 minutes’ drive from Hotel Albahia Alicante. Spread over 3 floors, most rooms at the Albahía have air conditioning and heating, a safe and satellite TV. The restaurant serves à la carte Spanish meals and offers sea views. Tapas and pinchos are available at the bar.

name: Hotel Port Alicante City & Beach
address: Avenida Cataluña, 20, 03540 Alicante, Valencia
description: Port Alicante City & Beach is located in Alicante, 800 metres from the beach of San Juan and 10 minutes by car from the city center. This hotel has outdoor swimming pools, gym and sauna. All rooms at the Port Alicante City & Beach have air conditioning and full private bathroom with hairdryer. They also have a desk, a kettle water, safe and satellite TV. The hotel offers outdoor paid parking, free WiFi in public areas, It also has a garden with a playground and a children's pool. The restaurant offers a buffet service and serves Mediterranean cuisine, specializing in paella and other rice dishes. There is also a cafe/bar and a poolside bar, open during all year round. A bus and tram stop is 400 metres from this hotel. The field of golf de Alicante is located 600 meters away. Near the hotel there are many bars, restaurants and shops. The nearest airport is Alicante Airport, 25 km from the property. NEW- Opening of the new Sky Bar Boga on the hotel's rooftop. Prior reservation is recommended, before arrival at the hotel, to the email: portalicante@porthotels.es Live a unique experience and enjoy the perfect fusion between exquisite cocktails, high-class cuisine and live music! We will wait for you!

name: Hotel Almirante
address: Avenida Niza, 38, 03540 Alicante, Valencia
description: Hotel Almirante is the only hotel with direct access to Alicante's San Juan Beach, and has a large outdoor pool. San Juan is the Costa Blanca's longest beach, at 6 km long. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Alicante city centre, and 20 minutes from the airport. There is free on-site parking, and a tram to Alicante stops 100 metres away. Each modern, air-conditioned room at the Almirante has a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with amenities. A safe is available at an extra charge. The Almirante’s Pocardy restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and offers Mediterranean cuisine for lunch and dinner, including rice dishes and fish. You can enjoy a meal on the outdoor terrace, with music in the evenings. There is also a bar.

name: Hotel Spa Porta Maris by Melia
address: Plaza Puerta Del Mar, 3, Alicante, Valencia
description: Hotel Spa Porta Maris by Melia is set between Postiguet Beach and Alicante Marina, offers views of the Mediterranean and free Wi-Fi. It is 100 metres from Alicante’s historic centre. All rooms have a private terrace, flat-screen TV, pillow menu and seasonal air conditioning and heating. Rooms offer views of the marina or Alicante's Bay. The suites also have a lounge. The hotel has a gym and a spa, available at an extra cost. The spa features a heated pool and a thermal circuit. It also offers massages and body and facial treatments. Buffet breakfast is served in the Alborada room, with views of Alicante's bay. The Marabierta Restaurant, offering views of the sea and Alicante's sports dock, serves typical Mediterranean dishes daily. Hotel Spa Porta Maris by Melia is near the Mediterranean Casino and 100 metres from Paseo de Las Palmeras. The airport is a 15-minute drive away. Nearby tram and train connections provide quick access to the Terra Mítica Theme Park.

name: Hotel Alicante Golf
address: C. José Escultor Gutiérrez, 23, 03540 Alicante, Valencia
description: Hotel Alicante Golf is set in beautiful gardens, with an 18-hole golf course designed by Seve Ballesteros. It features a spa and wellness centre as well as an outdoor pool. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Alicante Golf feature bright décor and a terrace. Each one has a TV. The Alicante Golf has padel courts and a children’s play area with special activities and menus. Massage service is available at the hotel for an extra cost. Free WiFi is offered in public areas. The hotel is 800 metres from Playa de San Juan Beach, with exclusive sunbeds and catering. Hotel Alicante Golf is close to a large shopping area. Alicante city centre is 7 km away and Alicante Airport is a 20-minute drive from the hotel. There is an elegant bar where guests can relax with a drink. The El Mirador Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine with views of the golf course.

name: Hostal Mont Royal
address: Tridente, 17-B, 03540 Alicante, Valencia
description: Hostal Mont Royal is a 15-minute walk from both Playa San Juan Beach and Alicante Golf Club. It offers free Wi-Fi and has a seasonal outdoor pool and terraces. All rooms at the Hostal Mont Royal are private and come with air conditioning, bathroom and satellite TV. Some rooms have a balcony. Mont Royal’s restaurant, La Palloza, specialises in tapas and Galician food and has a covered outdoor terrace. The property is bordered by gardens. Nearby beaches, considered among the best on the Costa Blanca, offer a variety of water sports facilities. You will find a children's playground within a 2-minute walk. Almadraba Beach and Cabo de las Huertas are 10 minutes' walk from Hostal Mont Royal. Alicante city centre is 5 km from the property and there are bus and tram stops within a 5-minute walk.

name: Melia Villaitana
address: Avda. Alcalde Eduardo Zaplana, 7, Alicante, Valencia
description: Located less than 3 km from Benidorm, Hotel Villaitana offers a luxurious spa area, outdoor swimming pools and an artificial beach. Set on 2 golf courses designed by Jack Nicklaus, it has great views of Gran Bahía Bay. Melia Villaitana was designed in the form of a traditional Mediterranean village. Each of the large, air-conditioned rooms comes with a private balcony or terrace. They also have satellite TV, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Villaitana also dedicates some of its areas to The Level exclusive rooms and services, where The Level guests have private access to The Level Lounge with open bar and private buffet, daily cocktails, press and concierge services and pre-arrival services. Rooms include sound bar, flat-screen TV with satellite channels, coffee machine and turndown service, among other services. The Level rooms also offer some privileged views over the area. The Villaitana’s wellness centre features a gym free of charge, sauna and water circuit with thermal baths. A range of beauty and relaxation treatments is also available. The resort has its own tennis and paddle tennis courts, a seasonal children's playground for children over 5 years and a club. Villaitana Hotel has 6 restaurants and a snack bar. Easily accessible from the AP-7 Motorway, Hotel Villaitana offers easy road access to the Terra Mítica Theme Park and Terra Natura Nature Reserve. Alicante is a 20-minute drive away. Alicante Airport is 50 km away and Valencia Airport is 134 km away.

name: Villa Jerez
address: Avenida de la Cruz Roja 7, 11407 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: This hotel is set in a traditional noble house in the centre of Jerez, surrounded by 4,000 m² of gardens. Located just off Plaza del Caballo, the Villa Jerez is within walking distance of most of the important monuments of this sunny Andalusian city. Here you can enjoy the steam bath or gym before taking a refreshing dip in the swimming pool. You can also choose to relax with a massage before enjoying a meal in the hotel’s restaurant or cafeteria. In the area surrounding the hotel you will see plenty of evidence of the city’s rich cultural heritage. Jerez is mostly famous for 3 things: horses, flamenco and wine. A visit to one of the local wine cellars is a must.

name: Hospes Palacio de San Esteban
address: Arroyo de Santo Domingo, 3, 37008 Salamanca, Salamanca
description: Surrounded by the monuments of historic Salamanca, this stylish, modern hotel is set in a renovated convent full of timeless charm. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. With a superb central location, the Hospes Palacio de San Esteban provides the ideal location for your visit to this prestigious university city. Along with its excellent setting you can relax in the gardens or enjoy a meal in the El Monje, the on-site restaurant. The seasonal pool offers view of the Cathedral and the San Esteban Monastery. Guest can visit the city’s 2 cathedrals and the famous Casa de la Concha in a short walk. As well as the numerous charming sights of this ancient Castilian city, you will also find plenty of entertainment in the surrounding streets.

name: Barceló Montecastillo Golf
address: Carretera de Arcos km 6, 11406 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Completely renovated in March 2013 the Barcelo Montecastillo Golf is a true icon of the Jerez area thanks to its high quality facilities and its characteristic elegant and simple design.The hotel is perfect for guests looking for relaxation and tranquillity on their holidays offered by the hotels complete Spa for golf lovers for companies who wish to hold meetings at the hotel or for tourists who want to discover Jerezs bodegas and equestrian events. This hotel has a total of 162 rooms and a group of villas making it the perfect accommodation for families and groups of friends who want to enjoy a tranquil and relaxing holiday.This resort offer you 3 outdoor swimming pools Wellbeing Club Spa Circuit dry sauna steam sauna and gym. 4 Treatment rooms. Lounges 16 Halls for Events Exhibition gallery Rooms for private banquets Golf course 18 hole golf course designed by Jack Nicklaus. It was the venue for the Volvo Masters for 5 years in a row 1997/2001 Practice course and Putting Green Golf Academy Exclusive use of Private Academy for groups or events. Football and other sports 2 international regulation size football grounds Dressing rooms at the football grounds Jogging track Multisport athletics track Tennis court Barcelo Hotels and Resorts offers you in this hotel the original and new gastronomic concept of Healthy Gourmet which consists in the mixture of great quality products exquisite flavours sublime presentations.The perfect combination between eating well and in a healthy way.Barcelo.com

name: Gran Hotel Corona Sol
address: Avenida Villamayor, 31, 37007 Salamanca, Salamanca
description: Free Wi-Fi and flat-screen cable TV are included in each spacious room at this modern hotel. Situated next to Santísima Trinidad Hospital, it is a 10-minute walk from Salamanca’s Plaza Mayor Square. The bright, air-conditioned rooms at Gran Hotel Corona Sol have simple, elegant décor and include heating and a safe. Toiletries and a hairdryer can be found in the private bathroom. You can find a variety of restaurants and typical tapas bars in the surrounding streets. Gran Sol Corona is situated within a 5-minute walk of Salamanca’s main shopping district. Salamanca University is 700 metres away, while the lively bars of Van Dyck Street are 900 metres away.

name: Hotel Madrid Alameda Aeropuerto, Affiliated by Meliá
address: Av de Logrono, 100, 28042 Madrid
description: This hotel is linked to the nearby Madrid Barajas Airport by a free shuttle service upon request. It is also convenient for the Juan Carlos I exhibition centre. The Hotel Madrid Alameda Aeropuerto, Affiliated by Meliá has a restaurant and a bar serving snacks and drinks. There are also vending machines available throughout the day and night. The city centre is only 20 minutes away, and can be easily reached using the convenient metro, bus and road links.

name: Eurostars Sitges
address: Av. Cami De Miralpeix, 12, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: Overlooking the Mediterranean sea and the Terramar Golf Club, Eurostars Sitges is 2 km from the beach in Sitges. Free WiFi and free parking are available. The air-conditioned rooms feature a private terrace with views, a flat-screen TV, a laptop safe, a minibar, a tea/coffee maker and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bathrobes. The property provides restaurants, bars, a chill-out lounge and a boutique restaurant. Guests can enjoy à la carte fine wine, dining, snacks and cocktails. Eurostars Sitges offers a wellness centre with a spa, an indoor pool, a hot tub, a sauna and a steam bath for an extra charge. Therapies and beauty treatments are also available. A 24-hour reception and a tour desk services are provided at the property. Guests have free access to the 24-hour fitness room. Sitges centre is 3.5 km away from the property. Guest can reach Eurostars Sitges within 25 minutes by train from Barcelona International Airport and within 50 minutes from Barcelona city centre.

name: Clement Barajas
address: Avenida General 43, 28042 Madrid
description: Hotel Clement Barajas, just 2 km from Madrid Airport, offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The rooms in Clement Barajas all have wooden floors, safes and work desks. They also have modern bathrooms. The hotel has an à la carte restaurant that offers traditional dishes made from high quality ingredients. There is also a TV showing live sports events in the evenings. Barajas Metro Station is 400 metres away or a five-minute walk from the hotel, and central Madrid can be reached in 30 minutes by car. Clement Barajas. Wanda Metropolitano Stadium is 10-minutes' drive from the property. Complimentary coffee for early risers from 3:30 a.m. to 7:00 a.m.

name: Hotel Fernando III
address: San Jose 21, 41004 Seville, Andalusia
description: Hotel Fernando III is in Seville’s historic Santa Cruz district. It offers free WiFi, a roof terrace with city views and a seasonal swimming pool, open from June to September. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at the Fernando are comfortable and offer attractive, contemporary design. Some rooms have balconies and offer city views. The hotel’s restaurant serves both Andalusian dishes and European cuisine, in additional to traditional tapas and wines. There is also daily breakfast service. The hotel can also provide tourist information and a ticket service. Additional facilities include function rooms suitable for conferences, banquets and weddings. Hotel Fernando III is a short walk from Seville Cathedral and the Giralda Tower. The Alcazar Gardens are just 2 streets away, while Seville Train Station is also nearby.

name: AC Hotel Ciudad de Toledo by Marriott
address: Carretera De Circunvalacion, 15, 45005 Toledo, Toledo
description: AC Hotel Ciudad de Toledo has a privileged location in a stunning area near the Tajo River with an impressive panoramic view over the city of Toledo, a town considered by UNESCO to be a World Heritage site. Our hotel was constructed respecting the architectural style of the area: Los Cigarrales (Valle de Toledo), and consists of the top-quality facilities and a very high service standard, befitting the status of AC Hotels. Everything is there to ensure that guests enjoy a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: Hotel Salamanca Montalvo
address: Calle Hoces Del Duraton, 1, 37008 Salamanca, Salamanca
description: Offering free WiFi and free parking, the modern Hotel Salamanca Montalvo is located by Via de la Plata, just 5 minutes' drive from central Salamanca. A bus stop is located 50 metres away. All rooms include a 32" flat-screen TV with satellite channels, individually controlled air conditioning/heating, a minibar, safe and private bathroom. Some rooms enjoy views over the city. The hotel offers a quality breakfast buffet, an on site coffee shop, and its own La Terraza del Montalvo restaurant. There is a garden with a children's play area including a slide and swings. The hotel is located in the Montalvo Business Park.

name: Hotel Finca Los Abetos
address: Avenida de San Josa de Calasanz, Km 2.8, 14012 Córdoba, Andalusia
description: Set 10 minutes’ drive from central Córdoba, Hotel Finca Los Abetos offers air-conditioned rooms with balconies. It features 2 seasonal outdoor pools, a restaurant, and views of the surrounding Sierra de Córdoba Mountains. The rooms at this hotel include free WiFi, safe, a flat-screen TV and international channels. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower and free toiletries. Surrounded by gardens, the Maestre Escuela has a peaceful setting. Outdoors you will also find 2 seven-a-side football pitches. There are 2 seasonal pools. It features a traditional Andalusian interior courtyard and a terrace with mountain views, where you can enjoy a drink or meal. Breakfast is served in the hotel’s café. Reception has tourist information and is open 24 hours. Free parking is available at the property, as well as bike storage and bike repair service.

name: Hotel Casa Palacio María Luisa
address: Tornería, 22, 11403 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Hotel Casa Palacio María Luisa has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a garden and shared lounge in Jerez de la Frontera. With a terrace, the property also features a restaurant, as well as a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Hotel Casa Palacio María Luisa the rooms come with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast. Novo Sancti Petri Golf is 45 km from Hotel Casa Palacio María Luisa, while Montecastillo Golf Resort is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Jerez Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: San Gil
address: Parras 28, 41002 Seville, Andalusia
description: San Gil offers attractive accommodation in a colourful, traditional Andalusian-style mansion with a garden. Set in central Seville, it features a seasonal rooftop swimming pool and an à la carte restaurant. Each of the San Gil’s spacious, air-conditioned rooms has a minibar and satellite TV. All rooms have fully equipped bathrooms. The hotel features ornate, colourful tiles throughout, as well as original windows and balconies. Free WiFi is available. The San Gil’s La Calesera restaurant offers typical Sevillan cuisine and tapas dishes. During the summer months, meals are served on the pretty terrace set within the hotel’s gardens. On some evenings there is live flamenco music. The San Gil is just 5 minutes’ walk from Basilica de la Macarena Church and the city’s Roman walls. Seville Cathedral and the Giralda bell tower are less than 2 km away.

name: Hipotels Sherry Park
address: Avda. Alvaro Domecq, 11, 11405 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Surrounded by lush gardens, the Sherry Park Hotel offers a large outdoor swimming pool and rooms with free WiFi. It is 15 minutes’ walk from the historical centre of Jerez. All rooms are equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms include a balcony. On-site facilities include an indoor pool, gym and sauna. The hotel is 25 minutes’ walk from the Cathedral and the Jerez sherry cellars. The Sherry Park is also just a short walk from the city’s renowned Royal Equestrian School and the bullring. Parking is offered by payment, and subject to availability. "La Vermuteria del Sherry", which replaces the restaurant "El Ábaco". This new gastronomic concept leaves aside the idea of "table and tablecloth" and offers a wide selection of wines exclusively from the Jerez area, thus maintaining the commitment to local gastronomy as a hallmark. The diner can also enjoy a wide selection of vermouth made in the region, accompanied by portions and tapas.

name: Hotel Rey Alfonso X
address: Calle Ximenez De Enciso, 35, 41004 Seville, Andalusia
description: Hotel Rey Alfonso X is located in the historic centre of Seville, a short walk from the Giralda and the Santa Cruz district. An outdoor swimming pool is open from June to September. Some rooms at the Rey Alfonso offer views of the Santa María La Blanca Church, the oldest in Sevilla. Others overlook the street or the hotel gardens. All are fully air conditioned, heated and en suite and offer satellite TV. Facilities at the Rey Alfonso X include free Wi-Fi and a cafeteria and a games room. Guests can enjoy views of the Cathedral and Seville’s old quarter from the terrace.

name: Hotel San Antonio El Real
address: C/ San Antonio El Real, 40004 Segovia, Segovia
description: San Antonio el Real is located next to Segovia's Roman Aqueduct. Set in a converted monastery with a beautiful cloister, the stylish rooms offers free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel San Antonio el Real come with a safe. Modern furniture and tiled floors create a relaxed atmosphere, and there is a work desk and a minibar. The San Antonio Hotel’s restaurant serves a range of local dishes, and there is also a bar-café.

name: Hotel Marsol
address: Passeig Jacint Verdaguer, 7, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Catalonia
description: Marsol is located right on the seafront in Lloret de Mar, on Catalunya’s Costa Brava. It offers a fitness centre, spa and a rooftop pool with a terrace and loungers. All rooms at the Hotel Marsol are air-conditioned. They all come with free WiFi, a satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A safe is available at no extra cost. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves a varied breakfast and a range of international dishes for lunch and dinner. There is also a café-bar with a terrace, set on the seafront promenade. The Marsol is a 5-minute walk from the centre of Lloret de Mar, where there is a wide selection of restaurants, bars and nightclubs. Sant Romà Church is located just 100 metres from the hotel.

name: Attica21 Coruña
address: C/ Enrique Mariñas, 34, A Coruña, Galicia
description: Attica21 Coruña is located in a strategic location in the city of A Coruña, in front of the ExpoCoruña exhibition and fairgrounds, in an established residential area and just a few minutes from the beach. It offers different types of fully equipped rooms, a cafeteria and restaurant service, gym and parking. The hotel is located a few meters from the bus stop with quick connection to the city center. And in a privileged position with the Alvedro Airport which is 10 minutes away and with the AP-9 that communicates with any point outside the city and province. When travelling with pets, please note that an extra charge of 25 EUR per pet upon request. Please note that the property can only allow pets with a maximum weight of 15 kilos

name: L'Azure Hotel 4 Sup
address: Calle Esports, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Catalonia
description: L'Azure Hotel 4* Sup is conveniently set in the centre of Lloret de Mar, 3 km from Water World. It offers 2 outdoor swimming pools, a fitness centre, and spa. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the hotel, you will find a Mediterranean restaurant and a buffet restaurant. Other facilities at L'Azure Hotel 4* Sup include an adult-only rooftop terrace with an infinity pool. A splash park for children is also available at the hotel. Lloret Beach is 800 metres from the accommodation, while Santa Clotilde Gardens is 1.8 km away. Girona-Costa Brava Airport is 23 km from the property.

name: Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center
address: Ctra. Arcos, km. 6, 11406 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center is part of the Barceló Montecastillo Hotel & Golf Resort, near the Jerez Formula 1 Track and 5 minutes’ drive from Jerez Airport. It features free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and a spa. The large, bright rooms at the Jerez Montecastillo come with their own private balcony, as well as air conditioning. Facilities at the Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center include tennis courts and a fitness centre, available for an extra charge. The modern spa at Barcelo Montecastillo has a hot tub, a sauna, Turkish baths and a hydrotherapy circuit. There is also an 18-hole golf course designed by Jack Nicklaus. Access to both the spa and the golf course also carry an additional cost. Guests can enjoy buffet breakfast at El Lagar restaurant, which also serves lunch and dinner. Swimming pools and catering services are shared with another hotel located in the resort. These facilities are located 200 metres from Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center. Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center is well located for the A-4 and the A-382 Motorways. The city of Jerez can be reached in 5 minutes by car.

name: Higueron Hotel Malaga, Curio Collection by Hilton
address: Avenida del Higueron,48, 29640 Fuengirola, Andalusia
description: Located in one of the most exclusive areas of Málaga, Higuerón Hotel Málaga, CURIO Collection by Hilton is a benchmark in exclusivity, a resort where luxury finds its maximum expression and excellence takes on a new meaning. A journey through the most cultural, culinary and artistic aspects of Málaga. 290 bedrooms and suites carefully designed to cover the most demanding needs of guests. Including the new suites in which exclusivity becomes the norm, opening up a world of disconnection, such as our Picasso Suites, duplex rooms with outdoor jacuzzi, solarium and Balinese beds. An unforgettable experience in our prestigious sport club, 24-hour gymnasium & our renowned NagomiSpa. 6 restaurants, which take diners on a trip around the world. A journey that begins with the local flavours of the area at Chupadeo and continues at MED. A culture based on flavour, starting at exclusive Sollo Restaurant, awarded a Michelin star. A strategic location with direct access to the beach thanks to our curious tram, which will also take you to the train station, from where you can travel to Málaga International Airport and the provincial capital city centre in just a few minutes.Official Hotel Information

name: Silken Rona Dalba
address: Plaza San Juan Bautista 12, 37002 Salamanca, Salamanca
description: Just 2 minutes' walk from Plaza Mayor Square, Silken Rona Dalba offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi throughout. It also has a café bar and breakfast buffet available. The rooms at the Hotel Silken Rona Dalba have en suite bathrooms, designer toiletries by Javier Mariscal, pillow menu and massage service at an extra cost. Perfectly situated in a small square ‘San Jaun Bautista de Barbalos’, opposite a small, pretty 12th century roman church.

name: La Cueva Park
address: Autovia A-382 Jerez-Arcos Km 3.5, 11406 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Situated in the Andalusian countryside just 4 km from Jerez, La Cueva Park offers an outdoor pool and attractive gardens. Each air-conditioned room offers a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The spacious rooms at the Cueva Park Hotel feature wooden floors and plenty of natural light. They all have a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Some include a balcony, and a minibar is available under request. The hotel’s popular Mesón La Cueva restaurant serves Andalusian cuisine, including traditional tapas and specialities. There is also a cafe-snack bar. Cueva Park is next to Jerez Race Track and only 3 km from Jerez Airport. Cadiz and the Costa de la Luz are a 20-minute drive away, via the nearby A 4 and A 382 Motorways. The hotel offers free on-site parking.

name: URH Sitges Playa
address: Port Alegre 53, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: All rooms at the URH Sitges Playa have a private balcony and air conditioning. All include a spacious and elegant bathroom, safe, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The Amanit Restaurant offers a unique fusion, the best of Balinese and Mediterranean food facing the sea. The URH Sitges Playa has a fitness center and a massage area (subject to availability and upon request). It also offers airport shuttle service and private covered parking for a daily fee.

name: Hotel Palacio Garvey
address: Tornería, 24, 11403 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: The 19th-century Garvey Palace is located in the historic quarter of Jerez de la Frontera. It offers large, uniquely decorated rooms with hydromassage baths and flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. The air-conditioned rooms in the Hotel Palacio Garvey have free internet access, minibars and music systems. The Palacio Garvey Hotel has a library, as well as a business centre with free Wi-Fi. The Garvey’s restaurant, La Condesa, serves modern Mediterranean and Andalusian dishes using local products. The hotel’s Patio Andaluz includes a café and bar, and a continental breakfast is served daily. Palacio Garvey can be found next to Calle Larga, one of Jerez’s main shopping streets. A variety of restaurants can be found in the area immediately around the hotel.

name: Hotel Subur Maritim
address: Paseo Marítimo, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: Situated in front of Sitges Beach, the Hotel Subur Maritim offers an outdoor pool and free WiFi. The air-conditioned rooms include a private terrace, most with sea views. Next to the Hotel Subur Maritim, the hotel’s Cau del Vinyet restaurant is set in a restored 1920s villa. It serves fresh Catalan cuisine, including a daily set menu. Each room at the Hotel Subur Maritim offers a minibar and flat-screen satellite TV. Rooms have a simple, functional design, and include a safe and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free coffee and tea are offered at the reception. The Hotel Subur Maritim is a 15-minute walk along the seafront promenade from the charming old town of Sitges. Bicycle rental is offered at the hotel’s 24-hour reception, and free parking is available on site. Terramar Golf Course is just 1.5 km away.

name: Meliá Sitges
address: Joan Salvat Papasseit, 38, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: Melia Sitges is set in a quiet area of Sitges, just 3 minutes’ walk from Balmins and Aiguadolç beaches. The hotel features a stylish garden with an outdoor pool, and a restaurant with a terrace. The Meliá Sitges is 5 minutes’ walk from Aiguadolç Marina and 15 minutes’ walk from the lively town centre. It is a 20-minute walk to the train station, which connects you with central Barcelona in just 40 minutes. The air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá feature modern, minimalist decor. Each one has a pillow menu and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The Bistrot Saffron restaurant serves modern Mediterranean food. There is also a stylish cocktail bar with modern seats in the garden.

name: Crisol Jardines de Córdoba
address: Calle Poeta Alfonso de Bonilla, 3, 14012 Córdoba, Andalusia
description: Set in attractive gardens, the Crisol Jardines de Córdoba offers accommodation in Cordoba with a seasonal outdoor pool, a hot tub and a restaurant. There is free WiFi available throughout. The spacious rooms at the Ayre Córdoba feature classic décor and views of the hotel’s extensive gardens. All rooms have a TV, a safe and a minibar. The poolside Azaire Restaurant, a typical gastronomic space with terrace and volcanic stone, serves a range of Spanish cuisine. The hotel also has a viewing area where you can see panoramic views of the city, as well as an outdoor area for exercising. 2 tennis courts are also available for guests to use on request. The historic centre of Córdoba, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is 4.6 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Sunway Playa Golf & Spa Sitges
address: Paseo Marítimo De Sitges 92-94, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: This hotel is just 20 metres from Sitges Beach and next to Terramar Golf Course. It offers free bicycle rental, 2 pools and accommodation with free Wi-Fi, private balconies and fantastic views. All of the air-conditioned rooms in Playa Golf and SPA have tiled floors and satellite TV. The apartments have modern kitchens with a hob, microwave and washing machine. The Playa Golf has its own supermarket, and there is also a fitness centre and a games room. Reception is open 24 hours a day. The Sunway Playa Golf and Spa has a spa and it offers a hamman, sauna and massages at an extra cost and an indoor pool with a hot tub free of charge. The Sunway Playa Golf and SPA complex has 3 restaurants offering a range of Mediterranean dishes. There is also a bar offering views over the Mediterranean Sea. Guests can use the hotel's free bicycles (subject to availability) to explore Sitges, with the town centre a 10-minute ride away. Barcelona can be reached easily by car, via the C32 motorway, or by train from Sitges station.

name: Hotel Antik
address: Avenida Zarautz, 120, 20018 San Sebastian, Gipuzkoa
description: Hotel Antik San Sebastian is located in San Sebastián’s Ondarreta district, 4 minutes’ drive from La Concha Bay. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel Antik San Sebastian features plasma satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, and some rooms also have a large balcony. Gipuzkoa University is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, and the city centre is 3.5 km away. City buses leave from nearby, and there is good access to the AP-1 and AP-8 Motorways.

name: Guitart Central Park Aqua Resort
address: Constanti Ribalaigua 7, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Catalonia
description: Located in the centre of Lloret, Hotel Guitart Central Park Aqua Resort is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the beach. It features 4 swimming pools and free Wi-Fi in all the complex. The large and colourful rooms at the Hotel Guitart Central Park Aqua Resort have a balcony, air conditioning and satellite TV. There are 2 swimming pools, 1 with waterfalls, located in the hotel gardens and the terraces are perfect for sunbathing. The spa offers a variety of treatments and massages. The new water park offers different facilities such as the Splash Park, a children's area, a swimming pool and a leisure area. The hotel’s seasonal restaurants, Mediterrani, Little Italy, and Lloret De Mar, serve a selection of Spanish and international cuisine. There is also an evening entertainment programme and between June and September there are activities for children. Lloret’s resort centre, where there is a selection of shops, bars and cafés is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Guitart. Barcelona and Girona can be reached in around an hour by car.

name: Hotel Hoyuela
address: De Los Hoteles,7, 39005 Santander, Cantabria
description: This luxurious 4-star hotel is located right by the beach, and only 400 metres from Magdalena Palace. It is within walking distance of the centre of Santander and the university. Apart from its remarkably good position, the Hotel Hoyuela offers elegant and beautiful design, lots of great facilities and services, and a good restaurant. The rooms are nicely decorated and well-equipped, and some offer a view over the sea.
